name: 40 Act Assignment
description: This AI field captures restrictions on “Assignment” within the meaning of the U.S. Investment Advisers Act of 1940 or the U.S. Investment Company Act of 1940.

name: Absence of Certain Changes Representation
description: This AI field captures representations that no event has occurred that has had a material adverse effect, typically since the date of the last audited financial statements of the business.

name: Absence of Litigation
description: This AI field captures any modifications to the representation of each party in International Swaps and Derivatives Association agreements that there is no actual or pending litigation against it that would affect the legality, validity or enforceability of the documents.

name: Abtretung von Rechten und Pflichten
description: Dieses AI Field umfasst die Möglichkeit bzw. den Umfang der Abtretbarkeit von Rechten und Pflichten aus dem Vertrag (z.B. der Gesellschaftsvereinbarung) an Dritte. Dieses AI Field ist für Anwendungsfälle im Immobilien-, Unternehmens-M&A-, Gewerbe- und Arbeitsbereich gedacht und wurde auf gewerbliche Mietverträge, Änderungsverträge, Gesellschaftsverträge, Gesellschaftervereinbarungen, Joint Venture Agreements, Beherrschungsverträge, Geschäftsführerverträge, Vorstandsverträge, Einkaufsbedingungen, Handelsvertreterverträge, Kaufverträge, Kooperationsverträge, Lieferbedingungen, Lieferverträge, Rahmenvereinbarungen, Verkaufsbedingungen, Vertriebsverträge, Werkverträge, Arbeitsverträge, Geschäftsführerverträge, sonstige Verträge und Vorstandsverträge trainiert, die dem deutschen Recht unterliegen. Dieses AI Field wurde nicht von Zuva, sondern von CMS Hasche Sigle erstellt. Die letzte Aktualisierung erfolgte im 2019. Bitte beachten Sie, dass weder Zuva noch CMS Hasche Sigle verpflichtet sind, dieses AI Field zu aktualisieren oder zu warten.

name: Abwerbeverbote
description: Dieses AI Field umfasst Regelungen, welche das (direkte/indirekte) Abwerben von Mitarbeitern des Vertragspartners oder der Gesellschaft nach Vertragsende einschränken oder verbieten. Dieses AI Field ist für Unternehmens-M&A-, geistiges Eigentums- und Arbeitsanwendungsfälle gedacht und wurde auf Gesellschaftsverträge, Gesellschaftervereinbarungen, Joint Venture Agreements, Beherrschungsverträge, Geschäftsführerverträge, Vorstandsverträge, Abgrenzungsvereinbarungen, Vorrechtsvereinbarungen, Kooperationsvertrag, Lizenzverträge, Markenübertragungsverträge, Markenkaufverträge, Patentübertragungsverträge, Softwareentwicklungsverträge, Softwareüberlassungsverträge, sonstige Verträge, Urheberrechtsverträge Arbeitsverträge, Geschäftsführerverträge, sonstige Verträge und Vorstandsverträge trainiert, die dem deutschen Recht unterliegen. Dieses AI Field wurde nicht von Zuva, sondern von CMS Hasche Sigle erstellt. Die letzte Aktualisierung erfolgte im 2018. Bitte beachten Sie, dass weder Zuva noch CMS Hasche Sigle verpflichtet sind, dieses AI Field zu aktualisieren oder zu warten.

name: Acceleration
description: This AI field captures the circumstances under which trustees and holders may declare the principal and accrued interest on all the corporate debt securities due and payable.

name: Accounting Changes Covenant
description: This AI field captures covenants of a borrower not to make any changes to its accounting practices, change its fiscal year end or change its accounting reference date.

name: Accounting of Disclosures of Protected Health Information
description: This AI field captures the requirement for business associates to provide an accounting of disclosures of protected health information pursuant to the Health Insurance Portability and Accountability Act (HIPAA).

name: Accounting Policies
description: This AI field captures information regarding the general accounting policies of a limited partnership or limited liability company, including the basis on which the books are to be kept, the definition of “GAAP”, and explicit discretion given to the general partner or manager to implement policies with respect to partnership or company accounting practices. This AI field does not capture more specific references to accounting matters such as the requirement that particular partnership items be computed in accordance with applicable GAAP.

name: “Accounts” Definition
description: This AI field captures the definitions of “Accounts” or “Receivables” typically referenced in the borrowing base formula for asset-based loans.

name: “Accounts Receivable” Definition
description: This AI field captures the definition of "Accounts Receivable".

name: Accounts Receivable Representation
description: This AI field captures representations that all accounts receivable of a party are valid obligations and not subject to counterclaims.

name: Accuracy of Representations Condition
description: This AI field captures conditions of borrowing with respect to the accuracy of representations.

name: Acknowledgement Address
description: This AI field captures the acknowledgement address listed on the Uniform Commercial Code financing statement. It was trained on the standard UCC-1 forms. Redactions or poor font quality may impact the accuracy of this AI field.

name: “Acquisition Proposal” Definition
description: This AI field captures the definition of “Acquisition Proposal”.

name: Additional Conditions for Transfer
description: This AI field captures the conditions for a tenant to assign, sublease, encumber, or otherwise transfer a lease. This AI field is designed to be used in conjunction with the “Landlord Consent to Transfer” and “Permitted Subletting and Transfers” AI fields.

name: Additional/Future Guarantors Covenant
description: This AI field captures a covenant requiring certain subsidiaries of the issuer to guarantee the debt issued pursuant to the indenture upon becoming guarantors of other specified debt, and a covenant requiring certain subsidiaries created subsequent to the issuance of the debt pursuant to the indenture to become guarantors.

name: Additional Insured Coverage
description: This AI field captures a party’s obligation to add additional parties as insureds under insurance policies.

name: Additional Rent
description: This AI field captures the definition of “Additional Rent” and any express obligations of a tenant to pay amounts as “Additional Rent“ under a lease. This AI field does not capture the definitions of “Operating Expenses”, “Common Area Maintenance” or “Real Estate Taxes”, or general payment obligations of a tenant.

name: Additional Subsidiaries Covenant
description: This AI field captures covenants of a borrower with respect to the acquisition or formation of additional subsidiaries.

name: Additional Termination Events
description: This AI field captures any negotiated “Additional Termination Events” that would allow a party to terminate the International Swaps and Derivatives Association master agreement early.

name: Additional Termination Events — Change in Ownership
description: This AI field captures additional termination events that are triggered by a change in control or a change in ownership of one or both parties in International Swaps and Derivatives Association agreements.

name: Additional Termination Events — Net Asset Value
description: This AI field captures additional termination events that are triggered by a decline in the net asset value of one or both parties below a particular threshold in International Swaps and Derivatives Association agreements.

name: Additional Termination Events — Ratings Downgrade
description: This AI field captures additional termination events resulting from a party’s failure to maintain its credit rating with S&P, Moody’s and/or Fitch at or above a certain specified threshold (typically investment grade) in International Swaps and Derivatives Association agreements.

name: Addresses for Transfers
description: This AI field captures the addresses to which the collateral transfers, interest payments, and distributions are to be delivered in Credit Support Annexes for International Swaps and Derivatives Association agreements.

name: Address of Premises
description: This AI field captures the address of the leased premises. This AI field is intended to be used with the "Description of Premises" and "Square Footage of Premises" AI fields.

name: Aditamento
description: Este campo de IA captura as maneiras pelas quais um contrato pode ser alterado. Este campo de IA tem como objetivo auxiliar na due diligence de M&A no Brasil e foi treinado utilizando contratos de concessão, franquia, fornecimento, locação, prestação de serviços, parceria, compra e venda, financeiros, societários e acordo de acionistas. Este campo de IA não foi criado por Zuva, mas sim por Machado Meyer e foi atualizado pela última vez em de 2021. Observe que nem Zuva nem Machado Meyer têm obrigação de atualizar ou manter este campo de IA.

name: Administrative Agent Fees
description: This AI field captures fees payable by a borrower to an administrative agent.

name: Affected Lender Approval
description: This AI field captures waivers, amendments and other actions requiring the consent of those lenders affected thereby, including the term and revolving lenders.

name: “Affiliate” Definition
description: This AI field captures the definition of "Affiliates" and similar terms, such as "Affiliated Companies", "Group Company", and "Associated Company".

name: “Affiliate” Definition — Bond Indenture
description: This AI field captures the definition of “Affiliate” in Indentures.

name: "Affiliates" Definition — ISDA
description: This AI field captures any modifications to the standard definition of “Affiliates” in International Swaps and Derivatives Association agreements.

name: Affirmative Covenants
description: This AI field captures a borrower's affirmative covenants.

name: AGB-Abwehrklausel
description: Dieses AI Field umfasst den Ausschluss von kollidierenden AGBs. Dieses AI Field ist für die Anwendungsfälle Commercial gedacht und wurde auf Einkaufsbedingungen, Handelsvertreterverträge, Kaufverträge, Kooperationsverträge, Lieferbedingungen, Lieferverträge, Rahmenvereinbarungen, Verkaufsbedingungen, Vertriebsverträge und Werkverträge trainiert, die dem deutschen Recht unterliegen. Dieses AI Field wurde nicht von Zuva, sondern von CMS Hasche Sigle erstellt. Die letzte Aktualisierung erfolgte im 2021. Bitte beachten Sie, dass weder Zuva noch CMS Hasche Sigle verpflichtet sind, dieses AI Field zu aktualisieren oder zu warten.

name: Agent only Approval
description: This AI field captures waivers, amendments and other actions requiring the consent of the agent alone, and not that of any lender.

name: “All-In Yield” Definition
description: This AI field captures the definition of “All-in Yield” or other terms defining the yield payable to lenders on loans.

name: Allocation/Distribution on Transfer
description: This AI field captures the method for apportioning allocations and distributions between the transferor and transferee of an interest in a limited partnership or limited liability company.

name: Allocation of Income/Loss
description: This AI field captures the general allocations of income, gain, loss, etc. to the partners or members, including allocation provisions relating to particular classes of interests in a limited partnership or limited liability company.

name: All or Substantially All Asset Transfer
description: This AI field captures assignment and change of control provisions that include the phrase “all or substantially all”. This AI field does not capture representations or warranties that include that phrase.

name: Alterations/Improvements — Equipment Lease
description: This AI field captures a lessee’s right, if any, to make alterations, modifications or improvements to the leased property.

name: Alternative to Interest Amount
description: This AI field captures any modifications to the standard provisions permitting parties to invest part of the cash collateral in other instruments rather than paying over an agreed interest return in the Credit Support Annexes for International Swaps and Derivatives Association agreements.

name: Alternative to Standard Dispute Resolution Process
description: This AI field captures any modifications to the standard dispute resolution procedure in the Credit Support Annexes for International Swaps and Derivatives Association agreements.

name: Amendement
description: Ce champ AI enregistre les dispositions qui déterminent comment le contrat peut être modifié. Il a été entraîné sur des ententes d'approvisionnement, des contrats de service, des contrats de distribution, des contrats de propriété intellectuelle, des contrats de travail et des contrats d'achat régis par les lois de la province de Québec.

name: Amendment
description: This AI field captures the ways in which an agreement may be amended.

name: Amendment of Articles/Bylaws
description: This AI field captures the authority to amend corporate bylaws and articles.

name: Amendments to Protected Health Information
description: This AI field captures the requirement for business associates to make available protected health information for amendments, and incorporate any amendments, pursuant to the Health Insurance Portability and Accountability Act (HIPAA).

name: Amortization
description: This AI field captures the amortization of credit facilities.

name: Annahmefrist
description: Dieses AI Field umfasst Regelungen, welche eine Frist zur Annahme des Mietvertrags vorsehen. Dieses AI Field ist für die Anwendungsfälle Real Estate gedacht und wurde auf gewerbliche Mietverträge und Änderungsverträge trainiert, die dem deutschen Recht unterliegen. Dieses AI Field wurde nicht von Zuva, sondern von CMS Hasche Sigle erstellt. Die letzte Aktualisierung erfolgte im 2018. Bitte beachten Sie, dass weder Zuva noch CMS Hasche Sigle verpflichtet sind, dieses AI Field zu aktualisieren oder zu warten.

name: Anti-Corruption and Sanctions Covenant
description: This AI field captures covenants of a borrower with respect to compliance with anti-money laundering, anti-terrorism and sanctions laws.

name: Anti-Corruption/Anti-Money Laundering/Anti-Terrorism/Sanctions Representation
description: This AI field captures representations with respect to anti-money laundering, anti-corruption, sanctions, and similar rules and regulations.

name: Anti-Corruption Regulations Representation
description: This AI field captures representations with respect to compliance with anti-corruption laws.

name: Anti-Layer Covenant
description: This AI field captures an anti-layer covenant, which prevents the issuer from incurring debt that is senior to the present debt being issued pursuant to the indenture other than specified, defined and contemplated senior debt, and the definitions of “Senior Indebtedness”, “Senior Subordinated Indebtedness”, and similar definitions.

name: Anti-Money Laundering Compliance
description: This AI field captures a party's obligation to comply with anti-money laundering legislation and not currently subject to sanctions, and a party's obligation to complete regulatory filings and provide additional information to ensure compliance with anti-money laundering legislation.

name: Anti-Terrorism Law Compliance
description: This AI field captures a party’s obligation to comply with anti-terrorism legislation.

name: Anzuwendendes Recht
description: Dieses AI Field umfasst Vereinbarungen über das auf den Vertrag anzuwendende Recht. Dieses AI Field ist fürAnwendungsfälle in den Bereichen Immobilien, Unternehmens-M&A, geistiges Eigentum, Gewerbe und Arbeitsrecht gedacht und wurde auf gewerbliche Mietverträge, Änderungsverträge, Gesellschaftsverträge, Gesellschaftervereinbarungen, Joint Venture Agreements, Beherrschungsverträge, Geschäftsführerverträge, Vorstandsverträge, Abgrenzungsvereinbarungen, Vorrechtsvereinbarungen, Kooperationsvertrag, Lizenzverträge, Markenübertragungsverträge, Markenkaufverträge, Patentübertragungsverträge, Softwareentwicklungsverträge, Softwareüberlassungsverträge, sonstige Verträge, Urheberrechtsverträge, Einkaufsbedingungen, Handelsvertreterverträge, Kaufverträge, Kooperationsverträge, Lieferbedingungen, Lieferverträge, Rahmenvereinbarungen, Verkaufsbedingungen, Vertriebsverträge, Werkverträge, Arbeitsverträge, Geschäftsführerverträge, sonstige Verträge und Vorstandsverträge trainiert, die dem deutschen Recht unterliegen.Dieses AI Field wurde nicht von Zuva, sondern von CMS Hasche Sigle erstellt. Die letzte Aktualisierung erfolgte im 2017. Bitte beachten Sie, dass weder Zuva noch CMS Hasche Sigle verpflichtet sind, dieses AI Field zu aktualisieren oder zu warten.

name: “Applicable Margin” Definition
description: This AI field captures the definitions of “Applicable Margin”, “Applicable Rate”, “Margin” or similar terms defining the margin payable on a loan.

name: Application of Money Collected/Priorities
description: This AI field captures the order in which money collected by the trustee will be applied and distributed.

name: Appointment of Authenticating Agent
description: This AI field captures an appointment of an authenticating agent.

name: Appraisal Rights Condition
description: This AI field captures closing conditions that limit the percentage of shareholders who have exercised their dissent or appraisal rights.

name: “Approved Fund”/“Related Fund” Definition
description: This AI field captures the definitions of “Approved Fund” or “Related Fund”.

name: Arbeitsort
description: Dieses AI Field erfasst den Beschäftigungsbetrieb/Standort den AN. Dieses AI Field ist für arbeitsrechtliche Anwendungsfälle gedacht und wurde auf Arbeitsverträge, Geschäftsführerverträge, sonstige Verträge und Vorstandsverträge trainiert, die dem deutschen Recht unterliegen. Dieses AI Field wurde nicht von Zuva, sondern von CMS Hasche Sigle erstellt. Die letzte Aktualisierung erfolgte im 2020. Bitte beachten Sie, dass weder Zuva noch CMS Hasche Sigle verpflichtet sind, dieses AI Field zu aktualisieren oder zu warten.

name: Arbeitszeit
description: Dieses AI Field erfasst Regelungen zur vertraglich festgelegten Arbeitszeit. Dieses AI Field ist für arbeitsrechtliche Anwendungsfälle gedacht und wurde auf Arbeitsverträge, Geschäftsführerverträge, sonstige Verträge und Vorstandsverträge trainiert, die dem deutschen Recht unterliegen. Dieses AI Field wurde nicht von Zuva, sondern von CMS Hasche Sigle erstellt. Die letzte Aktualisierung erfolgte im 2021. Bitte beachten Sie, dass weder Zuva noch CMS Hasche Sigle verpflichtet sind, dieses AI Field zu aktualisieren oder zu warten.

name: Arbitration
description: This AI field captures arbitration provisions in an agreement, including location of arbitration, arbitration rules, how arbitrators are appointed, and the number of arbitrators.

name: Arbitration — Lease
description: This AI field captures provisions which enable or require the parties to submit a dispute to arbitration. This AI field does not capture references to any other alternative dispute resolution methods.

name: Arbitration Rules
description: This AI field captures the rules governing arbitration initiated pursuant to an agreement.

name: ARD loan
description: This AI field captures a loan's anticipated repayment date.

name: Arranger
description: This AI field captures the arranger's name.

name: Asset/Collateral Sale Waiver
description: This AI field captures an agreement by junior secured creditors not to object to any motion or order pursuant to Section 363 of the U.S. Bankruptcy Code (or other equivalent provision under applicable law) relating to a sale, liquidation, or disposition of assets/collateral in the course of a bankruptcy proceeding.

name: “Asset Sale/Disposition” Definition
description: This AI field captures the definition of “Asset Sale/Disposition” and similar terms.

name: Asset Sales/Disposition Covenant
description: This AI field captures the covenant regarding the issuer’s ability to sell and dispose of assets, the required application of asset sale proceeds, the requirements and procedures for issuers to repurchase the securities from excess proceeds, and the allowable amount of asset sale proceeds that the issuer may obtain without triggering this covenant. The AI field also captures the definition of “Asset Sale”, “Asset Disposition” and similar definitions.

name: Assignment
description: This AI field captures provisions governing the assignment of an agreement, including necessary consents or notices (and exceptions therefrom) prior to an assignment, and provisions relating to “all or substantially all” asset transfers. This AI field captures related definitions.

name: Assignment and Participation
description: This AI field captures provisions dealing with assignment of or participation in credit facility debt.

name: Assignment by Borrower/Guarantor
description: This AI field captures restrictions on the ability of the borrower or guarantor to assign an agreement.

name: Assignment by Operation of Law
description: This AI field field captures assignment provisions that include the phrase “by operation of law”.

name: Assignment — Circumstances
description: This AI field captures circumstances in which a landlord may withhold consent to an assignment of a lease.

name: Assignment — Conditions
description: This AI field captures a landlord's conditions on a consent to assign a lease.

name: Assignment — Equipment Lease
description: This AI field captures a lessor’s and/or lessee’s right, if any, to assign its interest in a lease.

name: Assignment Minimum Amounts
description: This AI field captures the minimum amount required for any assignment or participation between lenders.

name: Assignment/Participation Confidentiality
description: This AI field captures permissions for disclosure of confidential information to prospective assignees or participants.

name: Assignment — Permitted/Prohibited
description: This AI field captures whether assignment is permitted or prohibited under a lease and any qualifying covenant language. This AI field does not capture a tenant’s ability to grant an assignee permission to assign.

name: Assignment Transfer Fees
description: This AI field captures any transfer fees payable to an agent in connection with the assignment or transfer of a loan.

name: Assistance with Data Subject Requests
description: This AI field captures a party's obligation to assist with data subject requests under data protection laws.

name: “Assumed Obligations/Liabilities” Definition
description: This AI field captures the definition of liabilities or obligations that will be assumed by the purchaser in connection with a transaction.

name: Attorney-Client Privilege Carveout
description: This AI field captures a contractual carveout specifying that the seller, and not the target company, will control communications protected by attorney-client privilege following the consummation of the transaction and preventing certain aspects of such attorney-client privilege from being transferred to the purchaser or surviving corporation.

name: Attorney In Fact
description: This AI field captures language which grants a party to a lease the right to execute a document or take another action in the name of, or on behalf of, another party as its attorney-in-fact or agent.

name: Attornment
description: This AI field captures an acknowledgment by a tenant that it will recognize any new owner of the property as its landlord, whether the new owner acquires the property through a regular sale, foreclosure or otherwise.

name: “Attributable Debt” Definition
description: This AI field captures the definition of “Attributable Debt”.

name: At-Will Employment
description: This AI field captures an employer or employee's right to terminate the employment relationship at any time, for any reason and without notice in accordance with applicable laws.

name: Audit & Inspection
description: This AI field captures audit and inspection provisions within a franchise agreement.

name: Audit Right
description: This AI field captures a party’s right to audit certain information of another party and the details of such audit, including frequency, notice required, and responsibility of cost.

name: Aufrechnung
description: Dieses AI Field umfasst Aufrechnungsverbote. Dieses AI Field ist für Anwendungsfälle in den Bereichen Immobilien, geistiges Eigentum, Handel und Arbeit gedacht und wurde auf gewerbliche Mietverträge, Änderungsverträge, Abgrenzungsvereinbarungen, Vorrechtsvereinbarungen, Kooperationsvertrag, Lizenzverträge, Markenübertragungsverträge, Markenkaufverträge, Patentübertragungsverträge, Softwareentwicklungsverträge, Softwareüberlassungsverträge, sonstige Verträge, Urheberrechtsverträge, Einkaufsbedingungen, Handelsvertreterverträge, Kaufverträge, Kooperationsverträge, Lieferbedingungen, Lieferverträge, Rahmenvereinbarungen, Verkaufsbedingungen, Vertriebsverträge, Werkverträge, Arbeitsverträge, Geschäftsführerverträge, sonstige Verträge und Vorstandsverträge trainiert, die dem deutschen Recht unterliegen. Dieses AI Field wurde nicht von Zuva, sondern von CMS Hasche Sigle erstellt. Die letzte Aktualisierung erfolgte im 2019. Bitte beachten Sie, dass weder Zuva noch CMS Hasche Sigle verpflichtet sind, dieses AI Field zu aktualisieren oder zu warten.

name: Aufrechterhaltung des Schutzrechtes
description: Dieses AI Field erfasst Verpflichtungen zur Aufrechterhaltung des Schutzrechtes. Dieses AI Field ist für die Anwendungsfälle Intellectual Property gedacht und wurde auf gewerbliche Mietverträge und Änderungsverträge trainiert, die dem deutschen Recht unterliegen. Dieses AI Field wurde nicht von Zuva, sondern von CMS Hasche Sigle erstellt. Die letzte Aktualisierung erfolgte im 2018. Bitte beachten Sie, dass weder Zuva noch CMS Hasche Sigle verpflichtet sind, dieses AI Field zu aktualisieren oder zu warten.

name: Ausschlussfristen
description: Dieses AI Field erfasst Regelungen zu Ausschlussfristen nach Vertragsende. Dieses AI Field ist für arbeitsrechtliche Anwendungsfälle gedacht und wurde auf Arbeitsverträge, Geschäftsführerverträge, sonstige Verträge und Vorstandsverträge trainiert, die dem deutschen Recht unterliegen. Dieses AI Field wurde nicht von Zuva, sondern von CMS Hasche Sigle erstellt. Die letzte Aktualisierung erfolgte im 2019. Bitte beachten Sie, dass weder Zuva noch CMS Hasche Sigle verpflichtet sind, dieses AI Field zu aktualisieren oder zu warten.

name: Authority to Contractually Bind Corporation
description: This AI field captures the authority to execute contracts with third parties.

name: Authority to Issue Preferred Shares
description: This AI field captures the authority to issue and set preferences and restrictions of preferred shares.

name: Authorization Representation
description: This AI field captures representations that a party has the capacity, authority and power to enter into an agreement, and that an agreement constitutes a legally binding obligation.

name: Authorized Capital
description: This AI field captures the number, class type, and value of shares authorized by a corporation. This AI field captures related definitions. This AI field does not capture whether or what proportion of the authorized capital has been issued or is outstanding.

name: “Authorized User” Definition
description: This AI field captures the definition of “Authorized User” and other similar terms.

name: “Automatic Early Termination” Definition
description: This AI field captures any modifications to the standard definition of “Automatic Early Termination” in International Swaps and Derivatives Association agreements.

name: Automatic Renewal
description: This AI field captures automatic renewal or extension provisions, including successive renewals or extensions when no actions are taken by the parties.

name: Automobile Liability and Workers’ Compensation Insurance
description: This AI field captures a party’s obligation to obtain automobile liability, workers’ compensation, casualty, and employers’ liability insurance. This AI field does not capture insurance-related indemnity obligations.

name: Availability
description: This AI field captures the availability of credit facilities.

name: “Available Amount” Definition
description: This AI field captures the definitions of “Available Amount”, “Cumulative Credit” and other baskets relevant in the context of asset based loans.

name: Avis
description: Ce champ AI enregistre les dispositions concernant les avis incluant l'adresse de destination (si présente). Il a été entraîné sur des ententes d'approvisionnement, des contrats de service, des contrats de distribution, des contrats de propriété intellectuelle, des contrats de travail et des contrats d'achat régis par les lois de la province de Québec.

name: Award Type (ISO/NSO)
description: This AI field captures language relating to whether the employee stock option is an incentive stock option or a non-qualified stock option.

name: Background Checks
description: This AI field captures an employee's obligation to submit to a background check and any requirement that an employee submit to medical examinations in connection with obtaining insurance or a claim of disability.

name: Backups of Customer Data
description: This AI field captures a party's obligation to create backups of customer data. This AI field does not capture provisions relating to the right to use customer data to create backups; or the right to retain customer data in backups.

name: Bail-In Clause
description: This AI field captures the standard provision for acknowledgment and consent to bail-in of EEA financial institutions.

name: Bankruptcy
description: This AI field captures the consequences of bankruptcy of a party to an agreement, including termination of the agreement.

name: Base Currency
description: This AI field captures the common currency into which the values of collateral and the exposure are converted for valuation purposes in the Credit Support Annexes for International Swaps and Derivatives Association agreements.

name: Base/Principal Rent
description: This AI field captures the main or principal rents charged throughout the term of a lease.

name: “Base Rate” Definition
description: This AI field captures the definitions of any base rates applicable to a loan, including prime rates, LIBOR rates, eurodollar rates, screen rates, interpolated rates and federal funds rates.

name: Base Rent
description: This AI field captures base rent throughout the term of a lease, including rent steps, extension rent, and percentage rent.

name: Base Salary
description: This AI field captures an employee’s base salary.

name: Bauliche Änderungen (Mieter)
description: Dieses AI Field umfasst bauliche Änderungen am Mietobjekt durch den Mieter (auch Anbringen von Werbung, Reklame, etc.). Dieses AI Field ist für die Anwendungsfälle Real Estate gedacht und wurde auf gewerbliche Mietverträge und Änderungsverträge trainiert, die dem deutschen Recht unterliegen. Dieses AI Field wurde nicht von Zuva, sondern von CMS Hasche Sigle erstellt. Die letzte Aktualisierung erfolgte im 2018. Bitte beachten Sie, dass weder Zuva noch CMS Hasche Sigle verpflichtet sind, dieses AI Field zu aktualisieren oder zu warten.

name: Betriebskosten
description: Dieses AI Field erfasst Regelungen zum Umfang und der Höhe sämtlicher Betriebskosten. Dieses AI Field ist für die Anwendungsfälle Real Estate gedacht und wurde auf gewerbliche Mietverträge und Änderungsverträge trainiert, die dem deutschen Recht unterliegen. Dieses AI Field wurde nicht von Zuva, sondern von CMS Hasche Sigle erstellt. Die letzte Aktualisierung erfolgte im 2018. Bitte beachten Sie, dass weder Zuva noch CMS Hasche Sigle verpflichtet sind, dieses AI Field zu aktualisieren oder zu warten.

name: Betriebspflicht
description: Dieses AI Field erfasst die Aufrechterhaltung des Betriebs zu vorgegebenen Zeiten, Ausgestaltung der Räumlichkeiten und evtl. des Schaufensters. Dieses AI Field ist für die Anwendungsfälle Real Estate gedacht und wurde auf gewerbliche Mietverträge und Änderungsverträge trainiert, die dem deutschen Recht unterliegen. Dieses AI Field wurde nicht von Zuva, sondern von CMS Hasche Sigle erstellt. Die letzte Aktualisierung erfolgte im 2018. Bitte beachten Sie, dass weder Zuva noch CMS Hasche Sigle verpflichtet sind, dieses AI Field zu aktualisieren oder zu warten.

name: Billing Address
description: This AI field captures where invoices should be delivered, either to a physical address or electronically.

name: “Bill of Sale” Definition
description: This smart field captures the definition of a bill of sale.

name: Binding Obligation Representation
description: This AI field captures representations that the agreement, once executed and delivered, constitutes a legal and binding obligation of a loan party/obligor.

name: Board/Manager Selection
description: This AI field captures the composition of a board of directors and the procedures by which board members are elected or appointed.

name: Board Reaffirmation of Recommendation
description: This AI field captures a target board’s covenant to reaffirm its recommendation of the transaction, and language relating to the target board’s failure to reaffirm its recommendation.

name: Board’s Right to Fill Vacancies
description: This AI field captures the rights or obligations of directors to fill newly created vacancies resulting from either an increase in the number of directors or from the resignation or removal of a director.

name: Bonus/Commission
description: This AI field captures an employee’s entitlement to a bonus or commission. This AI field does not capture a signing bonus. Signing bonuses are captured by the Signing Bonus AI field.

name: Books, Records and Inspection Covenant
description: This AI field captures covenants of a borrower to maintain its books and records and to grant any related access, audit or inspection rights.

name: Borrower
description: This smart field captures the borrower's name.

name: Borrower Indemnification of Lender
description: This AI field captures provisions whereby a borrower or guarantor indemnifies a lender or agent. This AI field does not capture tax indemnification obligations. Tax indemnification obligations are captured by the "Tax Indemnification by Borrower" AI field.

name: “Borrowing Base” Definition
description: This AI field captures the definition of “Borrowing Base” used for asset-based loans.

name: Borrowing Base Reporting
description: This AI field captures a borrower's obligation to deliver borrowing base certificates and related engineering and reserve reports.

name: Branches — Party A
description: This AI field captures whether or not Party A is a “Multibranch” party in International Swaps and Derivatives Association agreements.

name: Branches — Party B
description: This AI field captures whether or not Party B is a “Multibranch” party in International Swaps and Derivatives Association agreements.

name: Break Provision — Break Conditions
description: This AI field captures conditions to a right to break a lease.

name: Break Provision — Date/Notice/Conditions
description: This AI field is captures break date, break notice and break conditions.

name: Break Provision — Notice
description: This AI field captures notice required for a break of a lease to be exercised.

name: Bring-Down of Representations and Warranties
description: This AI field captures requirements that representations and warranties given by a party upon execution of an agreement be true at the closing of a transaction.

name: Brokers Representation
description: This AI field captures representations that no broker is entitled to any commission in connection with a transaction.

name: Burdensome/Restrictive Agreements Covenant
description: This AI field captures covenants of a borrower not to enter into any burdensome agreements or agreements restricting particular actions.

name: Business Continuity
description: This AI field captures provisions relating to business continuity during an interruption or a dispute, including an obligation to provide a copy of a business continuity plan, and representations and warranties that a party has a business continuity/disaster recovery plan in place.

name: “Business Day” Definition
description: This AI field captures the definition of "Business Day".

name: “Business” Definition
description: This AI field captures the definition of the "Business".

name: Business Interruption Insurance — Lease
description: This AI field captures whether the tenant is obligated to obtain business interruption, loss of income, or extra expense insurance.

name: Business/Purpose
description: This AI field captures the stated business or purpose of a limited partnership or limited liability company.

name: Buyer Match Right
description: This AI field captures a purchaser’s right to negotiate the terms of its offer with the target’s board of directors prior to such board making any change of recommendation, or otherwise terminating the agreement with the purchaser, pursuant to a superior proposal or intervening event.

name: Calculation Agent
description: This AI field captures the identity of the “Calculation Agent” in International Swaps and Derivatives Association agreements.

name: Calculation of Value
description: This AI field captures whether “S&P”, “Moody’s” or “Fitch” trigger values are added for the purposes of calculating value in the Credit Support Annexes for International Swaps and Derivatives Association agreements. This AI field was not trained on the 2016 Credit Support Annexes.

name: Can a party make a press release about the relationship between the parties?
description: This AI field answers the question of whether a party can make a press release or public statement about the relationship between the parties.

name: Can a party use another party's logo?
description: This AI field answers the question of whether a party can use another party's logo in promotional materials and other publications.

name: Can notice be given electronically?
description: This AI field answers the question of whether notice and other communications can be sent electronically.

name: Can the agreement be amended?
description: This AI field answers the question of whether the agreement can be amended.

name: Can the agreement be assigned?
description: This AI field answers the question of whether the agreement can be assigned.

name: Can the agreement be terminated for convenience?
description: This AI field answers the question of whether the agreement can be terminated for convenience, and if so, the conditions for doing so.

name: Can the agreement be terminated for insolvency?
description: This AI field answers the question of whether the agreement can be terminated for insolvency, and if so, the conditions for doing so.

name: Capital Account
description: This AI field captures provisions relating to the establishment and maintenance of capital accounts for partners or members, including provisions relating to the establishment of a current account, if any, for each partner/member, and, in the case of U.S. limited partnerships or limited liability companies, the requirement that such accounts be maintained in accordance with the applicable regulations under section 704 of the U.S. Internal Revenue Code,

name: Capitalization Representation
description: This AI field captures representations with respect to capitalization of a party or its subsidiaries.

name: “Capital Stock” Definition
description: This AI field captures the definitions of “Capital Stock”, “Equity Interest”, “Equity Securities” and similar terms.

name: Cash Dominion Period
description: This AI field captures the cash dominion period for asset-based loan agreements.

name: Cash Dominion Period Trigger
description: This AI field captures the trigger event for cash dominion periods for asset-based loan agreements.

name: “Cash Equivalents” Definition
description: This AI field captures the definitions of “Cash Equivalents” or “Cash Equivalent Investments” as typically referenced in a borrower’s covenants.

name: Cashless Exercise
description: This AI field captures whether the option holder may exercise his/her stock option using a cashless exercise. Cashless exercise is a method of payment whereby the option holder delivers instructions to a broker providing for the assignment to the grantor of the proceeds of a sale or loan with respect to the shares acquired upon exercise of the stock option.

name: Casualty
description: This AI field captures a tenant’s rights and a landlord’s obligations in the event that all or part of leased premises is rendered unusable by reason of casualty or damage, including fire or flood.

name: “Cause” Definition
description: This AI field captures the definition of “Cause” in employment and option agreements.

name: Centre of Main Interest
description: This AI field captures representations and covenants with respect to the centre of main interest of loan parties/obligors.

name: Certificate of Insurance
description: This AI field captures a party’s obligation to provide a certificate of insurance, including notice requirements for cancellation or changes to insurance policies.

name: Cessão
description: Este campo de IA captura todas as disposições que regem a cessão de um contrato, incluindo consentimentos ou avisos necessários. Este campo de IA tem como objetivo auxiliar na due diligence de M&A no Brasil e foi treinado utilizando acordos de acionistas. Este campo de IA não foi criado por Zuva, mas sim por Machado Meyer e foi atualizado pela última vez em de 2021. Observe que nem Zuva nem Machado Meyer têm obrigação de atualizar ou manter este campo de IA.

name: Cession
description: Ce champ AI enregistre les dispositions relatives au transfert du contrat, incluant les autorisations et les avis nécessaires (en plus des exceptions éventuelles). Il a été entraîné sur des ententes d'approvisionnement, des contrats de service, des contrats de distribution, des contrats de propriété intellectuelle, des contrats de travail et des contrats d'achat régis par les lois de la province de Québec.

name: Change Control/Change Management
description: This AI field captures the process for managing changes to the products or services provided under an agreement, including pricing changes, and notice and/or consent requirements for such changes. This AI field captures related definitions, such as "Change Order", "Change Request", and "Engineering Change". This AI field does not capture amendments to an agreement, which is captured by the Amendment AI field.

name: Change in Law
description: This AI field captures provisions relating to any changes in law that occur after the execution of an agreement.

name: “Change in Law” Definition
description: This AI field captures the definition of “Change in Law” or references to similar concepts in the context of increased costs.

name: Change in Ownership — ISDA
description: This AI field captures a change in ownership provision found in an ISDA Schedule.

name: Changement de contrôle
description: Ce champ AI enregistre les conséquences d'un changement de propriété ou d'un changement d'administration d'un contractant (sans saisir la cession directe ou indirecte du contrat). Il a été entraîné sur des ententes d'approvisionnement, des contrats de service, des contrats de distribution, des contrats de propriété intellectuelle, des contrats de travail et des contrats d'achat régis par les lois de la province de Québec.

name: Change of Business Covenant
description: This AI field captures covenants of a borrower not to make a substantial change in the nature of its business nor to engage in any business other than the business carried on by it when the agreement was entered into.

name: Change of Control
description: This AI field captures the consequences of changes in ownership or management of a party to an agreement, including a requirement to notify and a right to terminate upon a change of control. This AI field captures related definitions.

name: Change of Control — Commitment Letter
description: This AI field captures change of control provisions.

name: Change of Control — Credit Agreement
description: This AI field captures mandatory prepayments and events of default triggered by a change of control. This AI field does not capture covenants not to make divestitures or to undergo fundamental changes. To capture covenants not to undergo fundamental changes, the AI field Fundamental Changes/Merger Covenant should be used.

name: “Change of Control” Definition — Bond Indenture
description: This AI field captures the definition of “Change of Control” in Indentures.

name: “Change of Control” Definition — Credit Agreement
description: This AI field captures the definition of “Change of Control” in credit-related agreements.

name: “Change of Control” Definition — Option Agreements
description: This AI field captures the definition of “Change of Control” in option-related agreements.

name: Change of Control — Employment Agreement
description: This AI field captures change of control provisions in employment agreements.

name: Change of Control — Lease
description: This AI field captures lease restrictions on changes in control of or transfers of interests in a tenant.

name: Change of Control Put Right — Bond Indenture
description: This AI field captures a requirement that the issuer offer to repurchase debt securities upon a specified change of control, and the mechanism for making such change of control offer. This AI field also captures the definition of “Change of Control”, “Permitted Holders” and similar definitions.

name: Changes in Permission
description: This AI field captures provisions relating to the covered entity’s obligation to notify the business associate of changes in, or the revocation of, permission by an individual to use or disclose protected health information.

name: Children's Privacy
description: This AI field captures affirmative disclosures regarding privacy rights of children, as required by the California Consumer Privacy Act (“CCPA”) and the Children’s Online Privacy Protection Act (“COPPA”).

name: Cláusula de Proteção
description: Este campo de IA captura cláusulas que são estabelecidas para fazer as partes se absterem de certas ações que poderiam resultar na deterioração de sua posição de crédito e capacidade de pagar dívidas existentes, bem como se absterem de praticar atos que possam colocar em risco o objeto contratual. Este campo de IA tem como objetivo auxiliar na due diligence de M&A no Brasil e foi treinado utilizando acordos de acionistas, acordos de investimento e contratos financeiros. Este campo de IA não foi criado por Zuva, mas sim por Machado Meyer e foi atualizado pela última vez em de 2021. Observe que nem Zuva nem Machado Meyer têm obrigação de atualizar ou manter este campo de IA.

name: “Closing Date” Definition
description: This AI field captures the definition of the "Closing Date" of a transaction.

name: “Closing” Definition
description: This AI field captures the definition of "Closing" of a transaction.

name: Collateral Account
description: This AI field captures the circumstances in which the secured party or custodian must maintain a segregated account for holding collateral in the Credit Support Annexes for International Swaps and Derivatives Association agreements. This AI field was not trained on the 2016 Credit Support Annexes.

name: Collateral Description
description: This AI field captures the description of the collateral listed on the Uniform Commercial Code financing statement. It was trained on the standard UCC-1 forms. Redactions or poor font quality may impact the accuracy of this AI field.

name: “Collateral Documents”/“Security Documents” Definition
description: This AI field captures the list of documents that must be provided in connection with a grant of a security interest in collateral.

name: Collateral Representation
description: This AI field captures representations that the security documents are effective and create valid and enforceable security interests in the collateral.

name: “Collateral“/“Transaction Security” Definition
description: This AI field captures the definitions of “Collateral” or “Transaction Security” provided in connection with a secured loan.

name: Collection of Indebtedness and Suits for Enforcement by Trustee
description: This AI field captures how and when indebtedness will be collected in the event of a default, and the circumstances under which the trustee may bring a collection suit.

name: Commencement Date
description: This AI field captures the date on which a lease term commences. The AI fields "Commencement Date (Short Form)" and "Commencement Date (Long Form)" should be used for better results.

name: Commencement Date (Long Form)
description: This AI field will capture the date upon which a lease term commences. This AI field is designed to be used in conjunction with the "Commencement Date (Short Form)" AI field.

name: Commencement Date (Short Form)
description: This AI field will capture the date upon which a lease term commences. This AI field is designed to be used in conjunction with the "Commencement Date (Long Form)" AI field.

name: Commercial General Liability Insurance
description: This AI field captures a party’s obligation to obtain commercial general liability, product liability, and property insurance. This AI field does not capture insurance-related indemnity obligations.

name: Commitment Fees
description: This AI field captures commitment fees payable in connection with credit facilities.

name: Commitment Fees — Credit Agreement
description: This AI field captures fees payable by a borrower on the unused portion of a term or revolving loan.

name: Committees (Broad)
description: This AI field captures the delegation of responsibilities to committees, including committee functions and operative procedures. This AI field does not capture committee creation for liquidation events.

name: Common Area Maintenance
description: This AI field captures a tenant’s obligations with respect to the maintenance of common areas of a building.

name: Compliance Certificate Covenant
description: This AI field captures the covenant requiring the issuer to file, within a certain time period after each fiscal year, a certificate with the indenture trustee as to compliance with the provisions of the indenture.

name: Compliance with 409A
description: This AI field captures an employer’s obligation to comply with Section 409A of the U.S. Internal Revenue Code.

name: Compliance with Law
description: This AI field captures a party's obligation to comply with laws. This AI field captures related definitions.

name: Compliance with Law Representation
description: This AI field captures general representations that each loan party/obligor and its business is compliant with all and not in violation of applicable laws. This AI field does not capture representations that deal with compliance with specific laws.

name: Compliance with Laws and Permits Representation
description: This AI field captures representations that a party has conducted its business in compliance with all applicable laws and has all necessary government permits.

name: Compliance with Laws Covenant
description: This AI field captures covenants of a borrower to comply with applicable laws and regulations.

name: Concessão de Licença
description: Este campo de IA captura as cláusulas de concessão de licença que permite a um licenciado se usufruir da licença concedida conforme condições específicas (enumeradas ou não no contrato), exceto as que violariam os direitos de propriedade intelectual do licenciante. Este campo de IA tem como objetivo auxiliar na due diligence de M&A no Brasil e foi treinado utilizando contratos de licenciamento e termos de uso. Este campo de IA não foi criado por Zuva, mas sim por Machado Meyer e foi atualizado pela última vez em de 2021. Observe que nem Zuva nem Machado Meyer têm obrigação de atualizar ou manter este campo de IA.

name: Condemnation/Eminent Domain
description: This AI field captures the consequences of leased premises becoming condemned or being appropriated by a public authority.

name: Conditions Precedent — CSA
description: This AI field captures which termination events will be designated as “Specified Conditions” for the purposes of the conditions precedent to the exercise of the secured party’s rights and remedies in the Credit Support Annexes for International Swaps and Derivatives Association agreements.

name: Conditions Precedent — Incremental Facility
description: This AI field captures conditions precedent that must be fulfilled before incremental facilities / increases in commitment are effective. This AI field does not capture similar provisions regarding refinance / replacement facilities, incremental notes, or incremental equivalent debt. It is recommended that this AI field be used together with the other Incremental Facility AI fields.

name: Conduct of Business in the Ordinary Course Covenant
description: This AI field captures a covenant of a target (and, if applicable, a purchaser) to operate its business only in the ordinary course between signing of the purchase agreement and closing of the transaction.

name: Confidencialidade
description: Este campo de IA captura somente as obrigações de confidencialidade das partes de um contrato, excluindo-se as exceções. Este campo de IA tem como objetivo auxiliar na due diligence de M&A no Brasil e foi treinado utilizando contratos de concessão, franquia, prestação de serviços, fornecimento, parceria, compra e venda, acordos de acionistas e SPA's. Este campo de IA não foi criado por Zuva, mas sim por Machado Meyer e foi atualizado pela última vez em de 2021. Observe que nem Zuva nem Machado Meyer têm obrigação de atualizar ou manter este campo de IA.

name: “Confidential Information” Definition
description: This AI field captures the definition of "Confidential Information" and similar terms, such as "Proprietary Information", "Confidential Material", and "Protected Information".

name: “Confidential Information” Definition — Exceptions — Becomes Known by Disclosure Not in Breach
description: This AI field captures exceptions to the definition of “Confidential Information” for information learned through a third party source who is not in breach of any confidentiality obligations.

name: “Confidential Information” Definition — Exceptions — Independently Developed
description: This AI field captures exceptions to the definition of “Confidential Information” for information that was independently developed by the recipient.

name: “Confidential Information” Definition — Exceptions — Known Prior to Agreement
description: This AI field captures exceptions to the definition of “Confidential Information” for information that was known prior to entering the agreement.

name: “Confidential Information” Definition — Exceptions — Public Information
description: This AI field captures exceptions to the definition of “Confidential Information” for information available to the public.

name: Confidentialité
description: Ce champ AI enregistre les obligations de confidentialité des différentes parties. Il a été entraîné sur des ententes d'approvisionnement, des contrats de service, des contrats de distribution, des contrats de propriété intellectuelle, des contrats de travail et des contrats d'achat régis par les lois de la province de Québec.

name: Confidentiality
description: This AI field captures the confidentiality obligations of parties to an agreement. This AI field captures related definitions.

name: Conflict of Interest
description: This AI field captures director conflicts of interest, including procedures for managing conflicts, obligations of interested directors, validity of corporate actions taken with interested directors, and waiver or non-waiver of the corporate opportunity doctrine.

name: Consents, Approvals, No Violations/Conflicts Representation
description: This AI field captures representations that the execution and delivery of an agreement will not conflict with a party’s organizational documents or other documents to which it is a party, unless consents have been obtained.

name: Consent to Recording — ISDA
description: This AI field captures whether the parties consent to the recording of conversations between them in International Swaps and Derivatives Association agreements.

name: Consent to Substitution
description: This AI field captures whether the pledgor is required to obtain the secured party’s consent before any substitution of collateral in the Credit Support Annexes for International Swaps and Derivatives Association agreements.

name: Consideration/Exchange Ratio Adjustment
description: This AI field captures language addressing the adjustment of the exchange ratio and/or the merger consideration to account for dividends, splits, issuances, reorganizations, etc. This AI field applies primarily to share and mixed consideration deals.

name: Consignments and Other Property Arrangements
description: This AI field captures an whether goods are being provided by one party to another on a consignment basis, where one party has possession of certain goods or other property, but title to such goods or property remains with the other party.

name: “Consolidated Fixed Charges Coverage Ratio” Definition
description: This AI field captures the definition of “Consolidated Fixed Charges Coverage Ratio” and similar terms. This AI field captures only the fixed charges coverage ratio and not other types of financial ratios.

name: “Consolidated Fixed Charges” Definition
description: This AI field captures the definition of “Consolidated Fixed Charges” and similar terms.

name: “Consolidated Net Income” Definition
description: This AI field captures the definitions of “Consolidated Net Income”, “Consolidated Adjusted Net Income (Loss)”, “Adjusted Consolidated Net Income”, and similar terms.

name: Consummation of the Acquisition/Merger Condition
description: This AI field captures conditions of borrowing with respect to the closing of concurrent transactions.

name: Consummation of the Acquisition/Merger Condition — Credit Agreement
description: This AI field captures conditions of borrowing with respect to the consummation of the transaction associated with the loan.

name: Continuing Obligations
description: This AI field captures a lessee’s obligation to continue paying rent should they fail to return the leased property when required, or in the condition required, under the terms of a lease, and the circumstances in which a lessee’s obligations under the lease may continue automatically unless the lessee notifies lessor of its intent to terminate the lease.

name: Contracts Representation
description: This AI field captures representations with respect to a party’s contracts.

name: Control by Majority
description: This AI field captures instances where the holders of a majority of the principal amount of outstanding corporate debt securities may direct the time, method and place for proceedings related to remedies available to the trustee.

name: “Control” Definition
description: This AI field captures the definition of “Control”.

name: Contrôle
description: Ce champ AI enregistre la définition de contrôle qui est généralement référée dans les dispositions relatives aux changement de contrôle ou dans la définition de filiale. Il a été entraîné sur des ententes d'approvisionnement, des contrats de service, des contrats de distribution, des contrats de propriété intellectuelle, des contrats de travail et des contrats d'achat régis par les lois de la province de Québec.

name: “Controller” Definition
description: This AI field captures the definition of “Controller” in the context of data protection.

name: Controlling Agreement/Conflict Resolution
description: This AI field captures provisions that specify which of one or more agreements will govern in the event of a conflict between them.

name: Corporate Existence Covenant
description: This AI field captures the covenant of the issuer to preserve and keep in full force and effect its corporate existence.

name: Corporate Organization and Qualification Representation
description: This AI field captures representations that a party is organized and in good standing, is qualified to carry on its business, and that true and complete copies of its books and records have been given to the other party.

name: Corporate Status/Organization Representation
description: This AI field captures representations that a loan party/obligor is duly organized, validly existing and in good standing under applicable law, and that it has the legal capacity to conduct its affairs.

name: Corporate Trustee Required and Eligibility
description: This AI field captures the requirement that the indenture have a corporate trustee, and describes related eligibility and disqualification requirements.

name: Costs and Expenses
description: This AI field captures a requirement that the borrower pay costs and expenses associated with the loan transaction.

name: Costs of Transfer
description: This AI field captures the responsibility of a party to pay all costs and other taxes involved with the transfer of the eligible credit support. This AI field was not trained on the 2016 Credit Support Annexes.

name: Counterparts
description: This AI field captures provisions in an agreement that provide for execution in any number of counterparts.

name: Counterparty Specified Entity
description: This AI field captures whether each party is a “Specified Entity” for the purposes of certain events of default and termination events in International Swaps and Derivatives Association agreements.

name: Covenant Compliance Condition
description: This AI field captures a closing condition that a party has complied with all covenants or obligations under an agreement.

name: Covenant Defeasance
description: This smart field captures the covenant defeasance requirements that, if satisfied, relieve the issuer’s obligation to comply with the substantive covenants contained in the indenture.

name: Covenant Suspension/Fall Away
description: This smart field captures the circumstances in which the enforcement of specified covenants will be suspended or terminated.

name: “Coverage Ratio”/“Interest Cover” Definition
description: This AI field captures definitions of ratios measuring the proportion of earnings to interest expenses.

name: Covered Transactions
description: This AI field captures the scope of transactions to which a 2016 Credit Support Annex for International Swaps and Derivatives Association agreements applies.

name: “Credit Agreement”/“Credit Facility” Definition
description: This AI field captures the definitions of “Credit Agreement”, “Credit Facility”, and similar terms.

name: Credit and Corporate Documentation Condition
description: This AI field captures conditions of borrowing with respect to credit and corporate documentation.

name: Credit Event Merger — Party A
description: This AI field captures whether or not the “Credit Event Upon Merger” provisions will apply to Party A in International Swaps and Derivatives Association agreements.

name: Credit Event Merger — Party B
description: This AI field captures whether or not the “Credit Event Upon Merger” provisions will apply to Party B in International Swaps and Derivatives Association agreements.

name: Credit Event Upon Merger
description: This AI field captures whether the “Credit Event Upon Merger” provisions apply to either of the parties in International Swaps and Derivatives Association agreements.

name: Credit Facility Basket
description: This smart field captures the issuer’s ability to incur additional indebtedness pursuant to credit facilities without triggering the limitation on additional debt covenant.

name: Credit Facility Sizes
description: This AI field captures the amount of credit facilities, including term, revolving, bridge, swingline, letter of credit or incremental facilities.

name: Credit Ratings Downgrade
description: This AI field captures a credit ratings downgrade provision found in an ISDA Schedule.

name: Credit Support Amount
description: This AI field captures the calculation of the credit support amount and whether the “S&P”, “Moody’s” or “Fitch” trigger values apply in Credit Support Annexes for International Swaps and Derivatives Association agreements. This AI field was not trained on the 2016 Credit Support Annexes.

name: Credit Support Document
description: This AI field captures which documents will constitute “Credit Support Documents” in International Swaps and Derivatives Association agreements.

name: Credit Support Eligibility Condition
description: This AI field captures whether the parties have agreed to include any conditions that must be satisfied for collateral to qualify as Eligible Credit Support in 2016 Credit Support Annexes for International Swaps and Derivatives Association agreements.

name: Credit Support Offsets
description: This AI field captures whether the parties have agreed to offset transfers of collateral under a 2016 Credit Support Annex against transfers of collateral under any Credit Support Annex(es) designated under “Other CSA”.

name: Credit Support Provider
description: This AI field captures disclosure or applicability of each party’s issuers of credit support, such as a guarantor in International Swaps and Derivatives Association agreements.

name: Cross Default and Thresholds  — ISDA
description: This AI field captures the definitions of “Cross Default”, “Specified Indebtedness”, “Shareholder’s Equity”, “Credit Agreement” and “Threshold” in International Swaps and Derivatives Association agreements.

name: Cross Default Carve-out for Administrative Error
description: This AI field captures carve-out language in International Swaps and Derivatives Association agreements which excludes payment delays caused by operational and/or administrative error from triggering an event of default, provided such delay is remedied within a certain period of time.

name: Cross-Default — Equipment Lease
description: This AI field captures a lessee's default that is triggered by a default under another agreement.

name: Cross Default — ISDA
description: This AI field captures whether defaults under other agreements between the parties can lead to a default under the International Swaps and Derivatives Association master agreement, and the timing of when this event of default can be triggered.

name: Curative Allocations
description: This AI field captures the right of the general partner or manager to make offsetting allocations of income, gain, loss or deduction in respect of certain special/regulatory allocations otherwise allocated to the capital accounts of particular partners or members for the purposes of complying with certain requirements of the regulations under section 704 of the U.S. Internal Revenue Code.

name: Cure Period — Commercial Agreement
description: This AI field captures specific cure periods for common defaults.

name: Cure Period — Credit Agreement
description: This AI field captures specific cure periods for common borrower defaults, including grace periods for non-payment, dismissal of insolvency proceedings, and vacating/setting aside judgments.

name: Cure Period — Equipment Lease
description: This AI field captures specific cure periods for common defaults.

name: Currency
description: This AI field captures the currency of payment under an agreement. This AI field does not capture stand-alone currency symbols.

name: “Currency” Definition
description: This AI field captures the definitions of “Currency”, “Optional Currency” and any specific currencies that are defined in the agreement.

name: Customer Feedback
description: This AI field captures provisions relating to customer feedback regarding the services.

name: Customer License Grant
description: This AI field captures whether the customer grants the provider a license to use its data or content. This AI field does not capture provisions relating to aggregated data or feedback.

name: Customers and Suppliers Representation
description: This AI field captures representations with respect to a party’s customers and suppliers.

name: Customs and Tariffs
description: This AI field captures which party is responsible for the payment of customs and tariffs under an agreement and any references to customs and tariffs.

name: “Data” Definition
description: This AI field captures the definition of “Data” and similar terms in the context of data protection.

name: “Data Exporter” Definition
description: This AI field captures the definition of “Data Exporter” in the context of data protection.

name: “Data Importer” Definition
description: This AI field captures the definition of “Data Importer” in the context of data protection.

name: Data Processing Instructions
description: This AI field captures (i) the requirement that data can only be processed on the instructions of the controller/client, and (ii) any data processing instructions contained in the agreement. This AI field is designed to be used on data protection addenda and may generate false positives on other agreement types.

name: “Data Protection Authority” Definition
description: This AI field captures the definition of “Data Protection Authority” in the context of data protection.

name: Data Protection Impact Assessment
description: This AI field captures provisions relating to obtaining a “Data Protection Impact Assessment” in the context of data protection.

name: Data Protection/Privacy (Broad)
description: This AI field captures any provisions relating to protection of data, information security or privacy. This AI field is designed to be used to locate clauses embedded in broader agreements and is not recommended for use on detailed data protection agreements.

name: “Data Subject” Definition
description: This AI field captures the definition of “Data Subject” in the context of data protection.

name: Date
description: This AI field captures the date of an agreement.

name: Date — Bond Indenture
description: This AI field captures the date of a corporate debt security indenture, typically found on the cover page.

name: Datenschutz
description: Dieses AI Field erfasst Regelungen zum Datenschutz. Dieses AI Field ist für Anwendungsfälle in den Bereichen geistiges Eigentum und Arbeit gedacht und wurde auf Abgrenzungsvereinbarungen, Vorrechtsvereinbarungen, Kooperationsvertrag, Lizenzverträge, Markenübertragungsverträge, Markenkaufverträge, Patentübertragungsverträge, Softwareentwicklungsverträge, Softwareüberlassungsverträge, sonstige Verträge, Urheberrechtsverträge Arbeitsverträge, Geschäftsführerverträge, sonstige Verträge und Vorstandsverträge trainiert, die dem deutschen Recht unterliegen. Dieses AI Field wurde nicht von Zuva, sondern von CMS Hasche Sigle erstellt. Die letzte Aktualisierung erfolgte im 2021. Bitte beachten Sie, dass weder Zuva noch CMS Hasche Sigle verpflichtet sind, dieses AI Field zu aktualisieren oder zu warten.

name: Date of Articles/Bylaws/Amendment
description: This AI field captures the date of articles of incorporation, bylaws, and other documents associated with incorporation. To capture dates in other document types, the AI field "Date" should be used.

name: Date of Filing
description: This AI field captures the date of filing of the Uniform Commercial Code financing statement. It was trained on the standard UCC-1 forms. Redactions or poor font quality may impact the accuracy of this AI field.

name: Date (Quebec)
description: Ce champ AI enregistre la date du contrat qui se trouve généralement sur la première page. Il a été entraîné sur des ententes d'approvisionnement, des contrats de service, des contrats de distribution, des contrats de propriété intellectuelle, des contrats de travail et des contrats d'achat régis par les lois de la province de Québec.

name: Debtor 1 City
description: This AI field captures the city of the first debtor listed on the Uniform Commercial Code financing statement. It was trained on the standard UCC-1 forms. It will not capture party information from UCC1Ad, UCC1AP or UCC3. Redactions or poor font quality may impact the accuracy of this AI field.

name: Debtor 1 Country
description: This AI field captures the country of the first debtor listed on the Uniform Commercial Code financing statement. It was trained on the standard UCC-1 forms. It will not capture party information from UCC1Ad, UCC1AP or UCC3. Redactions or poor font quality may impact the accuracy of this AI field.

name: Debtor 1 First Name
description: This AI field captures the first name of the first debtor listed on the Uniform Commercial Code financing statement. It was trained on the standard UCC-1 forms. It will not capture party information from UCC1Ad, UCC1AP or UCC3. Redactions or poor font quality may impact the accuracy of this AI field.

name: Debtor 1 Last Name
description: This AI field captures the last name of the first debtor listed on the Uniform Commercial Code financing statement. It was trained on the standard UCC-1 forms. It will not capture party information from UCC1Ad, UCC1AP or UCC3. Redactions or poor font quality may impact the accuracy of this AI field.

name: Debtor 1 Mailing Address
description: This AI field captures the mailing address of the first debtor listed on the Uniform Commercial Code financing statement. It was trained on the standard UCC-1 forms. It will not capture party information from UCC1Ad, UCC1AP or UCC3. Redactions or poor font quality may impact the accuracy of this AI field.

name: Debtor 1 Middle Name
description: This AI field captures the middle name of the first debtor listed on the Uniform Commercial Code financing statement. It was trained on the standard UCC-1 forms. It will not capture party information from UCC1Ad, UCC1AP or UCC3. Redactions or poor font quality may impact the accuracy of this AI field.

name: Debtor 1 Organization Name
description: This AI field captures the organization name of the first debtor listed on the Uniform Commercial Code financing statement. It was trained on the standard UCC-1 forms. It will not capture party information from UCC1Ad, UCC1AP or UCC3. Redactions or poor font quality may impact the accuracy of this AI field.

name: Debtor 1 Postal Code
description: This AI field captures the postal code of the first debtor listed on the Uniform Commercial Code financing statement. It was trained on the standard UCC-1 forms. It will not capture party information from UCC1Ad, UCC1AP or UCC3. Redactions or poor font quality may impact the accuracy of this AI field.

name: Debtor 1 State
description: This AI field captures the state of the first debtor listed on the Uniform Commercial Code financing statement. It was trained on the standard UCC-1 forms. It will not capture party information from UCC1Ad, UCC1AP or UCC3. Redactions or poor font quality may impact the accuracy of this AI field.

name: Debtor 1 Suffix
description: This AI field captures the suffix of the first debtor listed on the Uniform Commercial Code financing statement. It was trained on the standard UCC-1 forms. It will not capture party information from UCC1Ad, UCC1AP or UCC3. Redactions or poor font quality may impact the accuracy of this AI field.

name: Debtor 2 City
description: This AI field captures the city of the second debtor listed on the Uniform Commercial Code financing statement. It was trained on the standard UCC-1 forms. It will not capture party information from UCC1Ad, UCC1AP or UCC3. Redactions or poor font quality may impact the accuracy of this AI field.

name: Debtor 2 Country
description: This AI field captures the country of the second debtor listed on the Uniform Commercial Code financing statement. It was trained on the standard UCC-1 forms. It will not capture party information from UCC1Ad, UCC1AP or UCC3. Redactions or poor font quality may impact the accuracy of this AI field.

name: Debtor 2 First Name
description: This AI field captures the first name of the second debtor listed on the Uniform Commercial Code financing statement. It was trained on the standard UCC-1 forms. It will not capture party information from UCC1Ad, UCC1AP or UCC3. Redactions or poor font quality may impact the accuracy of this AI field.

name: Debtor 2 Last Name
description: This AI field captures the last name of the second debtor listed on the Uniform Commercial Code financing statement. It was trained on the standard UCC-1 forms. It will not capture party information from UCC1Ad, UCC1AP or UCC3. Redactions or poor font quality may impact the accuracy of this AI field.

name: Debtor 2 Mailing Address
description: This AI field captures the mailing address of the second debtor listed on the Uniform Commercial Code financing statement. It was trained on the standard UCC-1 forms. It will not capture party information from UCC1Ad, UCC1AP or UCC3. Redactions or poor font quality may impact the accuracy of this AI field.

name: Debtor 2 Middle Name
description: This AI field captures the middle name of the second debtor listed on the Uniform Commercial Code financing statement. It was trained on the standard UCC-1 forms. It will not capture party information from UCC1Ad, UCC1AP or UCC3. Redactions or poor font quality may impact the accuracy of this AI field.

name: Debtor 2 Organization Name
description: This AI field captures the organization name of the second debtor listed on the Uniform Commercial Code financing statement. It was trained on the standard UCC-1 forms. It will not capture party information from UCC1Ad, UCC1AP or UCC3. Redactions or poor font quality may impact the accuracy of this AI field.

name: Debtor 2 Postal Code
description: This AI field captures the postal code of the second debtor listed on the Uniform Commercial Code financing statement. It was trained on the standard UCC-1 forms. It will not capture party information from UCC1Ad, UCC1AP or UCC3.Redactions or poor font quality may impact the accuracy of this AI field.

name: Debtor 2 State
description: This AI field captures the state of the second debtor listed on the Uniform Commercial Code financing statement. It was trained on the standard UCC-1 forms. It will not capture party information from UCC1Ad, UCC1AP or UCC3. Redactions or poor font quality may impact the accuracy of this AI field.

name: Debtor 2 Suffix
description: This AI field captures the suffix of the second debtor listed on the Uniform Commercial Code financing statement. It was trained on the standard UCC-1 forms. It will not capture party information from UCC1Ad, UCC1AP or UCC3. Redactions or poor font quality may impact the accuracy of this AI field.

name: Decoration
description: This AI field captures a tenant’s obligation to decorate under a lease.

name: Deemed Acceptance
description: This AI field captures when products or purchase orders will be deemed accepted.

name: Default for Breach
description: This AI field captures borrower default triggered by its failure to perform its obligations under the loan documents.

name: Default for Cessation of Business
description: This AI field captures borrower default triggered by it ceasing to carry on its business.

name: Default for Creditors’ Process — Equipment Lease
description: This AI field captures a default by a lessee as a result of any lien, encumbrance, attachment, etc. being placed on lessee’s property, including the leased property, or any expropriation, seizure, or analogous process.

name: Default for Cross Default/Acceleration
