description: This AI field captures borrower default triggered by a default or acceleration under another agreement.

name: Default for Inaccuracy of Representations/Misrepresentation
description: This AI field captures borrower default triggered by any inaccuracy or misrepresentation in the representations it provided.

name: Default for Insolvency
description: This AI field captures borrower default triggered by its insolvency.

name: Default for Invalidity/Unlawfulness
description: This AI field captures borrower default triggered by any invalidity of the loan documents, or in the event that it becomes unlawful for a borrower to perform its obligations under the agreement.

name: Default for Judgment/Creditors’ Process
description: This AI field captures borrower default for any judgment or order entered against it or any expropriation or analogous process.

name: Default for Non-Payment
description: This AI field captures borrower default triggered by its failure to pay any amounts due under the agreement.

name: Default for Pension Regulations Non-Compliance
description: This AI field captures borrower default triggered by its failure to comply with pension legislation including the U.S. Employee Retirement Income Security Act of 1974.

name: Defaulting Lender Approval
description: This AI field captures waivers, amendments and other actions where consent of any defaulting lender is still required.

name: “Defaulting Lender” Definition
description: This AI field captures the definitions of “Defaulting Lender” and “Non-Funding Lender”.

name: “Defaulting Lenders” Definition
description: This AI field captures the definition of “Defaulting Lenders”.

name: Defaulting Lender Waterfall
description: This AI field captures the application and priority of distribution of payments made for the account of a defaulting lender.

name: Default Interest
description: This AI field captures the interest rate applied to past due obligations of a tenant.

name: Default Interest — Commitment Letter
description: This AI field captures default interest provisions.

name: Default Interest — England
description: This AI field captures a tenant's obligation to pay interest on rent in arrears and late payments, late payments due to a landlord refusing rent as a result of a breach by the tenant, the rate of such interest, and the definitions of “Base Rate” and “Prescribed Rate”. This AI field does not capture interest on reviewed rent.

name: Default Interest/Interest on Overdue Amounts
description: This AI field captures provisions with respect to the payment of interest in the event that the borrower fails to make payments under the agreement.

name: Default or Termination for Bankruptcy/Insolvency
description: This AI field captures a default or right of termination triggered by a Tenant/Lessee’s insolvency or bankruptcy.

name: Deficit Restoration
description: This AI field captures any requirement of partners or members to restore a deficit or negative balance in their respective capital accounts.

name: Definição de Afiliada
description: Este campo de IA captura a definição de “Afiliada”, conforme frequentemente referida nas disposições que tratam de atribuição ou mudança de controle. Este campo de IA tem como objetivo auxiliar na due diligence de M&A no Brasil e foi treinado utilizando acordos de acionistas. Este campo de IA não foi criado por Zuva, mas sim por Machado Meyer e foi atualizado pela última vez em de 2021. Observe que nem Zuva nem Machado Meyer têm obrigação de atualizar ou manter este campo de IA.

name: Definição de Controle
description: Este campo de IA captura a definição de “Controle”, conforme frequentemente referido nas disposições que tratam da mudança de controle ou na definição de “Afiliadas”. Este campo de IA tem como objetivo auxiliar na due diligence de M&A no Brasil e foi treinado utilizando acordos de acionistas. Este campo de IA não foi criado por Zuva, mas sim por Machado Meyer e foi atualizado pela última vez em de 2021. Observe que nem Zuva nem Machado Meyer têm obrigação de atualizar ou manter este campo de IA.

name: Definição de Transferência
description: Este campo de IA capta o conceito de transferência direta e também indireta. Esta área de IA tem como objetivo auxiliar na due diligence de M&A no Brasil e foi treinada por meio de acordos de acionistas. Este campo de IA não foi criado por Zuva, mas sim por Machado Meyer e foi atualizado pela última vez em de 2021. Observe que nem Zuva nem Machado Meyer têm obrigação de atualizar ou manter este campo de IA.

name: Definitions and Inconsistency — ISDA
description: This AI field captures which definition sets are incorporated into the agreement, any amendments to those definitions, and which of the definitions prevail in the event of inconsistency in International Swaps and Derivatives Association agreements.

name: Definitions — Year
description: This AI field captures the year from which the definitions used in the schedule to the International Swaps and Derivatives Association master agreement are derived.

name: Delay or Omission Not Waiver
description: This AI field captures provisions specifying that a delay or omission by the trustee or any holder of the corporate debt securities in exercising its right or remedy maturing upon an event of default will not impair the right or remedy or constitute a waiver of, or acquiescence in, the event of default.

name: Delivery Amount
description: This AI field captures any modifications to the standard definition of “Delivery Amount” in the Credit Support Annexes for International Swaps and Derivatives Association agreements.

name: Demands and Notices — CSA
description: This AI field captures whether the parties have specified an address and other contact information for the purposes of receiving demands, specifications and notices in the Credit Support Annexes for International Swaps and Derivatives Association agreements.

name: Description of Equipment
description: This AI field captures the description of the leased property. This AI field is designed to be used in conjunction with the "“Equipment” Definition — Equipment Lease" AI field

name: Description of Premises
description: This AI field captures the description of the leased premises, including details about the building, suite, and/or floor numbers, the square footage and address of the premises, and certain appurtenances and reservations affecting the premises. This AI field does not capture the legal description of the premises. This AI field is designed to be used in conjunction with the "Address of Premises" and "Square Footage of Premises" AI fields.

name: Description of the Debt Securities/Amount Authorized
description: This AI field captures the title and principal amount, if provided, of corporate debt securities, and the maximum principal amount of debt authorized that may be issued pursuant to the indenture. This AI field does not capture the interest rate on corporate debt security indentures. The interest rate on corporate debt security indentures is captured by the "Interest Rate — Bond Indenture" AI field.

name: Designation of Restricted and Unrestricted Subsidiaries Covenant
description: This AI field captures a covenant concerning the issuer’s ability to designate subsidiaries as either restricted or unrestricted and the effect of such designation.

name: Devotion of Time
description: This AI field captures the extent to which the general partner or manager is required to devote time to overseeing the business and affairs of a limited partnership or limited liability company.

name: Devotion of Time/Charitable Activities
description: This AI field captures an employee's obligation to devote a certain amount of time and effort to their employment, and any permitted charitable activities.

name: Dienstwagenregelung
description: Dieses AI Field erfasst Regelungen zur Nutzung eines Dienstwagens während des Beschäftigungsverhältnisses. Dieses AI Field ist für arbeitsrechtliche Anwendungsfälle gedacht und wurde auf Arbeitsverträge, Geschäftsführerverträge, sonstige Verträge und Vorstandsverträge trainiert, die dem deutschen Recht unterliegen. Dieses AI Field wurde nicht von Zuva, sondern von CMS Hasche Sigle erstellt. Die letzte Aktualisierung erfolgte im 2018. Bitte beachten Sie, dass weder Zuva noch CMS Hasche Sigle verpflichtet sind, dieses AI Field zu aktualisieren oder zu warten.

name: DIP Financing
description: This AI field captures post-petition/debtor-in-possession financing provisions in intercreditor agreements, including the agreement by creditors not to object to other creditors providing such financing nor to the use of cash collateral for the purposes of such financing.

name: Director and Officer Insurance
description: This AI field captures the authority for a corporation to procure and maintain insurance coverage for directors and officers, against liabilities associated with these roles.

name: Direct or Indirect Assignment
description: This AI field captures provisions that restrict “direct or indirect” assignments.

name: Director Remuneration
description: This AI field captures director compensation, including the authority for establishing amounts or forms of compensation. This AI field does not capture any benefits a director is owed in relation to their indemnification by the corporation.

name: Directors Action by Written Consent
description: This AI field captures the directors’ right to act by written consent.

name: Directors’ and Officers’ Indemnification
description: This AI field captures a purchaser’s covenant to maintain existing indemnification protections for the directors and officers of a target company.

name: Directors' Meetings (Broad)
description: This AI field captures the general details concerning directors’ meetings, including requirements for giving notice.

name: Direito de Auditoria
description: Este campo de IA captura o direito de uma parte de auditar certas informações de outra parte. Este campo de IA tem como objetivo auxiliar na due diligence de M&A no Brasil e foi treinado utilizando acordos de acionistas. Este campo de IA não foi criado por Zuva, mas sim por Machado Meyer e foi atualizado pela última vez em de 2021. Observe que nem Zuva nem Machado Meyer têm obrigação de atualizar ou manter este campo de IA.

name: Direito de Preferência e Direito de Primeira Oferta
description: Este campo de IA captura direitos de preferência ou direitos de primeira oferta. Este campo de IA tem como objetivo auxiliar na due diligence de M&A no Brasil e foi treinado utilizando acordos de acionistas. Este campo de IA não foi criado por Zuva, mas sim por Machado Meyer e foi atualizado pela última vez em de 2021. Observe que nem Zuva nem Machado Meyer têm obrigação de atualizar ou manter este campo de IA.

name: Discharge of Debt Security
description: This AI field captures discharge requirements that, if satisfied, relieve an issuer’s obligation to comply with any provision of an indenture, including payment obligations. This provision is typically effective when the corporate debt securities are coming due within one year.

name: Disclaimer of Liability — Loss of Data
description: This AI field captures provisions relating to loss of data, including limitation of liability for loss of data.

name: Disclaimer of Warranties — Equipment Lease
description: This AI field captures a lessor’s disclaimer of warranty with respect to the quality, condition, merchantability, suitability, etc. of the leased equipment.

name: Disclaimer of Warranty
description: This AI field captures provisions that disclaim all service/product warranties in an agreement, including provisions that state a product will be in “as is” condition.

name: “Disclosure Letter/Disclosure Schedules” Definition
description: This AI field captures the definition of "Disclosure Letter" or "Disclosure Schedules".

name: Disclosure Required by Law
description: This AI field captures exceptions to restrictions on the use and disclosure of confidential information where such use or disclosure is required by law.

name: Discounts
description: This AI field captures provisions relating to discounts, credits, rebates and preferential pricing.

name: Dispositions or Asset Sales Covenant
description: This AI field captures covenants of a borrower not to dispose of assets other than in the ordinary course and the definition of “Permitted Dispositions” or any exceptions to the definition of “Asset Sale”.

name: Dispute Resolution
description: This AI field captures the procedures for dispute resolution in an agreement.

name: “Disqualified Institutions” Definition
description: This AI field captures the definitions of “Disqualified Institution” or “Ineligible Institution”.

name: “Disqualified Lenders” Definition
description: This AI field captures the definition of “Disqualified Lenders”.

name: “Disqualified Stock” Definition
description: This AI field captures the definition of “Disqualified Stock”.

name: “Disqualified Stock” Definition — Bond Indenture
description: This AI field captures the definitions of “Disqualified Stock”, “Redeemable Stock”, and similar terms in Indentures.

name: Distribution of Property on Liquidation
description: This AI field captures the final distribution waterfall on the liquidation, dissolution or winding up of a limited partnership or limited liability company, the liquidator’s right, if any, to distribute property in kind to the partners/members, and liquidation preferences of any class or series of interests in the partnership/company.

name: Distributions of Cash
description: This AI field captures the manner in which available cash and proceeds of sale, where applicable, is to be distributed among the partners/members, including distribution rights of particular classes or series of partnership/company interests, and special cash distributions to partners or members where regular distributions for the year would be insufficient to cover their applicable income tax liability in respect of partnership or company income allocated to them.

name: Dividends and Distributions
description: This AI field captures dividend and distribution policies, including approval requirements for issuing dividends or distributions. This AI field is intended to be used on Shareholders' Agreements. To capture dividends and distributions within Articles and Bylaws, the Dividends and Distributions — Articles & Bylaws AI field should be used.

name: Dividends and Distributions — Articles & Bylaws
description: This AI field captures dividend and distribution policies, including approval requirements for issuing dividends or distributions. This AI field is intended to be used on Articles and Bylaws. To capture dividends and distributions within Shareholders' Agreements, the Dividends and Distributions AI field should be used.

name: Documentation Principles
description: This AI field captures the documentation principles applicable to a credit facility.

name: Document Delivery
description: This AI field captures which documents are to be delivered and how they are to be delivered with respect to each party in International Swaps and Derivatives Association agreements.

name: Dodd-Frank Compliance
description: This AI field captures a party's obligation to comply with the U.S. Dodd–Frank Wall Street Reform and Consumer Protection Act.

name: Does a party have a right to make copies of relevant documentation during an audit?
description: This AI field answers the question of whether a party is permitted to make copies of documents during an audit.

name: Does the agreement auto renew?
description: This AI field answers the question of whether the agreement renews automatically.

name: Does the agreement contain a right to increase prices during the term?
description: This AI field answers the question of whether a party has a right to increase prices during the term of an agreement.

name: Does the audited party have to fully cooperate during onsite audits?
description: This AI field answers the questions of whether a party is required to fully cooperate during onsite audits.

name: Does the definition of "Representatives" include advisors?
description: This AI field answers the question of whether the definition of "Representatives" in Non-Disclosure Agreements includes advisors.

name: Does the definition of "Representatives" include attorneys?
description: This AI field answers the question of whether the definition of "Representatives" in Non-Disclosure Agreements includes attorneys.

name: Do Not Sell Personal Information
description: This AI field captures affirmative disclosures that must be made by a business that sells consumers' personal information to third parties, as required by the California Consumer Privacy Act (“CCPA”), including notices to consumers about whether the business sells personal information, the right for consumers to opt-out of the sale of their personal information, and references/links to the business’ “Do Not Sell My Personal Information” page. This AI field does not capture the categories of personal information in the event that such information is sold.

name: Drag Along Rights
description: This AI field captures drag along rights, being the right of a selling shareholder to require a minority shareholder to sell its shares.

name: Duration
description: This AI field captures the length of the initial term of an agreement.

name: Duration of Guaranteed Compensation/Benefits
description: This AI field captures a period after closing during which the purchaser has committed to providing compensation and benefits to certain continuing target employees. This AI field should be used in conjunction with "Post-Closing Compensation/Benefits" AI field.

name: Durée et renouvellement
description: Ce champ AI enregistre la période initiale du contrat ainsi que les prorogations ou les renouvelemments. Il a été entraîné sur des ententes d'approvisionnement, des contrats de service, des contrats de distribution, des contrats de propriété intellectuelle, des contrats de travail et des contrats d'achat régis par les lois de la province de Québec.

name: Duties and Rights of Trustee
description: This AI field captures the duties and rights of the indenture trustee.

name: Duty to Investigate/Monitor/Assist Upon Breach
description: This AI field captures a party's obligation to investigate, assist with, or mitigate harm from any potential breaches of data security.

name: Duty to Mitigate
description: This AI field captures a requirement that a party must take steps to mitigate its losses upon becoming aware of the event causing such losses.

name: Early Payment Discount
description: This AI field captures discounts for early payments.

name: “EBITDA” Definition
description: This AI field captures various definitions related to the calculation of earnings before interest, tax and amortization.

name: “EBITDA” Definition — Bond Indenture
description: This AI field captures the definition of “EBITDA” (earnings before interest, taxes, depreciation and amortization) and similar terms in Indentures.

name: ECP Keepwell Provision
description: This AI field captures an undertaking by eligible contract participant guarantors to fulfill the obligations of other guarantors, which would otherwise be excluded under the U.S. Commodity Exchange Act rules and similar rules.

name: “EEA Financial Institution” Definition
description: This AI field captures the definition of “EEA Financial Institution” for the purposes of the bail-in rules under the EU Bank Recovery and Resolution Directive (2014/59/EU).

name: EEA Financial Institution Representation
description: This smart field captures representations that a loan party/obligor is not an EEA Financial Institution for the purposes of the bail-in rules under the EU Bank Recovery and Resolution Directive (2014/59/EU).

name: Efeitos da Rescisão
description: Este campo de IA captura os efeitos e consequências da rescisão do contrato. Este campo de IA tem como objetivo auxiliar na due diligence de M&A no Brasil e foi treinado utilizandos contratos de fornecimento, franquia, prestação de serviços, financiamento, compra e venda, locação e acordo de acionistas. Este campo de IA não foi criado por Zuva, mas sim por Machado Meyer e foi atualizado pela última vez em de 2021. Observe que nem Zuva nem Machado Meyer têm obrigação de atualizar ou manter este campo de IA.

name: Effective Date
description: This AI field captures the definition of "effective date" or "commencement date".

name: Effective Date — Franchise Disclosure Document
description: This AI field captures the effective date(s) of the franchise disclosure document.

name: “Effective Time” Definition
description: This AI field captures the definition of the "Effective Time".

name: Effects of Termination
description: This AI field captures the effects or consequences of terminating an agreement, including a requirement to migrate or transition products or services, obligations regarding confidential information and documents, and payment of termination fees.

name: Efforts Standard Applicable to Closing Conditions
description: This AI field captures the efforts standard required in the covenant to satisfy the closing conditions of an agreement.

name: Efforts Standard Applicable to Obtaining Antitrust Approval
description: This AI field captures the efforts standard required in the covenant to obtain antitrust approval for a transaction.

name: Efforts Standard Applicable to Obtaining Financing
description: This smart field captures the efforts standard required in the covenant to obtain financing and alternative financing for a transaction.

name: Eigentumsvorbehalt
description: Dieses AI Field erfasst Regelungen zum Eigentumsvorbehalt. Dieses AI Field ist für die Anwendungsfälle Commercial gedacht und wurde auf Einkaufsbedingungen, Handelsvertreterverträge, Kaufverträge, Kooperationsverträge, Lieferbedingungen, Lieferverträge, Rahmenvereinbarungen, Verkaufsbedingungen, Vertriebsverträge und Werkverträge trainiert, die dem deutschen Recht unterliegen. Dieses AI Field wurde nicht von Zuva, sondern von CMS Hasche Sigle erstellt. Die letzte Aktualisierung erfolgte im 2017. Bitte beachten Sie, dass weder Zuva noch CMS Hasche Sigle verpflichtet sind, dieses AI Field zu aktualisieren oder zu warten.

name: Einziehung
description: Dieses AI Field erfasst Regelungen zur Einziehung von Gesellschaftsanteilen durch die Gesellschaft bzw. Ausschluss von Gesellschaftern. Dieses AI Field ist für die Anwendungsfälle Corporate M&A gedacht und wurde auf Gesellschaftsverträge, Gesellschaftervereinbarungen, Joint Venture Agreements, Beherrschungsverträge, Geschäftsführerverträge und Vorstandsverträge trainiert, die dem deutschen Recht unterliegen. Dieses AI Field wurde nicht von Zuva, sondern von CMS Hasche Sigle erstellt. Die letzte Aktualisierung erfolgte im 2017. Bitte beachten Sie, dass weder Zuva noch CMS Hasche Sigle verpflichtet sind, dieses AI Field zu aktualisieren oder zu warten.

name: Elective Termination
description: This AI field captures circumstances in which either or both parties may elect to terminate the transaction in International Swaps and Derivatives Association agreements.

name: Electronic Signature
description: This AI field captures instances where electronically delivered signed documents are deemed original signatures. It also captures the permitting of electronic signatures.

name: Eligibility to Hold Posted Collateral and Custodians
description: This AI field captures the conditions imposed on a secured party before it is entitled to hold, or to appoint a custodian to hold, collateral in the Credit Support Annexes for International Swaps and Derivatives Association agreements.

name: “Eligible Accounts” Definition
description: This AI field captures the definitions of “Eligible Accounts” or “Eligible Receivables” typically referenced in the borrowing base formula for asset-based loans.

name: Eligible Assignees
description: This AI field captures the parties to which a lender may assign a loan.

name: Eligible Claim Threshold
description: This AI field captures indemnification provisions that require that an individual loss, or a series of related losses, exceed a specified threshold before a claim can be made.

name: Eligible Collateral/Eligible Credit Support
description: This AI field captures the types of collateral that are acceptable for the purposes of the Credit Support Annexes for International Swaps and Derivatives Association agreements.

name: Eligible Contract Participant Representation
description: This AI field captures representations that a party is an “eligible contract participant” within the meaning of the U.S. Commodity Exchange Act in International Swaps and Derivatives Association agreements.

name: Eligible Currency
description: This AI field captures the currencies (including the “Base Currency”) in which cash collateral may be denominated in the Credit Support Annexes for International Swaps and Derivatives Association agreements.

name: “Eligible Equipment” Definition
description: This AI field captures the definition of “Eligible Equipment” typically referenced in the borrowing base formula for asset-based loans.

name: “Eligible Inventory” Definition
description: This AI field captures the definition of “Eligible Inventory” typically referenced in the borrowing base formula for asset-based loans.

name: “Eligible Real Estate” Definition
description: This AI field captures the definition of “Eligible Real Estate” typically referenced in the borrowing base formula for asset-based loans, and separately defined real estate eligibility requirements.

name: Email Contact at Filer
description: This AI field captures the email contact at the filer of the Uniform Commercial Code financing statement. It was trained on the standard UCC-1 forms. Redactions or poor font quality may impact the accuracy of this AI field.

name: Employee Benefits — Car
description: This AI field captures an employee’s entitlement to a car/gas allowance provided by an employer.

name: Employee Benefits — Health/Dental/Retirement/Pension
description: This AI field captures an employee’s entitlement to health, dental, retirement, and pension benefits, including on termination of employment. This AI field also captures an employee’s entitlement to be covered by an employer’s director and officer liability insurance.

name: Employee Benefits — Vacation/Leave
description: This AI field captures an employee’s entitlement to vacation and other leaves of absences.

name: Employee Disability
description: This AI field captures provisions relating to an employee’s disability, including how the employee will be compensated if disabled. This AI field captures related definitions.

name: Employee Duties
description: This AI field captures provisions that outline an employee’s duties and responsibilities in the course of his/her employment.

name: Employee Equity Clawback
description: This AI field captures an employer's right to clawback equity previously granted to an employee.

name: Employee Name
description: This AI field captures an employee's name.

name: Employment and Labor Representation
description: This AI field captures representations with respect to employment and labor matters.

name: “Encumbrance” Definition
description: This AI field captures the definition of "Encumbrance" or "Lien".

name: End Date
description: This AI field captures the end date of the initial term of an agreement and events that trigger an end date contained in the term provision.

name: End of Employment & Termination
description: This AI field captures provisions detailing the effects that an option holder’s end of employment will have on the vesting and exercisability of the stock option. These effects may include forfeiture, accelerated vesting and/or revised exercisability periods. For the purpose of this AI field, “end of employment” shall include formal termination (e.g. with or without cause) as well other forms of employment cessation (e.g. disability, death, retirement, etc.).

name: End of Life
description: This AI field captures a party’s obligations with respect to the end of life of a product/service.

name: End of Term Obligations
description: This AI field captures a tenant's obligations at the end of the lease term, including (i) the yield up/reinstatement clause, (ii) reinstatement of alterations, additions and signs, and (iii) end of term repair obligations. This AI field does not capture end of term obligations relating to delivery of Construction, Design and Management files, land registry filings and health and safety files.

name: Enforcement and Defense
description: This AI field captures provisions relating to the enforcement and defence of intellectual property. It includes who has rights to defend and settle third party claims and the enforcement of intellectual property against third party infringement. It does not include references to defending claims in indemnification provisions, severability clauses, or representations and warranties regarding enforceability.

name: Entire Agreement
description: This AI field captures an acknowledgment by the parties to an agreement that it represents the complete and final agreement between them.

name: Environmental Indemnity
description: This AI field captures express indemnities by a party relating to environmental issues. This AI field is designed to be used in conjunction with the “Indemnification” AI field.

name: “Environmental Reports” Definition
description: This AI field captures the definition of "Environmental Reports" as part of the transaction.

name: Environmental Representation
description: This AI field captures representations with respect to environmental matters.

name: Environmental Representation — Credit Agreement
description: This AI field captures a borrower's representations with respect to environmental matters.

name: “Equipment” Definition
description: This AI field captures the definitions of “Equipment” or “Fixtures”.

name: “Equipment” Definition — Equipment Lease
description: This AI field captures the definition of “Equipment”, including common variations on such term. This AI field is designed to be used in conjunction with the "Description of Equipment — Equipment Lease" AI field.

name: Equitable Relief
description: This AI field captures whether a party has the right to seek injunctive or equitable relief.

name: Equity Clawback Redemption Provision
description: This AI field captures the provision allowing the issuer to redeem a portion of the debt issued pursuant to corporate debt security indentures with the proceeds of an equity offer.

name: Equity Cure Rights
description: This AI field captures rights of a borrower to cure a breach of the financial covenants with an equity injection.

name: Erfüllungsort
description: Dieses AI Field erfasst Regelungen zum Erfüllungsort. Dieses AI Field ist für die Anwendungsfälle Intellectual Property gedacht und wurde auf gewerbliche Mietverträge und Änderungsverträge trainiert, die dem deutschen Recht unterliegen. Dieses AI Field wurde nicht von Zuva, sondern von CMS Hasche Sigle erstellt. Die letzte Aktualisierung erfolgte im 2018. Bitte beachten Sie, dass weder Zuva noch CMS Hasche Sigle verpflichtet sind, dieses AI Field zu aktualisieren oder zu warten.

name: ERISA Representation
description: This AI field captures representations with respect to a party’s status under the Employee Retirement Income Security Act of 1974 (“ERISA”) and the U.S. Internal Revenue Code of 1986 (“Code”), including that such party is (i) not an “employee benefit plan” or other type of plan for the purposes of ERISA or the Code, (ii) not acting on behalf of such a plan, and (iii) not holding assets that are “plan assets” for the purposes of ERISA in International Swaps and Derivatives Association agreements.

name: Ersatzteillieferung
description: Dieses AI Field umfasst Verpflichtungen über die Ersatzteilversorgung. Dieses AI Field ist für die Anwendungsfälle Commercial gedacht und wurde auf Einkaufsbedingungen, Handelsvertreterverträge, Kaufverträge, Kooperationsverträge, Lieferbedingungen, Lieferverträge, Rahmenvereinbarungen, Verkaufsbedingungen, Vertriebsverträge und Werkverträge trainiert, die dem deutschen Recht unterliegen. Dieses AI Field wurde nicht von Zuva, sondern von CMS Hasche Sigle erstellt. Die letzte Aktualisierung erfolgte im 2017. Bitte beachten Sie, dass weder Zuva noch CMS Hasche Sigle verpflichtet sind, dieses AI Field zu aktualisieren oder zu warten.

name: Escrow
description: This AI field captures escrow provisions, pursuant to which funds are held by a third party in order to secure indemnification obligations.

name: Escrow Account
description: This AI field captures the definition of the type of account that escrow funds are to be held in.

name: “Escrow Agent” Definition
description: This AI field captures the definition of "Escrow Agent".

name: “Escrow Agreement” Definition
description: This AI field captures the definition of "Escrow Agreement".

name: Escrow Amount
description: This AI field captures the amount that is deposited into escrow with respect to a transaction.

name: Estoppel Certificate Requirements
description: This AI field captures an obligation of a tenant or landlord to provide an estoppel certificate.

name: “European Union” Definition
description: This AI field captures the definition of "European Union".

name: Events of Default — Bond Indenture
description: This AI field captures events of default when an issuer violates a provision of an indenture and does not cure such violation within the requisite time period.

name: Events of Default — Commitment Letter
description: This AI field captures a borrower’s events of default.

name: Events of Default — CSA
description: This AI field captures modifications to the standard language as to what constitutes an event of default in the Credit Support Annexes for International Swaps and Derivatives Association agreements.

name: Events of Default — Equipment Lease
description: This AI field captures the events of default provision in a lease.

name: Events of Default — ISDA
description: This AI field captures what events would cause a default under the International Swaps and Derivatives Association master agreement.

name: Events of Default — Lease
description: This AI field captures specified tenant “events of default” or other tenant defaults giving rise to a landlord’s right to terminate the lease.

name: Events of Default (or Termination) — Commercial Agreements
description: This AI field captures the events of default in commercial agreements, including certain events (primarily material breach and insolvency) giving rise to a right of termination.

name: Events of Dissolution
description: This AI field captures events causing the dissolution or termination of a limited partnership or limited liability company.

name: Evidence of Loans
description: This AI field captures a lender's obligation to maintain records evidencing the indebtedness.

name: “Excess Availability” Definition
description: This AI field captures the definitions of “Excess Availability”, “Availability” and similar definitions setting out the amount available to be borrowed under an asset-based loan.

name: Excess Nonrecourse Liabilities
description: This AI field captures provisions relating to the determination of a partner or member’s share of excess nonrecourse liabilities.

name: Exchange Rate/Exchange Rate Risk
description: This AI field captures provisions relating to the exchange rate of foreign currencies and currency fluctuations.

name: “Excluded Subsidiary” Definition
description: This AI field captures the definition of “Excluded Subsidiary”.

name: “Excluded Swap Obligation” Definition
description: This AI field captures the definition of “Excluded Swap Obligations” in the context of the Commodity Exchange Act rules and similar rules.

name: “Excluded Taxes” Definition
description: This AI field captures the definition of “Excluded Taxes”.

name: Exclusive Remedy
description: This AI field captures limitations on the types of remedies a party can seek in the event of a breach of a purchase agreement.

name: Exclusividade
description: Este campo de IA captura cláusulas de exclusividade de modo geral. Este campo de IA tem como objetivo auxiliar na due diligence de M&A no Brasil e foi treinado utilizandos contratos de concessão, franquia, prestação de serviços, fornecimento, arrendamento, parceria, compra e venda, acordos de acionistas e SPA's. Este campo de IA não foi criado por Zuva, mas sim por Machado Meyer e foi atualizado pela última vez em de 2021. Observe que nem Zuva nem Machado Meyer têm obrigação de atualizar ou manter este campo de IA.

name: Exclusivity
description: This AI field captures grants of exclusive rights, including exclusive distribution rights, exclusive licenses, the obligation to purchase all of a party’s requirements for a product or service from the other party, and prohibitions against selling products or services to competitors.

name: Execution of Documents/Authority to Bind Corporation
description: This AI field captures the authority to execute documents which create external obligations to third parties, and the authority to affix the corporate seal to documents memorializing such external obligations. This AI field does not capture signing authority for internal corporate documents.

name: Exercise Price
description: This AI field captures the price at which the stock option may be exercised. This will not capture total exercise price, only exercise price per share.

name: Existence, Permits and Authorization Covenant
description: This AI field captures covenants of a borrower to maintain its existence, obtain and maintain any permits necessary to conduct its business and obtain any authorizations necessary for it to perform its obligations under the agreement.

name: Existing Debt/Refinancing Condition
description: This AI field captures conditions of borrowing with respect to existing debt of the borrower.

name: Existing Debt Representation
description: This AI field captures representations that there is no existing debt or that any existing debt has been disclosed.

name: Expense Reimbursement
description: This AI field captures expenses that are reimbursable by an employer. This AI field does not capture car-related expenses. Car-related expenses are captured by the Employee Benefits — Car AI field.

name: Expiration Date — Lease
description: This AI field captures the date on which a lease or renewal term of a lease expires.

name: Expiration Date — Option Agreements
description: This AI field captures the specific expiry date of a stock option, if defined, as well as the time period within which the stock option must be exercised before expiring. This AI field will not capture provisions covering early expiration as a result of termination, end of employment or other acceleration events (e.g. change of control).

name: Export Control
description: This AI field captures a party’s obligation to comply with laws prohibiting or restricting the export of products.

name: Exposure
description: This AI field captures modifications to the standard definition of “Exposure" in the Credit Support Annexes for International Swaps and Derivatives Association agreements.

name: Express Non-Reliance
description: This AI field captures the parties’ acknowledgment that the representations and warranties in an agreement are the only representations and warranties that the parties relied on in entering into the agreement.

name: Facility Fee
description: This AI field captures fees payable on a revolving commitment.

name: Fair Market Rent
description: This AI field captures the definition of “Fair Market Rent” and similar terms in a lease, as well as the process by which a rental rate based upon fair market rent is calculated or disputed under the lease.

name: “FATCA” Definition
description: This AI field captures the definition of “FATCA”.

name: Fees and Expenses
description: This AI field captures fees and expenses under a lease that the lessee (and, if applicable, the lessor) has agreed to pay. It is recommended that this AI field be used in conjunction with the "Reimbursement — Lease Accounting" AI field.

name: Fiduciary Out
description: This AI field captures a target board of directors’ right to change its recommendation or otherwise take action in response to a superior proposal or an intervening event where failure to do so would be inconsistent with its fiduciary duties and/or applicable law.

name: Fiduciary Termination Right
description: This AI field captures a board of directors’ right to terminate a contemplated transaction in response to a superior proposal or an intervening event where failure to do so would be inconsistent with its fiduciary duties and/or applicable law.

name: File Number
description: This AI field captures the file number of the Uniform Commercial Code financing statement. It was trained on the standard UCC-1 forms. Redactions or poor font quality may impact the accuracy of this AI field.

name: Filiale
description: Ce champ AI enregistre la définition de la filiale qui est généralement référée dans les dispositions relatives aux cessions de contrat ou au changement de contrôle. Il a été entraîné sur des ententes d'approvisionnement, des contrats de service, des contrats de distribution, des contrats de propriété intellectuelle, des contrats de travail et des contrats d'achat régis par les lois de la province de Québec.

name: Financial Covenant — Fixed Charge Coverage Ratio
description: This AI field captures fixed charge ratio financial covenants.

name: Financial Covenant — Interest/Debt Service Coverage Ratio
description: This AI field captures interest cover ratio and debt service ratio financial covenants.

name: Financial Covenant — Leverage Ratio
description: This AI field captures leverage ratio financial covenants for various forms of leverage ratios including, without limitation, debt to equity, debt to EBITDA, debt to total assets, and debt to capitalization.

name: Financial Covenants
description: This AI field captures financial covenants of a borrower.

name: Financial Covenants — Credit Agreement
description: This AI field captures a borrower’s financial covenants, including maintenance of leverage or coverage ratios.

name: Financial Information Condition
description: This AI field captures conditions of borrowing with respect to delivering financial information.

name: Financial Reports
description: This AI field captures an obligation of the general partner or manager to provide partners or members with periodic financial reports.

name: Financial Statements and Information Reporting Covenant
description: This AI field captures covenants of a borrower to deliver financial statements and other information to the lenders or agents.

name: Financial Statements Covenant — Lease
description: This AI field captures a tenant's obligations to deliver financial statements to the landlord, including requirements to deliver financial statements in connection with the exercise of certain options under a lease or the calculation of percentage rent. This AI field does not capture a landlord's right to inspect books and records or detail the types of financial statements or accounting methods that a tenant must use, or capture representations about any financial statements.

name: Financial Statements Representation
description: This AI field captures representations with respect to a party’s financial statements.

name: Financial Statements Representation — Credit Agreement
description: This AI field captures a borrower's representations that the financial statements fairly present its financial condition and have been prepared in accordance with GAAP.

name: Fiscal/Financial Year
description: This AI field captures the establishment of a corporation’s fiscal year-end and the authority for a particular party to establish or alter the fiscal year-end.

name: Fiscal/Tax Year of Partnership/Company
description: This AI field captures the fiscal year and, if applicable, tax year of a limited partnership or limited liability company.

name: Fixe Vergütung
description: Dieses AI Field erfasst Sämtliche Vergütungsbestandteile eines AN. Dieses AI Field ist für arbeitsrechtliche Anwendungsfälle gedacht und wurde auf Arbeitsverträge, Geschäftsführerverträge, sonstige Verträge und Vorstandsverträge trainiert, die dem deutschen Recht unterliegen. Dieses AI Field wurde nicht von Zuva, sondern von CMS Hasche Sigle erstellt. Die letzte Aktualisierung erfolgte im 2017. Bitte beachten Sie, dass weder Zuva noch CMS Hasche Sigle verpflichtet sind, dieses AI Field zu aktualisieren oder zu warten.

name: Flächenberechnung/Flächenabweichung
description: Dieses AI Field umfasst die Berechnung der Mietfläche und Rechte der Parteien bei einer Abweichung. Dieses AI Field ist für die Anwendungsfälle Real Estate gedacht und wurde auf gewerbliche Mietverträge und Änderungsverträge trainiert, die dem deutschen Recht unterliegen. Dieses AI Field wurde nicht von Zuva, sondern von CMS Hasche Sigle erstellt. Die letzte Aktualisierung erfolgte im 2018. Bitte beachten Sie, dass weder Zuva noch CMS Hasche Sigle verpflichtet sind, dieses AI Field zu aktualisieren oder zu warten.

name: Força Maior
description: Este campo de IA captura as consequências contratuais de uma força maior ou ocorrência extraordinária. Este campo de IA tem como objetivo auxiliar na due diligence de M&A no Brasil e foi treinado utilizandos contratos de fornecimento, franquia, prestação de serviços, financiamento, compra e venda, locação e acordo de acionistas. Este campo de IA não foi criado por Zuva, mas sim por Machado Meyer e foi atualizado pela última vez em de 2021. Observe que nem Zuva nem Machado Meyer têm obrigação de atualizar ou manter este campo de IA.

name: Force Majeure
description: This AI field captures the consequences of a force majeure or extraordinary occurrence.

name: Force Majeure — Acts of Government
description: This AI field captures actions and/or omissions of government that qualify as force majeure events. This AI field is designed to be used in conjunction with the "Force Majeure" AI field.

name: Force Majeure — Bond Indenture
description: This AI field captures a Force Majeure clause that provides that an indenture trustee will not be responsible or liable for any failure or delay in the performance of its obligations caused by forces beyond its reasonable control.

name: Force Majeure — Catch-All Language
description: This AI field captures catch-all language in force majeure provisions that broadens the scope of force majeure events beyond the specific events listed. This AI field is designed to be used in conjunction with the "Force Majeure" AI field.

name: Force Majeure (Deutschland)
description: Dieses AI Field umfasst Regelungen in Fällen höherer Gewalt, die die Vertragsparteien ganz oder teilweise an der Erfüllung ihrer Verpflichtungen hindern. Dieses AI Field ist für Anwendungsfälle im Immobilien-, Gewerbe- und Arbeitsbereich vorgesehen und wurde auf gewerbliche Mietverträge, Änderungsverträge, Einkaufsbedingungen, Handelsvertreterverträge, Kaufverträge, Kooperationsverträge, Lieferbedingungen, Lieferverträge, Rahmenvereinbarungen, Verkaufsbedingungen, Vertriebsverträge, Werkverträge, Arbeitsverträge, Geschäftsführerverträge, sonstige Verträge und Vorstandsverträge trainiert, die dem deutschen Recht unterliegen. Dieses AI Field wurde nicht von Zuva, sondern von CMS Hasche Sigle erstellt. Die letzte Aktualisierung erfolgte im 2019. Bitte beachten Sie, dass weder Zuva noch CMS Hasche Sigle verpflichtet sind, dieses AI Field zu aktualisieren oder zu warten.

name: Force Majeure — Exceptions
description: This AI field captures specific exceptions to force majeure events.  This AI field is designed to be used in conjunction with the "Force Majeure" AI field.

name: Force Majeure — Lease
description: This AI field captures force majeure clauses and other provisions excusing performance of a covenant when performance is out of the control of the party to perform. This AI field is not intended to be used on document types other than Leases. To capture force majeure clauses in other document types, the "Force Majeure" AI field should be used.

name: Force Majeure — Notification Requirements
description: This AI field captures notification requirements that a party must follow when a force majeure event has occurred. This AI field is designed to be used in conjunction with the "Force Majeure" AI field.

name: Force Majeure — Public Health Events
description: This AI field captures qualifying public health events such as epidemic, quarantine, and other health emergencies. This AI field is designed to be used in conjunction with the "Force Majeure" AI field.

name: Force Majeure (Quebec)
description: Ce champ AI enregistre les dispositions qui sont prises en cas de force majeure ou de circonstances exceptionnelles. Il a été entraîné sur des ententes d'approvisionnement, des contrats de service, des contrats de distribution, des contrats de propriété intellectuelle, des contrats de travail et des contrats d'achat régis par les lois de la province de Québec.

name: Foreign Corrupt Practices Act Compliance
description: This AI field captures a party’s obligation to comply with the U.S. Foreign Corrupt Practices Act ("FCPA").

name: Forfeiture/Events of Default
description: This AI field captures a landlord's right to forfeit a lease by re-entering the premises upon the occurrence of qualifying factors. This AI field also captures the definitions of “Insolvency” and “Event of Insolvency”.

name: Formation of Partnership/Company
description: This AI field captures information regarding the formation of a limited partnership or limited liability company.

name: Foro
description: Este campo de IA captura o local em que o litígio relacionado a um acordo deve ocorrer. Este campo de IA tem como objetivo auxiliar na due diligence de M&A no Brasil e foi treinado utilizando contratos de concessão, franquia, fornecimento, locação, prestação de serviços, parceria, compra e venda, comerciais, financeiros, societários e acordo de acionistas. Este campo de IA não foi criado por Zuva, mas sim por Machado Meyer e foi atualizado pela última vez em de 2021. Observe que nem Zuva nem Machado Meyer têm obrigação de atualizar ou manter este campo de IA.

name: Forum Selection/Dispute Resolution
description: This AI field captures forum selection provisions and procedures for dispute resolution. This AI field is intended to be used on Articles and Bylaws. To capture forum selection provisions and procedures for dispute resolution within other document types, the AI fields "Venue" and "Dispute Resolution" should be used.

name: “Franchised Business” Definition
description: This AI field captures the definition of the business that is covered under the franchise arrangement.

name: Franchisee Standard
description: This AI field captures the standard that the franchisee must uphold with respect to the operation, development, and promotion of the franchise.

name: Franchise Location
description: This AI field captures the location of the franchised establishment (if applicable).

name: Franchise Manual
description: This AI field captures the definitions and other related provisions that pertain to the franchise operations manual, which governs the franchise unit performance, procedures and conduct.

name: Franchise Marketing Obligations
description: This AI field captures provisions relating to requirements for marketing the franchised business.

name: “Franchise System” Definition
description: This AI field captures the definition of "Franchise System" and related language detailing what comprises the Franchise System.

name: Franchise Territory
description: This AI field captures the territory in which the franchisee may operate the franchised business. It also captures the area in which the franchisee may locate the franchised business.

name: Franchise Training Requirements
description: This AI field captures provisions relating to training requirements expected of both the franchisee and franchisor.

name: Freedom from Discrimination
description: This AI field captures affirmative disclosures to consumers of their right to be free from discrimination for exercising their privacy rights, as required by the California Consumer Privacy Act (“CCPA”).

name: Free Rent Period
description: This AI field captures a free rent period expressed as an affirmative right or credit. This AI field does not capture abatements that are only expressed within a rent table.

name: Freistellung
description: Dieses AI Field erfasst Regelungen zur Freistellung des AN. Dieses AI Field ist für arbeitsrechtliche Anwendungsfälle gedacht und wurde auf Arbeitsverträge, Geschäftsführerverträge, sonstige Verträge und Vorstandsverträge trainiert, die dem deutschen Recht unterliegen. Dieses AI Field wurde nicht von Zuva, sondern von CMS Hasche Sigle erstellt. Die letzte Aktualisierung erfolgte im 2018. Bitte beachten Sie, dass weder Zuva noch CMS Hasche Sigle verpflichtet sind, dieses AI Field zu aktualisieren oder zu warten.

name: Full Disclosure/No Misleading Information Representation
description: This AI field captures a borrower's representations that all factual information provided by it to the lenders or agents is true and complete in all material respects.

name: Full Disclosure/No Misleading Statements Representation
description: This AI field captures representations that a party has not made any untrue statements of material fact or omitted to state a material fact necessary in order to make statements made not misleading, either in an agreement or in other disclosure documents and communications.

name: Fundamental Changes/Merger Covenant
description: This AI field captures covenants of a borrower not to enter into any amalgamation, demerger, merger, consolidation or corporate reorganization.

name: Funktion/Verantwortlichkeit
description: Dieses AI Field erfasst die Funktion/Verantwortlichkeit des Arbeitnehmers. Dieses AI Field ist für arbeitsrechtliche Anwendungsfälle gedacht und wurde auf Arbeitsverträge, Geschäftsführerverträge, sonstige Verträge und Vorstandsverträge trainiert, die dem deutschen Recht unterliegen. Dieses AI Field wurde nicht von Zuva, sondern von CMS Hasche Sigle erstellt. Die letzte Aktualisierung erfolgte im 2021. Bitte beachten Sie, dass weder Zuva noch CMS Hasche Sigle verpflichtet sind, dieses AI Field zu aktualisieren oder zu warten.

name: Further Assurances
description: This AI field captures further assurances provisions within a credit agreement and any attachments thereto.

name: Further Instruments and Acts Covenant — Bond Indenture
description: This smart field captures the covenant of the issuer to execute and deliver such further instruments and perform such further acts as may be necessary to fulfill the purpose of the corporate debt security indenture.

name: FX Haircut Percentage
description: This AI field captures whether the parties have agreed to specify an FX haircut percentage in 2016 Credit Support Annexes for International Swaps and Derivatives Association agreements.

name: Garantia
description: Este campo de IA captura a garantia oferecida pelas partes como integral cumprimento de todas as obrigações contratuais. Este campo de IA tem como objetivo auxiliar na due diligence de M&A no Brasil e foi treinado utilizando contratos de concessão, franquia, fornecimento, locação, prestação de serviços, parceria, compra e venda e acordo de acionistas. Este campo de IA não foi criado por Zuva, mas sim por Machado Meyer e foi atualizado pela última vez em de 2021. Observe que nem Zuva nem Machado Meyer têm obrigação de atualizar ou manter este campo de IA.

name: Garantien
description: Dieses AI Field umfasst Vereinbarungen einer Garantie. Dieses AI Field ist für die Anwendungsfälle Commercial gedacht und wurde auf Einkaufsbedingungen, Handelsvertreterverträge, Kaufverträge, Kooperationsverträge, Lieferbedingungen, Lieferverträge, Rahmenvereinbarungen, Verkaufsbedingungen, Vertriebsverträge und Werkverträge trainiert, die dem deutschen Recht unterliegen. Dieses AI Field wurde nicht von Zuva, sondern von CMS Hasche Sigle erstellt. Die letzte Aktualisierung erfolgte im 2018. Bitte beachten Sie, dass weder Zuva noch CMS Hasche Sigle verpflichtet sind, dieses AI Field zu aktualisieren oder zu warten.

name: Garden Leave
description: This AI field captures provisions relating to garden leave.

name: Gefahrübergang
description: Dieses AI Field umfasst Regelungen zum Übergang der Preisgefahr bei Lieferverträgen (Siehe auch Nacherfüllung, Schadensersatz und Rügeobliegenheit.). Dieses AI Field ist für die Anwendungsfälle Commercial gedacht und wurde auf Einkaufsbedingungen, Handelsvertreterverträge, Kaufverträge, Kooperationsverträge, Lieferbedingungen, Lieferverträge, Rahmenvereinbarungen, Verkaufsbedingungen, Vertriebsverträge und Werkverträge trainiert, die dem deutschen Recht unterliegen. Dieses AI Field wurde nicht von Zuva, sondern von CMS Hasche Sigle erstellt. Die letzte Aktualisierung erfolgte im 2017. Bitte beachten Sie, dass weder Zuva noch CMS Hasche Sigle verpflichtet sind, dieses AI Field zu aktualisieren oder zu warten.

name: Gehaltsfortzahlung
description: Dieses AI Field erfasst Regelungen zur Fortzahlung des Gehaltes bei Krankheit, Tod, o.ä. des AN. Dieses AI Field ist für arbeitsrechtliche Anwendungsfälle gedacht und wurde auf Arbeitsverträge, Geschäftsführerverträge, sonstige Verträge und Vorstandsverträge trainiert, die dem deutschen Recht unterliegen. Dieses AI Field wurde nicht von Zuva, sondern von CMS Hasche Sigle erstellt. Die letzte Aktualisierung erfolgte im 2017. Bitte beachten Sie, dass weder Zuva noch CMS Hasche Sigle verpflichtet sind, dieses AI Field zu aktualisieren oder zu warten.

name: “General Partner” Definition
description: This AI field captures the definition of “General Partner”. This AI field does not capture the definition of "General Partner" in recitals. To capture the definition of "General Partner" in recitals, the AI field "Parties" should be used.

name: Gerichtsstand
description: Dieses AI Field umfasst eine Gerichtsstandvereinbarung zwischen den Parteien. Dieses AI Field ist für Anwendungsfälle in den Bereichen Immobilien, geistiges Eigentum, Gewerbe und Arbeit gedacht und wurde auf gewerbliche Mietverträge, Änderungsverträge, Abgrenzungsvereinbarungen, Vorrechtsvereinbarungen, Kooperationsvertrag, Lizenzverträge, Markenübertragungsverträge, Markenkaufverträge, Patentübertragungsverträge, Softwareentwicklungsverträge, Softwareüberlassungsverträge, sonstige Verträge, Urheberrechtsverträge, Einkaufsbedingungen, Handelsvertreterverträge, Kaufverträge, Kooperationsverträge, Lieferbedingungen, Lieferverträge, Rahmenvereinbarungen, Verkaufsbedingungen, Vertriebsverträge, Werkverträge, Arbeitsverträge, Geschäftsführerverträge, sonstige Verträge und Vorstandsverträge trainiert, die dem deutschen Recht unterliegen. Dieses AI Field wurde nicht von Zuva, sondern von CMS Hasche Sigle erstellt. Die letzte Aktualisierung erfolgte im 2018. Bitte beachten Sie, dass weder Zuva noch CMS Hasche Sigle verpflichtet sind, dieses AI Field zu aktualisieren oder zu warten.

name: “Good Reason” Definition
description: This AI field captures the definition of “Good Reason”.

name: Governing Law
description: This AI field captures the law that governs an agreement.

name: Governing Law (Full Paragraph)
description: This AI field captures the law that governs an agreement. This AI field captures the entire governing law paragraph.

name: Government/Third Party Authorization Representation
description: This AI field captures representations that any external authorizations, approvals or consents from any governmental authority or other third party have been obtained or are otherwise not required in connection with the execution of an agreement.

name: Grant Date
description: This AI field captures the date on which the stock option shall be granted, which is sometimes different than the effective date of the agreement.

name: Grant of Access to Protected Health Information
description: This AI field captures the requirement for business associates to grant access to protected health information to covered entities and individuals, pursuant to the Health Insurance Portability and Accountability Act (HIPAA).

name: Gross Income Allocation
description: This AI field captures a requirement that any partner or member who has a capital account deficit at the end of the fiscal year be specially allocated items of gross income and gain to the extent of such deficit.

name: Gross Up
description: This AI field captures a landlord’s ability to gross up a tenant’s operating expenses in the event that the building is not completely occupied.

name: Guarantor
description: This AI field captures a guarantor's name.

name: “Guarantor” Definition
description: This AI field captures the definition of “Guarantor” and similar terms.

name: Haftungsfreistellung
description: Dieses AI Field umfasst Freistellungen einer Vertragspartei von Ansprüchen Dritter. Dieses AI Field ist für Anwendungsfälle in den Bereichen Immobilien, geistiges Eigentum, Handel und Arbeit gedacht und wurde auf gewerbliche Mietverträge, Änderungsverträge, Abgrenzungsvereinbarungen, Vorrechtsvereinbarungen, Kooperationsvertrag, Lizenzverträge, Markenübertragungsverträge, Markenkaufverträge, Patentübertragungsverträge, Softwareentwicklungsverträge, Softwareüberlassungsverträge, sonstige Verträge, Urheberrechtsverträge, Einkaufsbedingungen, Handelsvertreterverträge, Kaufverträge, Kooperationsverträge, Lieferbedingungen, Lieferverträge, Rahmenvereinbarungen, Verkaufsbedingungen, Vertriebsverträge, Werkverträge, Arbeitsverträge, Geschäftsführerverträge, sonstige Verträge und Vorstandsverträge trainiert, die dem deutschen Recht unterliegen. Dieses AI Field wurde nicht von Zuva, sondern von CMS Hasche Sigle erstellt. Die letzte Aktualisierung erfolgte im 2018. Bitte beachten Sie, dass weder Zuva noch CMS Hasche Sigle verpflichtet sind, dieses AI Field zu aktualisieren oder zu warten.

name: Hardship
description: This AI field captures provisions relating to unforeseen events that occur after the execution of the agreement that could result in an excessive burden being placed on one of the parties.

name: Holdover
description: This AI field captures the consequences of a tenant continuing to occupy leased premises after the lease term expires.

name: Illegality
description: This AI field captures notice requirements and consequences where a lender performing its obligations under an agreement becomes unlawful.

name: “Immaterial Subsidiary”/“Dormant Subsidiary” Definition
description: This AI field captures the definitions of “Immaterial Subsidiary” or “Dormant Subsidiary”.

name: Implementation of Safeguards
description: This AI field captures the business associate’s obligation to implement safeguards, and comply with the Security Rule where applicable, to prevent the unauthorized use or disclosure of protected health information. It does not capture (i) general obligations to comply with the Health Insurance Portability and Accountability Act (HIPAA) or other applicable laws; (ii) specific information security requirements; (iii) inspection or audit rights; or (iv) provisions relating to the Red Flags Rule.

name: Inability to Determine Rates/Market Disruption
description: This AI field captures notice requirements and consequences in the event that the interest rate is not available or cannot be ascertained.

name: Incorporation Number
description: This AI field captures the corporation number.

name: Increased Capital Requirements
description: This AI field captures notice requirements and consequences in the event that a lender determines that, as a result of a change in law, its rate of return on capital has been reduced.

name: Increased Costs
description: This AI field captures a borrower's obligation to compensate a lender for any increase in costs as a result of a change in law.

name: Incremental Facilities
description: This AI field captures provisions with respect to incremental credit facilities.

name: Indebtedness Covenant
description: This AI field captures covenants of a borrower not to incur any indebtedness, and the definition of “Permitted Indebtedness”.

name: “Indebtedness” Definition
description: This AI field captures the definitions of “Indebtedness” or “Debt”.

name: “Indebtedness” Definition — Bond Indenture
description: This AI field captures the definitions of “Indebtedness”, “Debt”, “Guaranteed Indebtedness”, “Consolidated Indebtedness”, “Consolidated Debt”, and similar terms in Indentures.

name: Indemnification and Expenses
description: This AI field captures a borrower's obligations to indemnify the lenders or pay their expenses.

name: Indemnification Basket/Deductible
description: This AI field captures indemnification provisions that require that aggregate damages exceed a specified threshold before a claim can be made and/or that specify a deductible to which claims are subject.

name: Indemnification Cap
description: This AI field captures indemnification provisions that cap the amount of damages that can be claimed.

name: Indemnification Payment as Adjustment to Purchase Price
description: This AI field captures the parties’ acknowledgment that any indemnification payments made pursuant to an agreement will be treated as an adjustment to the purchase price set forth in the agreement.

name: “Indemnified Taxes”/“Other Taxes” Definition
description: This AI field captures the definitions of “Indemnified Taxes”, “Other Taxes”, “Tax Payment” and “Stamp Taxes”.

name: Indemnité
description: Ce champ AI enregistre les dispositions relatives aux indemnités. Il a été entraîné sur des ententes d'approvisionnement, des contrats de service, des contrats de distribution, des contrats de propriété intellectuelle, des contrats de travail et des contrats d'achat régis par les lois de la province de Québec.

name: Indemnity
description: This AI field captures indemnity or hold harmless provisions.

name: Indemnity — Articles & Bylaws
description: This AI field captures indemnity provisions. This AI field is intended to be used on Articles and Bylaws. To capture indemnification provisions within other document types, the AI field "Indemnity" should be used.

name: Indemnity — Bond Indenture
description: This AI field captures indemnification provisions in Indentures.

name: Indemnity — Equipment Lease
description: This AI field captures indemnity provisions in a lease.

name: Indenização
description: Este campo de IA captura cláusulas que regulam a indenização em virtude de perdas e danos causados à outra parte. Este campo de IA tem como objetivo auxiliar na due diligence de M&A no Brasil e foi treinado utilizando contratos de concessão, franquia, fornecimento, locação, prestação de serviços, parceria, compra e venda, acordo de acionistas, termos de uso e contratos de licenciamento. Este campo de IA não foi criado por Zuva, mas sim por Machado Meyer e foi atualizado pela última vez em de 2021. Observe que nem Zuva nem Machado Meyer têm obrigação de atualizar ou manter este campo de IA.

name: Independent Amount
description: This AI field captures whether a posting of an independent amount will be required (either a fixed sum or a percentage of the notional amount of the transactions) in the Credit Support Annexes for International Swaps and Derivatives Association agreements.

name: Independent Contractors
description: This AI field captures an acknowledgment by the parties to an agreement that their relationship is that of independent contractors.

name: Independent Legal Advice
description: This AI field captures an acknowledgment by an employee that they have had the opportunity to obtain independent legal advice.

name: Inflation Adjustment
description: This AI field captures whether the price or other monetary amount under a contract is subject to a cost of living or inflation adjustment, including the definition of any reference index used for the purposes of such adjustment.

name: Inflation/Index Rent Adjustment
description: This AI field captures adjustments to rent based on inflation or a change in a specified index, and adjustments to rent based on a fixed percentage that approximates inflation. This AI field captures related definitions. This AI field does not capture adjustments to expenses or other amounts under a lease based on inflation, a change in a specified index, or adjustments to rent based on changes in market rental values.

name: Information Rights
description: This AI field captures a shareholder’s right to access financial or other information about a company.

name: Initial Fee
description: This AI field captures provisions relating to the initial fee franchisees must pay to set up the initial franchise. It also includes one time fees payable, such as relocation fees or transfer fees.

name: Initial Term
description: This AI field captures the initial term of an agreement. This AI field does not capture any extensions or renewals.

name: Inspection of Internal Practices, Books and Records
description: This AI field captures the business associate’s obligation to make its internal practices, books and records relating to the use and disclosure of protected health information available to the Secretary of Health and Human Services.

name: Instandhaltung/Instandsetzung
description: Dieses AI Field erfasst die Verteilung der Wartungs- und Reparaturpflichten zwischen den Parteien im Hinblick auf die Mietsache (umfasst auch Schönheitsreparaturen). Dieses AI Field ist für die Anwendungsfälle Real Estate gedacht und wurde auf gewerbliche Mietverträge und Änderungsverträge trainiert, die dem deutschen Recht unterliegen.Dieses AI Field wurde nicht von Zuva, sondern von CMS Hasche Sigle erstellt. Die letzte Aktualisierung erfolgte im 2018. Bitte beachten Sie, dass weder Zuva noch CMS Hasche Sigle verpflichtet sind, dieses AI Field zu aktualisieren oder zu warten.

name: Insurance
description: This AI field captures a party’s obligation to obtain insurance. This AI field does not capture insurance-related indemnity obligations.

name: Insurance Agency Standard
description: This AI field captures a party’s obligation to obtain insurance from companies with a certain agency standard/rating.

name: Insurance Condition
description: This AI field captures conditions of borrowing with respect to the delivery of evidence of required insurance.

name: Insurance Covenant
description: This AI field captures covenants of a borrower to maintain insurance.

name: Insurance — Lease
description: This AI field captures a party’s obligations to provide insurance under a lease, the specifications for such insurance, and a party’s rights to settle and hold insurance proceeds.

name: Insurance Obligations — Equipment Lease
description: This AI field captures a lessee’s and, if applicable, a lessor’s, obligation to obtain insurance.

name: Insurance Obligations — Insurance Rent
description: This AI field captures a tenant’s obligation to pay insurance rent, the definition of “Insurance Rent” and its contents, any specified proportion of insurance rent, and an obligation to pay for valuations and re-valuations related to insuring the premises. This AI field does not capture consequential payments under insurance.

name: Insurance Obligations — “Insured Risks” Definition
description: This AI field captures the definition of “Insured Risks”.

name: Insurance Obligations — Landlord’s Obligations
description: This AI field captures a landlord’s insurance obligations. This AI field does not capture an obligation to produce evidence of insurance to a tenant and reinstatement obligations or limitations on a landlord’s obligation to insure.

name: Insurance Obligations — Reinstatement
description: This AI field captures an obligation to reinstate the premises following damage or destruction of the premises by an insured or uninsured risk, including the right of a landlord to either elect to reinstate or to determine the lease. This AI field does not capture a tenant's obligation to contribute or to lay out monies received where a tenant has vitiated insurance, increased the cost of insurance by any act or default or has effected insurance where it was prohibited from doing so.

name: Insurance Obligations — Rent Cesser
description: This AI field captures suspension of rent provisions as a result of damage or destruction of the premises by an insured or uninsured risk.

name: Insurance Obligations — Tenant’s Obligations
description: This AI field captures a tenant’s negative insurance covenants, obligation to comply with requirements and recommendations of an insurer, obligation to vacate the premises following an insurance event, obligation to contribute to reinstatement or make payment to a landlord in the event of vitiation of insurance, and obligation to make payment to a landlord where a tenant effects separate insurance. This AI field does not capture obligations to insure plate glass and third-party insurance.

name: Insurance Obligations — Termination on Damage and Destruction
description: This AI field captures an automatic trigger or landlord or tenant's option to determine the lease in the event of damage or destruction to the premises by an insured or uninsured risk.

name: Insurance Obligations — “Uninsured Risks” Definition
description: This AI field captures the definitions of “Uninsured Risks”, “Uninsured Damage”, “Policy Exclusions”, and “Excluded Risks”.

name: Insurance Representation
description: This AI field captures representations with respect to a party’s insurance coverage.

name: Intellectual Property Representation
description: This AI field captures representations with respect to intellectual property matters.

name: Intellectual Property Representation — Credit Agreement
description: This AI field captures representations that a loan party/obligor owns or has the right to use all of its intellectual property and has not infringed on the intellectual property rights of any other person.

name: Interest and Penalties — Equipment Lease
description: This AI field captures interest and penalties assessed against a lessee.

name: Interest Calculation
description: This AI field captures the way in which interest on a loan will accrue and be calculated.

name: Interest Calculation/Payment
description: This AI field captures the way in which interest is calculated and timing of payment.

name: Interest on Overdue Payments
description: This AI field captures the interest rate or late fee applicable to overdue payments.

name: Interest Payment Dates
description: This AI field captures timing of interest payments on a loan.

name: “Interest Period” Definition
description: This AI field captures the definition of “Interest Period”.

name: Interest Rate Amendment
description: This AI field captures the location of interest rate amendments within the amendments provision to assist in determining the required approvals to amend the interest rate.

name: Interest Rate and Margin Terms
description: This AI field captures interest rates and margins applicable to credit facilities.

name: Interest Rate — Bond Indenture
description: This AI field captures interest rates applicable to corporate debt security indentures.

name: Interest Rate — Credit Agreement
description: This AI field captures a requirement to pay interest on a loan.

name: Interest Rate — CSA
description: This AI field captures the interest rate that will be paid by the transferee on the cash collateral received from the transferor in the Credit Support Annexes for International Swaps and Derivatives Association agreements.

name: Interest Rate Floor
description: This AI field captures the negotiated and agreed upon interest rate floor contained in floating rate loan products.

name: “Intervening Event” Definition
description: This AI field captures the definition of “Intervening Event”.

name: Invention Assignment
description: This AI field captures an employee's assignment to an employer of inventions created during the course of their employment.

name: “Inventory” Definition
description: This AI field captures the definition of "Inventory" as part of a transaction.

name: “Inventory” Definition — Credit Agreement
description: This AI field captures the definition of “Inventory” typically referenced in the borrowing base formula for asset-based loans.

name: Inventory Representation
description: This AI field captures representations with respect to the inventory of a business.

name: Investment Company Act Representation
description: This AI field captures a borrower's representations that it is not an “investment company” within the meaning of the U.S. Investment Company Act of 1940.

name: Investments and Acquisitions Covenant
description: This AI field captures covenants of a borrower not to make investments or purchase other entities and the definition of “Permitted Investments” or “Permitted Acquisitions”.

name: “Investments” Definition
description: This AI field captures the definition of “Investments”.

name: Invoice Disputes
description: This AI field captures provisions relating to invoice disputes, including a requirement to pay undisputed amounts and the process for disputing an invoice or payment.

name: Invoice Frequency
description: This AI field captures the frequency at which invoices are to be delivered.

name: Invoice Requirements
description: This AI field captures requirements for invoices, including format, and any documents that must accompany an invoice.

name: Is a party or parties required to be named as additional insured(s)?
description: This AI field answers the question of whether parties are required to be added as additional insureds under insurance policies.

name: Is a party required to present a certificate of insurance?
description: This AI field answers the questions of whether a party is required to provide a certificate of insurance, which includes evidence of insurance coverage and insurance policies.

name: Issuance Date
description: This AI field captures the issuance date of the franchise disclosure document.

name: Issuer Notice of Default
description: This AI field captures notice obligations of an issuer when there is an event of default.

name: Is the license exclusive?
description: This AI field answers the question of whether a license is exclusive.

name: Is the license royalty-bearing?
description: This AI field answers the question of whether a license granted bears a royalty.

name: Is there a geographical restriction for the license grant?
description: This AI field answers the question of whether a license is granted within a particular territory.

name: Is there a geographical restriction in the exclusivity legal clause?
description: This AI field answers the question of whether there is a geographical restriction in the exclusivity clause.

name: Is there a geographical restriction in the non-compete clause?
description: This AI field answers the question of whether there is a geographical restriction in the non-compete clause.

name: Is there a geographical restriction in the non-solicit legal clause?
description: This AI field answers the question of whether there is a geographical restriction in the non-solicit clause.

name: Is there a minimum rating of the insurance provider?
