description: This AI field answers the question of whether there is a minimum rating of the insurance provider.

name: Is there an indemnification for intellectual property breaches?
description: This AI field answers the question of whether the indemnity clause contains a specific indemnity for breaches of a party's intellectual property rights.

name: Is there a release of source code escrow on an assignment or change of control?
description: This AI field answers the question of whether the source code escrow is released on an assignment or change of control.

name: Is there a release of source code escrow on termination of the agreement?
description: This AI field answers the question of whether the source code escrow is released on termination of the agreement.

name: Is there a requirement to certify that Confidential Information/Data has been returned or destroyed?
description: This AI field answers the question of whether there is a requirement to certify that confidential information/data has been returned or destroyed (as applicable).

name: Is there a requirement to return and/or destroy confidential information/data?
description: This AI field answers the question of whether there is a requirement to return and/or destroy confidential information.

name: Is there a responsibility to mitigate damage from a data breach?
description: This AI field answers the question of whether a party is required to mitigate the potential damage upon becoming aware of a data breach.

name: Is there a responsibility to notify customers of a data breach?
description: This AI field answers the question of whether a party is required to notify its customers upon becoming aware of a data breach.

name: Is there a responsibility to rectify the data breach?
description: This AI field answers the question of whether a party is required to rectify damage upon becoming aware of a data breach.

name: Is there a trigger for Acts of God or natural disasters in the force majeure clause?
description: This AI field answers the question of whether there is a trigger for Acts of God or natural disasters in the Force Majeure clause.

name: Is there a trigger for labour disruptions or third-party actions in the force majeure clause?
description: This AI field answers the question of whether there is a trigger for labor disruptions or third-party actions in the Force Majeure clause.

name: Is there a trigger for public health events in the force majeure clause?
description: This AI field answers the question of whether there is a trigger for public health events in the Force Majeure clause.

name: Is there a trigger for utility or infrastructure failures in the force majeure clause?
description: This AI field answers the question of whether there is a trigger for utility or infrastructure failures in the Force Majeure clause.

name: Is there a trigger for wars or government actions in the force majeure clause?
description: This AI field answers the question of whether there is a trigger for wars or government actions in the Force Majeure clause.

name: Is there catch-all language in the force majeure clause?
description: This AI field answers the question of whether there is catch-all language in the Force Majeure clause.

name: Item 10 — Financing
description: This AI field captures Item 10 — Financing of the franchise disclosure document.

name: Item 11 — Franchisor’s Assistance, Advertising, Computer Systems and Training
description: This AI field captures Item 11 — Franchisor’s Assistance, Advertising, Computer Systems and Training of the franchise disclosure document.

name: Item 12 — Territory
description: This AI field captures Item 12 — Territory of the franchise disclosure document.

name: Item 13 —Trademarks
description: This AI field captures Item 13 — Trademark of the franchise disclosure document.

name: Item 14 — Patents, Copyrights and Proprietary Information
description: This AI field captures Item 14 — Patents, Copyrights and Proprietary Information of the franchise business of the franchise disclosure document.

name: Item 15 — Obligation To Participate in the Actual Operation of the Franchise Business
description: This AI field captures Item 15 — Obligation to Participate in the Actual Operation of the Franchise Business of the franchise disclosure document.

name: Item 16 — Restrictions on What the Franchisee May Sell
description: This AI field captures Item 16 — Restrictions on What the Franchisee May Sell of the franchise disclosure document.

name: Item 17 — Renewal, Termination, Transfer, and Dispute Resolution
description: This AI field captures Item 17 — Renewal, Termination, Transfer, and Dispute Resolution of the franchise disclosure document.

name: Item 18 — Public Figures
description: This AI field captures Item 18 — Public Figures of the franchise disclosure document.

name: Item 19 — Financial Performance Representations
description: This AI field captures Item 19 — Financial Performance Representations of the franchise disclosure document.

name: Item 1 — The Franchisor, and any Parent Predecessors and Affiliates
description: This AI field captures Item 1 — The Franchisor, and any Parent Predecessors, and Affiliates of the franchise disclosure document.

name: Item 20 — Outlets and Franchisee Information
description: This smart field captures Item 20 — Outlets and Franchisee Information of the franchise disclosure document. This smart field was trained on franchise disclosure documents.

name: Item 21 — Financial Statements
description: This AI field captures Item 21 — Financial Statements of the franchise disclosure document.

name: Item 22 — Contracts
description: This AI field captures Item 22 — Contracts of the franchise disclosure document.

name: Item 23 — Receipts
description: This AI field captures Item 23 — Receipts of the franchise disclosure document.

name: Item 2 — Business Experience
description: This AI field captures Item 2 — Business Experience of the franchise disclosure document.

name: Item 3 — Litigation
description: This AI field captures Item 3 — Litigation of the franchise disclosure document.

name: Item 4 — Bankruptcy
description: This AI field captures Item 4 — Bankruptcy of the franchise disclosure document.

name: Item 5 — Initial Fees Paid to the Franchisor
description: This AI field captures Item 5 — Initial Fees Paid to the Franchisor of the franchise disclosure document.

name: Item 6 — Other Fees
description: This AI field captures Item 6 — Other Fees of the franchise disclosure document.

name: Item 7 — Estimated Initial Investment
description: This AI field captures Item 7 — Estimated Initial Investment of the franchise disclosure document.

name: Item 8 — Restrictions on Sources of Products and Services
description: This AI field captures Item 8 — Restrictions on Sources of Products and Services of the franchise disclosure document.

name: Item 9 — Franchisee’s Obligations
description: This AI field captures Item 9 — Franchisee’s Obligations of the franchise disclosure document.

name: Joint Ownership of Intellectual Property
description: This AI field captures intellectual property that is created or owned jointly by parties under an agreement. This AI field captures related definitions.

name: Jury Trial Waiver
description: This AI field captures a party’s agreement to waive its right to a jury trial.

name: “Knowledge” Definition
description: This AI field captures the definition of “Knowledge” in purchase agreements.

name: Know Your Customer Condition — Credit Agreement
description: This AI field captures conditions of borrowing with respect to the delivery of “know your customer” and anti-money laundering documentation.

name: Know Your Customer/Patriot Act Condition
description: This AI field captures conditions of borrowing with respect to delivering documentation pursuant to “know your customer” regulations and the U.S. Patriot Act.

name: Konkurrenzschutz
description: Dieses AI Field erfasst den Schutz des Mieters vor Konkurrenz durch die Vermietung von Räumen in denselben oder naheliegenden Mietobjekten. Dieses AI Field ist für die Anwendungsfälle Real Estate gedacht und wurde auf gewerbliche Mietverträge und Änderungsverträge trainiert, die dem deutschen Recht unterliegen. Dieses AI Field wurde nicht von Zuva, sondern von CMS Hasche Sigle erstellt. Die letzte Aktualisierung erfolgte im 2018. Bitte beachten Sie, dass weder Zuva noch CMS Hasche Sigle verpflichtet sind, dieses AI Field zu aktualisieren oder zu warten.

name: Kontrollwechsel
description: Dieses AI Field umfasst Regelungen, die an eine (wesentliche) Änderung in der Gesellschaftsstruktur anknüpfen. Dieses AI Field ist für Anwendungsfälle in den Bereichen Immobilien, Unternehmens-M&A, geistiges Eigentum, Gewerbe und Arbeitsrecht gedacht und wurde auf gewerbliche Mietverträge, Änderungsverträge, Gesellschaftsverträge, Gesellschaftervereinbarungen, Joint Venture Agreements, Beherrschungsverträge, Geschäftsführerverträge, Vorstandsverträge, Abgrenzungsvereinbarungen, Vorrechtsvereinbarungen, Kooperationsvertrag, Lizenzverträge, Markenübertragungsverträge, Markenkaufverträge, Patentübertragungsverträge, Softwareentwicklungsverträge, Softwareüberlassungsverträge, sonstige Verträge, Urheberrechtsverträge, Einkaufsbedingungen, Handelsvertreterverträge, Kaufverträge, Kooperationsverträge, Lieferbedingungen, Lieferverträge, Rahmenvereinbarungen, Verkaufsbedingungen, Vertriebsverträge, Werkverträge, Arbeitsverträge, Geschäftsführerverträge, sonstige Verträge und Vorstandsverträge trainiert, die dem deutschen Recht unterliegen. Dieses AI Field wurde nicht von Zuva, sondern von CMS Hasche Sigle erstellt. Die letzte Aktualisierung erfolgte im 2018. Bitte beachten Sie, dass weder Zuva noch CMS Hasche Sigle verpflichtet sind, dieses AI Field zu aktualisieren oder zu warten.

name: Kündigungsrechte
description: Dieses AI Field erfasst ordentliche und außerordentliche Kündigungsrechte. Dieses AI Field ist für Anwendungsfälle in den Bereichen Immobilien, Unternehmens-M&A, geistiges Eigentum, Gewerbe und Arbeitsrecht gedacht und wurde auf gewerbliche Mietverträge, Änderungsverträge, Gesellschaftsverträge, Gesellschaftervereinbarungen, Joint Venture Agreements, Beherrschungsverträge, Geschäftsführerverträge, Vorstandsverträge, Abgrenzungsvereinbarungen, Vorrechtsvereinbarungen, Kooperationsvertrag, Lizenzverträge, Markenübertragungsverträge, Markenkaufverträge, Patentübertragungsverträge, Softwareentwicklungsverträge, Softwareüberlassungsverträge, sonstige Verträge, Urheberrechtsverträge, Einkaufsbedingungen, Handelsvertreterverträge, Kaufverträge, Kooperationsverträge, Lieferbedingungen, Lieferverträge, Rahmenvereinbarungen, Verkaufsbedingungen, Vertriebsverträge, Werkverträge, Arbeitsverträge, Geschäftsführerverträge, sonstige Verträge und Vorstandsverträge trainiert, die dem deutschen Recht unterliegen. Dieses AI Field wurde nicht von Zuva, sondern von CMS Hasche Sigle erstellt. Die letzte Aktualisierung erfolgte im 2018. Bitte beachten Sie, dass weder Zuva noch CMS Hasche Sigle verpflichtet sind, dieses AI Field zu aktualisieren oder zu warten.

name: Kurzarbeit
description: Dieses AI Field erfasst Regelungen zur Kurzarbeit. Dieses AI Field ist für arbeitsrechtliche Anwendungsfälle gedacht und wurde auf Arbeitsverträge, Geschäftsführerverträge, sonstige Verträge und Vorstandsverträge trainiert, die dem deutschen Recht unterliegen. Dieses AI Field wurde nicht von Zuva, sondern von CMS Hasche Sigle erstellt. Die letzte Aktualisierung erfolgte im 2018. Bitte beachten Sie, dass weder Zuva noch CMS Hasche Sigle verpflichtet sind, dieses AI Field zu aktualisieren oder zu warten.

name: Labor and Employment Representation
description: This AI field captures representations with respect to labour and employment matters.

name: Landlord
description: This AI field captures a landlord's name.

name: Landlord Consent for Lease Transfer
description: This AI field captures a requirement that a tenant obtain the consent of the landlord to assign, sublet, mortgage, pledge, hypothecate, encumber or otherwise transfer a lease to a third party.

name: Landlord Remedies Upon Events of Default
description: This AI field captures remedies available to a landlord in the event that a tenant defaults under a lease. This AI field is not intended to capture remedies for specific tenant breaches unless such specific tenant breaches gives the landlord a right to terminate the lease.

name: Landlord’s Default — Cure Periods
description: This AI field captures the amount of time a landlord has to cure a default in its performance of its obligations under a lease.

name: Lapse Date
description: This AI field captures the lapse date of the Uniform Commercial Code financing statement. It was trained on the standard UCC-1 forms.

name: Late Payment and Grace Period
description: This AI field captures the charge to a tenant in the event of late payment of base rent or any other sum payable under the lease, including any applicable grace period.

name: Leased/Demised Premises
description: This AI field captures the description or definition of the leased/demised premises.

name: Leased Premises
description: This broad AI field captures the description of leased premises, including the address square footage.

name: Lease Grant
description: This AI field captures a lessor’s agreement to grant a lease of the leased property to the lessee.

name: Lease Term
description: This AI field captures the initial term of a lease.

name: Lease Transfer Fees
description: This AI field captures any fees, costs or expenses payable by the tenant to the landlord in the event of a transfer of the lease by the tenant.

name: Legal Defeasance
description: This AI field captures legal defeasance requirements that, if satisfied, relieve an issuer’s obligation to comply with any covenants, including payment obligations, contained in an indenture.

name: Legal Description
description: This AI field captures metes and bounds legal descriptions.

name: Legally Ineligible Credit Support
description: This AI field captures whether the parties have agreed that the standard “Legally Ineligible Credit Support (VM)” applies in 2016 Credit Support Annexes for International Swaps and Derivatives Association agreements.

name: Legal Opinions Condition
description: This AI field captures a closing condition that an opinion of legal counsel is required, and includes opinions to be delivered as part of closing deliverables.

name: Legislation
description: This AI field captures a tenant's obligation to comply with certain legislation and statutes.

name: Lei Aplicável
description: Este campo de IA captura a lei que rege um contrato. Este campo de IA tem como objetivo auxiliar na due diligence de M&A no Brasil e foi treinado utilizando contratos de concessão, franquia, fornecimento, locação, prestação de serviços, parceria, compra e venda, financeiros, societários e acordo de acionistas. Este campo de IA não foi criado por Zuva, mas sim por Machado Meyer e foi atualizado pela última vez em de 2021. Observe que nem Zuva nem Machado Meyer têm obrigação de atualizar ou manter este campo de IA.

name: Lender’s Assignment Rights and Required Consents
description: This AI field captures a lender's right to assign a loan and any consents required in connection with such assignment.

name: Lessor’s Right of Inspection
description: This AI field captures a lessor’s right to inspect the leased property and the lessee’s records during the term of the lease.

name: Lessor’s Right to Cure
description: This AI field captures a lessor’s right to cure any defect in the lessee’s performance under the lease and to seek compensation/reimbursement therefor.

name: Letter of Credit Fees
description: This AI field captures fees applicable to letters of credit.

name: Letter of Credit Fees — Credit Agreement
description: This AI field captures fees payable to a letter of credit issuer upon issuance.

name: Leverage Ratio
description: This AI field captures leverage ratio covenants for various forms of leverage ratios.

name: “Leverage Ratio”/“Adjusted Leverage” Definition
description: This AI field captures the definitions of “Leverage Ratio”, “Leverage”, “Adjusted Leverage” and similar concepts related to the ratio of debt to earnings.

name: Liability Cap
description: This AI field captures caps on the amount of a landlord’s or guarantor’s liability with respect to a lease.

name: Liability for Taxes
description: This AI field captures provisions relating to a party’s liability to pay taxes under an agreement, including the obligation to gross-up or otherwise indemnify the other party for any withholding or deduction for taxes from a payment made under the agreement. This AI field does not capture provisions relating to tax contests or tax-related definitions.

name: Liability for Taxes — Lease Accounting
description: This AI field captures a party’s liability to pay taxes under a lease. This AI field does not capture references to taxes as a listed component of “Operating Expenses”, any similar defined term, provisions relating to tax contests, or, generally, tax-related definitions.

name: Liability on Termination
description: This AI field captures a party’s liability resulting from the termination or partial termination of an agreement, or cancellation of any obligation under an agreement, including a requirement to pay termination fees, damages, and/or a cancellation fee. This AI field does not capture provisions relating to a party’s agreement to continue performance under an agreement after termination, including the provision of termination or transition services.

name: Liability on Termination — Lease Accounting
description: This AI field captures a party’s liability resulting from the termination of a lease and in the case of equipment leases, a party’s liability resulting from an event of loss with respect to a leased asset. This AI field does not capture general indemnity provisions.

name: “LIBOR” Definition — Bond Indenture
description: This AI field captures the definition of “LIBOR” and similar or related definitions in Indentures.

name: LIBOR Fallback Mechanism
description: This AI field captures the process by which a fallback benchmark rate is to be determined following a permanent transition away from LIBOR.

name: LIBOR Initial Determination
description: This AI field captures the process for the initial determination of “LIBOR”.

name: “LIBOR” or “Eurocurrency” Definition
description: This AI field captures the definitions of “LIBOR”, “Eurocurrency” and all similar or related definitions including “Screen Rate” and “Interpolated Rate”.

name: License Grant
description: This AI field captures the scope of the rights that a licensor grants to a licensee.

name: Lien/Negative Pledge Covenant — Bond Indenture
description: This AI field captures covenants restricting the issuer’s ability to incur additional liens, subject to carve-outs for specified permitted liens. This AI field also captures the definitions of “Liens”, “Permitted Liens” and similar definitions.

name: “Lien”/“Permitted Liens” Definition
description: This AI field captures the definitions of “Liens”, “Permitted Liens”, and similar terms.

name: Liens Covenant/Negative Pledge
description: This AI field captures covenants of a borrower not to permit any liens on its assets and the definition of “Permitted Liens” or “Permitted Encumbrances”.

name: Life Insurance
description: This AI field captures an employer's right or obligation to provide life insurance to an employee.

name: Limitação de Responsabilidade - Limite Financeiro
description: Este campo de IA captura as disposições relativas ao limite do valor financeiro pelo qual uma parte será responsável em caso de perdas e danos ou responsabilização civil perante descumprimento de obrigação contratual. Este campo de IA tem como objetivo auxiliar na due diligence de M&A no Brasil e foi treinado utilizando contratos de concessão, franquia, fornecimento, locação, prestação de serviços, parceria, compra e venda, acordo de acionistas, termos de uso e contratos de licenciamento. Este campo de IA não foi criado por Zuva, mas sim por Machado Meyer e foi atualizado pela última vez em de 2021. Observe que nem Zuva nem Machado Meyer têm obrigação de atualizar ou manter este campo de IA.

name: Limitation de responsabilité
description: Ce champ AI enregistre les dispositions qui limitent la responsabilité des parties. Il a été entraîné sur des ententes d'approvisionnement, des contrats de service, des contrats de distribution, des contrats de propriété intellectuelle, des contrats de travail et des contrats d'achat régis par les lois de la province de Québec.

name: Limitation for Punitive, Consequential or Incidental Damages
description: This AI field captures an exclusion from damages of punitive, consequential and/or incidental losses, as well as exemplary, special or similar losses.

name: Limitation of Liability
description: This AI field captures provisions that limit a party’s liability under an agreement.

name: Limitation of Liability — Financial Cap
description: This AI field captures provisions that cap the amount of financial liability that a party would be responsible for.

name: Limitation of Liability — Limited Partner/Member
description: This AI field captures provisions describing the extent to which a limited partner or member’s liability with respect to the partnership or company is limited.

name: Limitation of Liability — Loss of Data
description: This AI field captures provisions that limit a party's liability for loss of data.

name: Limitation on Additional Debt Covenant
description: This AI field captures covenants limiting an issuer’s ability to incur additional debt, and the situations when an issuer may issue permitted debt or issue debt within compliance with certain financial ratios. This AI field also captures the definition of “Permitted Indebtedness”, “EBITDA”, “Consolidated Interest Expense”, definitions related to coverage or leverage ratios, and similar definitions.

name: Limitation on Designation of Early Termination Date
description: This AI field captures the limitation that, if there is an event of default, a potential event of default or a termination event, the non-defaulting party must designate an early termination date within a certain period of time after receiving notice of such event; otherwise, it forfeits its right to terminate based on such event. It also captures the qualification that the condition precedent that no event of default or potential event of default has occurred and is continuing is subject to the foregoing limitation (i.e., this condition precedent will cease to be applicable where the non-defaulting party has failed to respond to such event within a certain period).

name: Limitation on Dividend Stopper Covenant
description: This AI field captures an issuer’s covenant to prohibit subsidiaries from entering arrangements that would prevent the subsidiaries from issuing dividends and other payments up to the issuer.

name: Limitation on Loss Allocation
description: This AI field captures provisions limiting the allocation of losses to a partner or member to the extent that such allocation would result in a capital account deficit.

name: Limitation on Suits
description: This AI field captures limitations as to the ability of a holder of corporate debt securities to pursue a remedy under an indenture.

name: Limitations on LP/Member Authority
description: This AI field captures a requirement that limited partners or members of a limited partnership or limited liability company not participate in the management of the partnership or company.

name: Limitations on Requests to Use or Disclose
description: This AI field captures limitations on the covered entity’s right to request that the business associate use or disclose protected health information in a manner that would not be permitted if done by the covered entity.

name: “Limited Partner” Definition
description: This AI field captures the definition of “Limited Partner”. This AI field does not capture the definition of "Limited Partner" in recitals. To capture the definition of "Limited Partner" in recitals, the AI field "Parties" should be used.

name: Liquidated Damages
description: This AI field captures a party’s entitlement to liquidated damages on the occurrence of specified events.

name: Liquidation Preferences
description: This AI field captures the ranking and rights of securities upon a liquidation and winding up of the company. This AI field is intended to be used on Articles and Bylaws. To capture the ranking and rights of securities upon a liquidation and winding up of the company within LPA/LLC documents, the AI field "Distribution of Property on Liquidation — LPA/LLC" should be used.

name: Litigation Representation
description: This AI field captures representations with respect to pending or threatened litigation proceedings against a party.

name: Litigation Representation — Credit Agreement
description: This AI field captures a general litigation representation that there are no adverse claims, actions or other proceedings pending or threatened against a loan party/obligor. This AI field does not capture specific references to litigation or other proceedings contained in other representations.

name: “Loan Documents” Definition
description: This AI field captures the definitions of “Loan Documents” and “Finance Documents”.

name: Location of Equipment
description: This AI field captures the location in which the leased property will be kept during the term of the lease and any restriction on changing such location.

name: Lock-Up/Market Stand-Off
description: This AI field captures provisions that prohibit the option holder from selling or otherwise transferring any shares during a specified period following the exercise of the stock option. This type of provision is often called “Lock-up” or “Market Stand-Off”.

name: Loi applicable
description: Ce champ AI enregistre la loi régissant le contrat. Il a été entraîné sur des ententes d'approvisionnement, des contrats de service, des contrats de distribution, des contrats de propriété intellectuelle, des contrats de travail et des contrats d'achat régis par les lois de la province de Québec.

name: “Losses”/“Damages” Definition
description: This AI field captures the definition of “Losses” or “Damages” used in an indemnity provision of a purchase agreement, and references to costs, claims, liabilities and other losses in indemnity provisions that are not part of a defined term.

name: Maintenance and Preservation of Assets Covenant
description: This AI field captures covenants of a borrower to maintain and preserve all property and assets necessary to conduct its business.

name: Maintenance of Office or Agency Covenant
description: This AI field captures a covenant requiring an issuer to maintain an office or agency for resolving matters involving corporate debt securities.

name: Maintenance of Property and Insurance Covenant
description: This AI field captures a covenant requiring an issuer to maintain the material property used in its business and to maintain appropriate levels and types of insurance on its business.

name: Maintenance of Ratings Affirmative Covenant
description: This AI field captures a borrower's covenants to maintain its credit rating.

name: Maintenance of Records
description: This AI field captures a party's obligation to maintain books and/or records, including different types of records and bookkeeping, from minute books to records of data processing activities. This AI field captures related definitions. This AI field does not capture the representation that books have been maintained, or access or retention of books and/or records.

name: Majority Class Approval
description: This AI field captures waivers, amendments and other actions requiring the consent of a majority of lenders in the class affected thereby.

name: Make Whole Provision
description: This AI field captures the make whole provision allowing the issuer to call the debt securities prior to maturity in return for a payment to the debt holders to compensate for potential lost interest. This smart field also captures the definition of “Applicable Premium” and similar terms.

name: Mandatory Prepayments
description: This AI field captures events that trigger mandatory prepayments of loans.

name: Mandatory Prepayments — Credit Agreement
description: This AI field captures the events pursuant to which a borrower will be required to prepay its loan.

name: Manner of Exercise
description: This AI field captures how the option holder may exercise his/her stock options. This often includes delivery of a notice of exercise in a prescribed manner along with payment of the exercise price. The particular methods of payment available to the option holder can be found using the “Method of Payment — Option Agreements” AI field.

name: Margin Regulations Representation
description: This AI field captures a borrower's representations that it is not in the business of holding “margin stock” as defined in Regulation U of the U.S. Board of Governors Federal Reserve System.

name: Marketing Period Closing Condition
description: This AI field captures a requirement that the closing occur after the marketing period has ended, or during the marketing period if the acquirer so chooses. This AI field was designed to be used in conjunction with the "“Marketing Period” Definition" AI field.

name: “Marketing Period” Definition
description: This AI field captures the definition of “Marketing Period”. This AI field should be used in conjunction with the "Marketing Period Closing Condition" AI field.

name: Marketing/Syndication Period
description: This AI field captures marketing or syndication periods applicable to credit facilities and any marketing/syndication period conditions of borrowing.

name: Market Quotation
description: This AI field captures the definition of “Market Quotation” in International Swaps and Derivatives Association agreements.

name: Material Adverse Change
description: This AI field captures representations and warranties that a material adverse change has not occurred since a specified date, and what happens in the event of a material adverse change. This AI field captures related definitions, such as "Material Adverse Change" and "Material Adverse Effect".

name: Material Adverse Change Representation — Credit Agreement
description: This AI field captures a borrower's representations that there has been no material adverse change in its business or financial condition since the date of specified financial statements.

name: “Material Adverse Effect” Definition
description: This AI field captures the definition of “Material Adverse Effect” in a purchase agreement.

name: “Material Adverse Effect” Definition — Credit Agreement
description: This AI field captures the definitions of “Material Adverse Change” or “Material Adverse Effect” in a credit, facility or loan agreement.

name: “Material Adverse Effect” Definition — Exceptions
description: This AI field captures all events that are excluded from the definition of “Material Adverse Effect” in a purchase agreement.

name: “Material Adverse Effect” Definition — Exceptions — Acts of War
description: This AI field captures exceptions for acts of war, major hostilities and terrorism within the definition of “Material Adverse Effect” in a purchase agreement.

name: “Material Adverse Effect” Definition — Exceptions — Announcement of Transaction
description: This AI field captures exceptions for adverse effects that arise from the announcement or public disclosure of the transaction within the definition of “Material Adverse Effect” in a purchase agreement.

name: “Material Adverse Effect” Definition — Exceptions — Changes in GAAP
description: This AI field captures exceptions for changes in Generally Accepted Accounting Principles (GAAP) or other accounting standards within the definition of “Material Adverse Effect” in a purchase agreement.

name: “Material Adverse Effect” Definition — Exceptions — Changes in Law
description: This AI field captures exceptions for changes in law within the definition of “Material Adverse Effect” in a purchase agreement.

name: “Material Adverse Effect” Definition — Exceptions — Changes in Political Conditions
description: This AI field captures exceptions for changes in political conditions within the definition of “Material Adverse Effect” in a purchase agreement.

name: “Material Adverse Effect” Definition — Exceptions — Consummation of the Transaction
description: This AI field captures exceptions for adverse effects that arise from the consummation of the transaction within the definition of “Material Adverse Effect” in a purchase agreement.

name: “Material Adverse Effect” Definition — Exceptions — Disproportionate Impact
description: This AI field captures exceptions for events that have a disproportionate impact on a party, relative to others within its industry, within the definition of “Material Adverse Effect” in a purchase agreement.

name: “Material Adverse Effect” Definition — Exceptions — Economic Conditions
description: This AI field captures exceptions for changes in general economic conditions, securities markets, exchange rates or interest rates within the definition of “Material Adverse Effect” in a purchase agreement.

name: “Material Adverse Effect” Definition — Exceptions — Failure to Meet Projections
description: This AI field captures exceptions for adverse effects that arise from the failure of the target company to meet projections, forecasts or estimates within the definition of “Material Adverse Effect” in a purchase agreement.

name: “Material Contract” Definition
description: This AI field captures the definition of the material or major contracts.

name: Materiality Qualifier
description: This AI field captures the level of accuracy required in the “bring-down” of a party’s representations and warranties.

name: Materiality Scrape
description: This AI field captures provisions that disregard all qualifications of materiality contained in representations and warranties.

name: “Material Subsidiary” Definition
description: This AI field captures the definition of “Material Subsidiary”.

name: Maturity
description: This AI field captures a credit facility’s maturity date.

name: Maturity Date — Bond Indenture
description: This AI field captures the maturity dates applicable to corporate debt security indentures.

name: Maturity Date — Incremental Facility
description: This AI field captures maturity date restrictions for incremental facilities / increases in commitment. This AI field does not capture similar provisions regarding refinance / replacement facilities, incremental notes, or incremental equivalent debt. It is recommended that this smart field be used together with the other Incremental Facility smart fields.

name: “Maturity Date”/“Termination Date” Definition
description: This AI field captures the definitions of “Maturity Date” and “Termination Date”.

name: Maximum Amount / Free and Clear
description: This AI field captures the maximum amount allowed (i.e. free and clear) for incremental facilities/increases in commitment. This AI field does not capture similar provisions regarding refinance/replacement facilities, incremental notes, or incremental equivalent debt.  It is recommended that this AI field be used together with the other Incremental Facility AI fields.

name: Mechanic’s Lien
description: This AI field captures a tenant’s obligation to keep the land and leased premises free of liens, including liens of parties who supply materials or make improvements to the leased premises on behalf of the tenant, and requirements to promptly pay such parties.

name: Merger Covenant
description: This AI field captures the covenant restricting the issuer and any guarantors from merging, consolidating or selling substantially all of its assets, unless certain conditions provided for in the indenture are satisfied.

name: Method of Payment
description: This AI field captures the methods by which the option holder may pay the exercise price when electing to exercise the stock option. This often includes traditional methods such as cash, cheque and wire transfer, as well as alternative methods such as cashless exercise, net exercise, and others.

name: “Me Too” Representation and Warranty
description: This AI field captures representations with respect to pending or past harassment allegations against an executive of the corporation.

name: Mietanpassung/Indexierung
description: Dieses AI Field erfasst die Vereinbarung einer nachträglichen Mietänderung, ggf. als Staffelmiete oder abhängig von einem Index. Dieses AI Field ist für die Anwendungsfälle Real Estate gedacht und wurde auf gewerbliche Mietverträge und Änderungsverträge trainiert, die dem deutschen Recht unterliegen. Dieses AI Field wurde nicht von Zuva, sondern von CMS Hasche Sigle erstellt. Die letzte Aktualisierung erfolgte im 2018. Bitte beachten Sie, dass weder Zuva noch CMS Hasche Sigle verpflichtet sind, dieses AI Field zu aktualisieren oder zu warten.

name: Mietfreie Zeiten
description: Dieses AI Field umfasst Regelungen zu mietfreien Zeiten innerhalb des Vertrages. Dieses AI Field ist für die Anwendungsfälle Real Estate gedacht und wurde auf gewerbliche Mietverträge und Änderungsverträge trainiert, die dem deutschen Recht unterliegen. Dieses AI Field wurde nicht von Zuva, sondern von CMS Hasche Sigle erstellt. Die letzte Aktualisierung erfolgte im 2018. Bitte beachten Sie, dass weder Zuva noch CMS Hasche Sigle verpflichtet sind, dieses AI Field zu aktualisieren oder zu warten.

name: Mietgegenstand
description: Dieses AI Field umfasst die Adresse, Lage und Fläche des Mietobjekts (inkl. mitvermieteter Bereiche). Dieses AI Field ist für die Anwendungsfälle Real Estate gedacht und wurde auf gewerbliche Mietverträge und Änderungsverträge trainiert, die dem deutschen Recht unterliegen. Dieses AI Field wurde nicht von Zuva, sondern von CMS Hasche Sigle erstellt. Die letzte Aktualisierung erfolgte im 2018. Bitte beachten Sie, dass weder Zuva noch CMS Hasche Sigle verpflichtet sind, dieses AI Field zu aktualisieren oder zu warten.

name: Miethöhe
description: Dieses AI Field umfasst sämtliche Regelungen zur Miethöhe inklusive mietfreier Zeiten, exklusive Zahlungsmodalitäten. Dieses AI Field ist für die Anwendungsfälle Real Estate und wurde auf gewerbliche Mietverträge und Änderungsverträge trainiert, die dem deutschen Recht unterliegen. Dieses AI Field wurde nicht von Zuva, sondern von CMS Hasche Sigle erstellt. Die letzte Aktualisierung erfolgte im 2021. Bitte beachten Sie, dass weder Zuva noch CMS Hasche Sigle verpflichtet sind, dieses AI Field zu aktualisieren oder zu warten.

name: Mietzweck
description: Dieses AI Field umfasst die Festlegung einer bestimmten Nutzung der Mietsache und ggf. Zustimmungspflicht bei einer Abweichung von dieser Nutzung. Dieses AI Field ist für die Anwendungsfälle Real Estate gedacht und wurde auf gewerbliche Mietverträge und Änderungsverträge trainiert, die dem deutschen Recht unterliegen. Dieses AI Field wurde nicht von Zuva, sondern von CMS Hasche Sigle erstellt. Die letzte Aktualisierung erfolgte im 2018. Bitte beachten Sie, dass weder Zuva noch CMS Hasche Sigle verpflichtet sind, dieses AI Field zu aktualisieren oder zu warten.

name: Minderung
description: Dieses AI Field umfasst Regelungen zur Minderung in Kauf- und Werkverträgen. Dieses AI Field ist für die Anwendungsfälle Real Estate gedacht und wurde auf gewerbliche Mietverträge und Änderungsverträge trainiert, die dem deutschen Recht unterliegen. Dieses AI Field wurde nicht von Zuva, sondern von CMS Hasche Sigle erstellt. Die letzte Aktualisierung erfolgte im 2018. Bitte beachten Sie, dass weder Zuva noch CMS Hasche Sigle verpflichtet sind, dieses AI Field zu aktualisieren oder zu warten.

name: Minimum Amount
description: This AI field captures the minimum amount allowed for incremental facilities/increases in commitment. This AI field does not capture similar provisions regarding refinance/replacement facilities, incremental notes, or incremental equivalent debt. It is recommended that this AI field be used together with the other Incremental Facility AI fields.

name: Minimum Gain Chargeback
description: This AI field captures a requirement that items of income or gain be specially allocated to partners/members who received (i) the benefit of nonrecourse deductions or (ii) distributions attributable to nonrecourse debt, if there is a decrease in partnership minimum gain during the relevant period.

name: Minimum Necessary Standard
description: This AI field captures provisions relating to each party’s obligation to limit the use and/or disclosure of protected health information to the minimum amount necessary. It does not capture detailed lists of exceptions to the minimum necessary requirement.

name: Minimum Purchase Amounts
description: This AI field captures the minimum amounts that must be purchased by a buyer or provided by a supplier, including consequences for failure to meet such requirements.

name: Minimum Transfer Amount
description: This AI field captures the minimum amount of collateral that is to be transferred at any given time to prevent costly transfers of low amounts of collateral in the Credit Support Annexes for International Swaps and Derivatives Association agreements.

name: Mitigation
description: This AI field captures the business associate’s obligation to mitigate the harmful effects of any unauthorized use or disclosure of protected health information. It does not capture provisions relating to the Red Flags Rule.

name: Mitveräußerung
description: Dieses AI Field umfasst das Recht bzw. die Pflicht eines Gesellschafters seine Anteile im Falle der Veräußerung von Anteilen eines anderen Gesellschafters mit zu veräußern. Dieses AI Field ist für die Anwendungsfälle Corporate M&A gedacht und wurde auf Gesellschaftsverträge, Gesellschaftervereinbarungen, Joint Venture Agreements, Beherrschungsverträge, Geschäftsführerverträge, Vorstandsverträge trainiert, die dem deutschen Recht unterliegen. Dieses AI Field wurde nicht von Zuva, sondern von CMS Hasche Sigle erstellt. Die letzte Aktualisierung erfolgte im 2017. Bitte beachten Sie, dass weder Zuva noch CMS Hasche Sigle verpflichtet sind, dieses AI Field zu aktualisieren oder zu warten.

name: Model Articles
description: This AI field captures the extent to which model articles are incorporated or excluded by articles of association in England and Wales. This AI field does not capture language which specifies changes to the articles of association.

name: Money Held in Trust
description: This AI field captures the provision specifying that the indenture trustee is not liable for interest on money held in trust and that such money need not be segregated unless required by law.

name: Most Favored Nation
description: This AI field captures a requirement that a party must receive rights and benefits that are equal to or more favorable than the rights and benefits received by any third parties.

name: Mudança/Alteração de Controle
description: Este campo de IA captura as consequências das mudanças no controle ou gestão de uma parte de um contrato. Este campo de IA tem como objetivo auxiliar na due diligence de M&A no Brasil e foi treinado utilizando acordos de acionistas. Este campo de IA não foi criado por Zuva, mas sim por Machado Meyer e foi atualizado pela última vez em de 2021. Observe que nem Zuva nem Machado Meyer têm obrigação de atualizar ou manter este campo de IA.

name: Multibranch Clause
description: This AI field captures whether or not the parties to an agreement are “Multibranch” parties in International Swaps and Derivatives Association agreements.

name: Nachfolgeregelungen
description: Dieses AI Field erfasst sämtliche Regelungen, die an den Tod eines Gesellschafters anknüpfen. Dieses AI Field ist für die Anwendungsfälle Corporate M&A gedacht und wurde auf Gesellschaftsverträge, Gesellschaftervereinbarungen, Joint Venture Agreements, Beherrschungsverträge, Geschäftsführerverträge und Vorstandsverträge trainiert, die dem deutschen Recht unterliegen. Dieses AI Field wurde nicht von Zuva, sondern von CMS Hasche Sigle erstellt. Die letzte Aktualisierung erfolgte im 2019. Bitte beachten Sie, dass weder Zuva noch CMS Hasche Sigle verpflichtet sind, dieses AI Field zu aktualisieren oder zu warten.

name: Name and Contact at Filer
description: This AI field captures the name and contact at the filer of the Uniform Commercial Code financing statement. It was trained on the standard UCC-1 forms. Redactions or poor font quality may impact the accuracy of this AI field.

name: Name of Partnership/Company
description: This AI field captures the name of a limited partnership or limited liability company.

name: Não-Aliciamento
description: Este campo de IA captura somente as cláusulas de não-solicitação / não-aliciamento, excluindo-se as exceções. Este campo de IA tem como objetivo auxiliar na due diligence de M&A no Brasil e foi treinado utilizando acordos de acionista, termos de uso, contratos de licenciamento e SPA's. Este campo de IA não foi criado por Zuva, mas sim por Machado Meyer e foi atualizado pela última vez em de 2021. Observe que nem Zuva nem Machado Meyer têm obrigação de atualizar ou manter este campo de IA.

name: Não-Concorrência
description: Este campo de IA captura cláusulas de não-concorrência / não-competição, excluindo-se as exceções. Este campo de IA tem como objetivo auxiliar na due diligence de M&A no Brasil e foi treinado utilizando acordos de acionista, termos de uso, contratos de licenciamento e SPA's. Este campo de IA não foi criado por Zuva, mas sim por Machado Meyer e foi atualizado pela última vez em de 2021. Observe que nem Zuva nem Machado Meyer têm obrigação de atualizar ou manter este campo de IA.

name: Não-Concorrência / Não-Aliciamento
description: Este campo de IA captura cláusulas de não-concorrência / não-competição e não-solicitação / não-aliciamento, excluindo-se as exceções. Este campo de IA tem como objetivo auxiliar na due diligence de M&A no Brasil e foi treinado utilizando acordos de acionista, termos de uso, contratos de licenciamento e SPA's. Este campo de IA não foi criado por Zuva, mas sim por Machado Meyer e foi atualizado pela última vez em de 2021. Observe que nem Zuva nem Machado Meyer têm obrigação de atualizar ou manter este campo de IA.

name: Nebentätigkeit
description: Dieses AI Field erfasst ein Nebentätigkeitsverbot bzw. Regelungen zu erlaubter Nebentätigkeit. Dieses AI Field ist für arbeitsrechtliche Anwendungsfälle gedacht und wurde auf Arbeitsverträge, Geschäftsführerverträge, sonstige Verträge und Vorstandsverträge trainiert, die dem deutschen Recht unterliegen. Dieses AI Field wurde nicht von Zuva, sondern von CMS Hasche Sigle erstellt. Die letzte Aktualisierung erfolgte im 2021. Bitte beachten Sie, dass weder Zuva noch CMS Hasche Sigle verpflichtet sind, dieses AI Field zu aktualisieren oder zu warten.

name: Negative Covenants
description: This AI field captures a borrower's negative covenants.

name: Net Lease
description: This AI field captures an agreement by a tenant that a lease is a net lease and that the tenant is responsible for operating costs, taxes and other expenses.

name: Net Lease/Obligations Unconditional — Equipment Lease
description: This AI field captures language stating that a lease is a net lease and that the lessee’s obligations under the lease are unconditional.

name: “Net Orderly Liquidation Value” Definition
description: This AI field captures the definitions of “Net Orderly Liquidation Value” or “Appraised Value” typically referenced in the borrowing base formula for asset-based loans.

name: “Net Sales” Definition
description: This AI field captures the definition of “Net Sales” and any provisions that modify the definition of “Net Sales” in a commercial agreement.

name: Netting of Payments
description: This AI field captures whether the multiple transaction payment netting provision applies in International Swaps and Derivatives Association agreements.

name: New Lease — Lender Right
description: This AI field captures a lender's right to obtain a new lease from a landlord following the termination of the lease between the landlord and tenant or rejection of the lease in bankruptcy.

name: Nichtangriffsklausel
description: Dieses AI Field erfasst die Möglichkeit des Sonderkündigungsrechtes im Falle eines Angriffs des LN auf die Lizenzmarke des LG, Verpflichtung des LN keine ähnlichen Schutzrechte anzumelden. Dieses AI Field ist für die Anwendungsfälle Intellectual Property gedacht und wurde auf gewerbliche Mietverträge und Änderungsverträge trainiert, die dem deutschen Recht unterliegen. Dieses AI Field wurde nicht von Zuva, sondern von CMS Hasche Sigle erstellt. Die letzte Aktualisierung erfolgte im 2018. Bitte beachten Sie, dass weder Zuva noch CMS Hasche Sigle verpflichtet sind, dieses AI Field zu aktualisieren oder zu warten.

name: No Burdensome Restriction Representation
description: This AI field captures a borrower's representations that it is not a party to any agreement that has or is reasonably likely to have a material adverse effect.

name: No Default Representation
description: This AI field captures representations that no existing or foreseeable default or event of default has occurred or is occuring, including with respect to any material agreements.

name: No Legal Obligation, Representation or Warranty
description: This AI field captures an acknowledgment by the parties that the agreement does not create any legal obligation, representation or warranty with respect to the associated transaction.

name: No Legal Proceedings Challenging Transaction Condition
description: This AI field captures a closing condition that no governmental authority has issued any order, taken any action or enacted any law that restrains, makes illegal or otherwise prohibits the consummation of the transaction contemplated by the agreement. This AI field will also capture a condition that there are no actions or proceedings by third parties seeking to restrain closing of the transaction.

name: No Material Adverse Change Condition
description: This AI field captures conditions of borrowing with respect to material adverse changes or effects and the requirement to include a no material adverse change representation in the credit agreement.

name: No Material Adverse Effect Condition
description: This AI field captures a closing condition that no material adverse effect or change has occurred since the signing of the agreement and that no event has occurred that has had or would reasonably be expected to result in a material adverse effect or change since the signing of the agreement.

name: Non-Cancellable Lease
description: This AI field captures provisions stating that a lessee may not cancel or terminate a lease during the term, including any waiver by the lessee of its right to cancel or terminate the lease.

name: Non-Compete
description: This AI field captures restrictions on a party’s ability to compete with another party. This AI field captures related definitions, such as "Competitor" and "Competing Products".

name: Non-Disparagement
description: This AI field captures an agreement that an employee or employer will not make negative remarks about the other.

name: Non-Disturbance/Quiet Enjoyment
description: This AI field captures the right of a tenant to peacefully occupy the leased premises, including after the sale or foreclosure of the property, and to have quiet enjoyment of the leased premises.

name: Nonrecourse Deductions
description: This AI field captures the manner in which deductions attributable to partnership/company property financed with nonrecourse debt will be allocated among the partners/members.

name: Non-Refundable Amounts
description: This AI field captures provisions relating to any payment, deposit, or other amount that is non-refundable under the terms of an agreement.

name: Non-Solicit
description: This AI field captures restrictive covenants not to solicit (typically customers or employees).

name: No-Shop
description: This AI field captures provisions prohibiting the facilitation or solicitation of competing offers to acquire the target business.

name: No-Shop — Prohibition/Strict Liability
description: This AI field captures provisions ascribing strict liability to target should any of its subsidiaries, employees, representatives, etc. breach the no-shop provision. This AI field also captures prohibited actions under the no shop provision, as well as the definition of “Representatives”.

name: Notice
description: This AI field captures notice provisions in an agreement, including notice address, if listed.

name: Notice Addresses — ISDA
description: This AI field captures the parties’ respective addresses for delivery of any notices in International Swaps and Derivatives Association agreements.

name: Notice Address — Party A
description: This AI field captures the notice address of Party A in International Swaps and Derivatives Association agreements.

name: Notice Address — Party B
description: This AI field captures the notice address of Party B in International Swaps and Derivatives Association agreements.

name: Notice by Issuer of Default
description: This AI field captures a covenant of an issuer to provide timely notice of default under an indenture, and information related to the default, to the trustee.

name: Notice — England
description: This AI field captures notice provisions in leases.

name: Notice of Acquisition Proposal/Recommendation Change
description: This AI field captures a target board’s obligation to notify the purchaser of the receipt of any competing offer, the occurrence of any intervening event, or its decision to change its recommendation in response to either of the foregoing.

name: Notice of Breaches Covenant
description: This AI field captures covenants of a party to give notice to another party in the event that it has breached the representations, warranties or covenants under the agreement, or becomes aware that a condition of closing cannot be satisfied.

name: Notice of Material Events Covenant
description: This AI field captures covenants of a borrower to notify a lender or agent of the occurrence of any material events including litigation proceedings, environmental claims or changes to its business that are likely to have a material adverse effect, or its default under the agreement.

name: Notice of Privacy Practices
description: This AI field captures provisions relating to the covered entity's obligation to notify the business associate of limitations in, or changes to, the covered entity’s notice of privacy practices.

name: Notice of Redemption — Bond Indenture
description: This AI field captures the notice requirements by the issuer to the holders of corporate debt securities regarding redemption of the securities.

name: Notice of Termination Without Cause or Good Reason
description: This AI field captures an employer's obligation to provide notice of termination without cause and an employee's obligation to provide notice of termination without good reason.

name: Notice Period — Extension Option
description: This AI field captures notice period requirements for maturity date extension options. It is recommended that this smart field be used together with the other Extension Option AI fields.

name: Notice Period Requirements
description: This AI field captures the notice period requirements for incremental facilities / increases in commitment. This AI field does not capture similar provisions regarding refinance / replacement facilities, incremental notes, or incremental equivalent debt.

name: Notices to Trustee — Bond Indenture
description: This AI field captures how notices are to be made by an issuer to the trustee of corporate debt securities regarding redemption of the securities. This AI field should be used in conjunction with the "Notice of Redemption" and "Notice" AI fields.

name: Notice Timing
description: This AI field captures when notice is deemed to be given by one party to another for the purposes of an agreement.

name: Notice to Holders
description: This AI field captures how communication and notice to holders shall be delivered.

name: Notificações
description: Este campo de IA captura as cláusulas de notificação/aviso em um contrato (excluindo o endereço do aviso, se listado). Este campo de IA tem como objetivo auxiliar na due diligence de M&A no Brasil e foi treinado utilizando contratos de concessão, franquia, fornecimento, locação, prestação de serviços, parceria, compra e venda, financeiros, societários e acordo de acionistas. Este campo de IA não foi criado por Zuva, mas sim por Machado Meyer e foi atualizado pela última vez em de 2021. Observe que nem Zuva nem Machado Meyer têm obrigação de atualizar ou manter este campo de IA.

name: Notification Time
description: This AI field captures the time by which certain notifications are to be made, such as the calculations required on a valuation date or a demain for a transfer of collateral in the Credit Support Annexes for International Swaps and Derivatives Association agreements.

name: Notification Upon Data Breach
description: This AI field captures a party's obligation to notify the other party upon a data breach and what information must be included in such notice, if stated. This AI field captures related definitions, such as "Security Breach", "Security Incident", and "Security Event". For data protection addenda, this AI field also captures notification obligations in the event of a court order or other action seeking access to data.

name: No Undisclosed Liabilities Representation
description: This AI field captures representations that there are no undisclosed liabilities of a business.

name: Number of Directors
description: This AI field captures the minimum and maximum number of directors permitted and whether this number may be changed. This AI field does not capture directors’ classes or the election/removal of directors. The election/removal of directors is captured by the "Board/Manager Selection" AI field.

name: Number of Option Shares
description: This AI field captures the number of shares that the option holder will have the right to purchase. This AI field field does not capture the total number of shares available for grant pursuant to the option plan, only the specific number of shares granted to the option holder.

name: Obligations — CSA
description: This AI field captures any obligations under other agreements that are to be secured by the subject collateral.

name: Obligations to Follow System Requirements
description: This AI field captures the franchisee’s operational obligations to manage the franchise in accordance with the franchise system requirements. This includes obligations related to day-to-day operations, products and services, repairs and maintenance, staffing and management, the franchise manual, computer systems, internet usage, and others. This AI field does not capture obligations related to franchise development and construction, marketing, intellectual property and use of marks, compliance with laws, permit and licensing, fees, audit and inspections, financial reporting and taxes, or insurance. For those obligations, it is recommended that you use existing AI fields covering those specific obligations.

name: Obrigações Adicionais
description: Este campo de IA captura obrigações adicionais estipuladas no contrato. Este campo de IA tem como objetivo auxiliar na due diligence de M&A no Brasil e foi treinado utilizando contratos financeiros. Este campo de IA não foi criado por Zuva, mas sim por Machado Meyer e foi atualizado pela última vez em de 2021. Observe que nem Zuva nem Machado Meyer têm obrigação de atualizar ou manter este campo de IA.

name: Offices — ISDA
description: This AI field captures the applicability of Section 10(a) of the International Swaps and Derivatives Association master agreement, which specifies that, notwithstanding the place of booking office or jurisdiction of incorporation of a party, the obligations of such party are the same as if it had entered into the transaction through its head or home office.

name: Ongoing Fee
description: This AI field captures provisions relating to ongoing fees or royalties that a franchisee is required to pay the franchisor. It includes ongoing marketing fees, training fees, and any other recurring fees. It does not capture penalties such as late payment fees.

name: Operating Covenant
description: This AI field captures a tenant's obligations to continuously use, occupy or remain open for business in the leased premises, events of default for failing to meet such obligations, and express rights of a tenant to “go dark”, cease operating or leave the leased premises vacant.

name: “Operating Expenses”/“Common Area Maintenance” Definition
description: This AI field captures the definition of “Operating Expenses” and/or “Common Area Maintenance”.

name: Opinions Condition
description: This AI field captures conditions of borrowing with respect to the delivery of legal opinions.

name: Optional Prepayment
description: This AI field captures a borrower's right to prepay a loan voluntarily.

name: Optional Redemption
description: This AI field captures redemption provisions at the election of an issuer of debt. This AI field does not capture other types of redemptions.

name: Option/Equity Grant
description: This AI field captures grants of options or equity to an employee pursuant to their employment agreement.

name: Optionsrechte
description: Dieses AI Field erfasst das Recht des Begünstigten, innerhalb eines bestimmten Zeitraums oder zu einem bestimmten Zeitpunkt vom Verkäufer die Erfüllung der Optionsvereinbarung zu verlangen. Dieses AI Field ist für die Anwendungsfälle Corporate M&A gedacht und wurde auf Gesellschaftsverträge, Gesellschaftervereinbarungen, Joint Venture Agreements, Beherrschungsverträge, Geschäftsführerverträge und Vorstandsverträge trainiert, die dem deutschen Recht unterliegen. Dieses AI Field wurde nicht von Zuva, sondern von CMS Hasche Sigle erstellt. Die letzte Aktualisierung erfolgte im 2018. Bitte beachten Sie, dass weder Zuva noch CMS Hasche Sigle verpflichtet sind, dieses AI Field zu aktualisieren oder zu warten.

name: Organizational Changes Covenant
description: This AI field captures covenants of a borrower not to amend its constitutional documents or change its name, jurisdiction or organizational structure.

name: Other Applicable CSAs
description: This AI field captures whether the parties have designated any other Credit Support Annex(es) as being applicable for the purposes of the 2016 Credit Support Annex for International Swaps and Derivatives Association agreements.

name: Other Eligible Support
description: This AI field captures whether any other eligible support (such as a letter of credit or a surety bond) may be used.

name: Other Interest Elections
description: This AI field captures the parties’ election with respect to negative interest and daily interest compounding in 2016 Credit Support Annexes for International Swaps and Derivatives Association agreements.

name: Other Remedies
description: This AI field captures remedies other than acceleration to enforce an indenture, whether a trustee may maintain a proceeding even if it does not possess any of the corporate debt securities or does not produce any of them in a proceeding, and whether a delay or omission by a trustee or any holder in exercising rights or remedies will impair the right or remedy, or constitute a waiver of or acquiescence in an event of default. This AI field also captures whether a remedy is exclusive of any other remedy, and whether all available remedies are cumulative.

name: Outgoings/Rates
description: This AI field captures a tenant's obligation to pay for outgoings and rates under a lease. This AI field captures the definition of "Outgoings".

name: Owned or Leased Real Property Representation
description: This AI field captures representations with respect to owned or leased real property.

name: Ownership of Confidential Information
description: This AI field captures an acknowledgment by the parties that ownership of confidential information is not transferred between them.

name: Ownership of Intellectual Property (Broad)
description: This AI field captures a party's intellectual property ownership rights under an agreement. This AI field captures related definitions, such as "Intellectual Property", "Trademarks", and "Patents". This AI field does not capture the assignment of intellectual property rights.

name: Ownership of Intellectual Property — Definitions
description: This AI field captures the definitions of “Intellectual Property”, “Trademarks”, “Patents”, "Know How", and similar terms.

name: Ownership of Intellectual Property (Narrow)
description: This AI field captures a party's intellectual property ownership rights under an agreement. This AI field does not capture related definitions. Intellectual property definitions are captured by the Ownership of Intellectual Property — Definitions AI field.

name: Packaging Requirements
description: This AI field captures a party’s requirements for the packaging of goods, including labelling, costs, and specific procedures to be followed.

name: Parking
description: This AI field captures a tenant’s parking rights and associated fees and restrictions, and the landlord’s ability to relocate the parking spaces.

name: Parking — England
description: This AI field captures a tenant’s parking rights and associated fees and restrictions, and the landlord’s ability to relocate the parking spaces.

name: Parteien (weit)
description: Dieses AI Field erfasst die Parteien des Vertrages bzw. Firma der Gesellschaft. Dieses AI Field ist für Anwendungsfälle in den Bereichen Immobilien, Unternehmens-M&A, geistiges Eigentum, Gewerbe und Arbeitsrecht gedacht und wurde auf gewerbliche Mietverträge, Änderungsverträge, Gesellschaftsverträge, Gesellschaftervereinbarungen, Joint Venture Agreements, Beherrschungsverträge, Geschäftsführerverträge, Vorstandsverträge, Abgrenzungsvereinbarungen, Vorrechtsvereinbarungen, Kooperationsvertrag, Lizenzverträge, Markenübertragungsverträge, Markenkaufverträge, Patentübertragungsverträge, Softwareentwicklungsverträge, Softwareüberlassungsverträge, sonstige Verträge, Urheberrechtsverträge, Einkaufsbedingungen, Handelsvertreterverträge, Kaufverträge, Kooperationsverträge, Lieferbedingungen, Lieferverträge, Rahmenvereinbarungen, Verkaufsbedingungen, Vertriebsverträge, Werkverträge, Arbeitsverträge, Geschäftsführerverträge, sonstige Verträge und Vorstandsverträge trainiert, die dem deutschen Recht unterliegen. Dieses AI Field wurde nicht von Zuva, sondern von CMS Hasche Sigle erstellt. Die letzte Aktualisierung erfolgte am im 2018. Bitte beachten Sie, dass weder Zuva noch CMS Hasche Sigle verpflichtet sind, dieses AI Field zu aktualisieren oder zu warten.

name: Parteiwechsel/Vertragsübernahme
description: Dieses AI Field umfasst Regelungen zum Wechsel des Vermieters oder Mieters. Dieses AI Field ist für die Anwendungsfälle Real Estate gedacht und wurde auf gewerbliche Mietverträge und Änderungsverträge trainiert, die dem deutschen Recht unterliegen. Dieses AI Field wurde nicht von Zuva, sondern von CMS Hasche Sigle erstellt. Die letzte Aktualisierung erfolgte im 2018. Bitte beachten Sie, dass weder Zuva noch CMS Hasche Sigle verpflichtet sind, dieses AI Field zu aktualisieren oder zu warten.

name: Partes
description: Este campo de IA captura as partes envolvidas nos contratos, incluindo seus dados, tais como endereço, CPF ou CNPJ etc. Este campo de IA tem como objetivo auxiliar na due diligence de M&A no Brasil e foi treinado utilizando contratos de concessão, franquia, fornecimento, locação, prestação de serviços, parceria, compra e venda, financeiros, societários e acordo de acionistas. Este campo de IA não foi criado por Zuva, mas sim por Machado Meyer e foi atualizado pela última vez em de 2021. Observe que nem Zuva nem Machado Meyer têm obrigação de atualizar ou manter este campo de IA.

name: Participant Approval
description: This AI field captures waivers, amendments and other actions requiring the consent of a party obtaining rights under a participation.

name: Participations
description: This AI field captures a lender's right to sell sub-participations in a loan and any associated requirements, including maintenance of a participation register.

name: Parties
description: This AI field captures the names of the parties to an agreement.

name: Parties (Quebec)
description: Ce champ AI enregistre le nom des différentes parties. Il a été entraîné sur des ententes d'approvisionnement, des contrats de service, des contrats de distribution, des contrats de propriété intellectuelle, des contrats de travail et des contrats d'achat régis par les lois de la province de Québec.

name: Partner Minimum Gain Chargeback
description: This AI field captures a requirement that items of income or gain be specially allocated to partners/members who received (i) the benefit of partner nonrecourse deductions or (ii) distributions attributable to partner nonrecourse debt, if there is a decrease in partner nonrecourse debt minimum gain during the relevant period.

name: Partner Nonrecourse Deductions
description: This AI field captures a requirement that any partner nonrecourse deductions be allocated to those partners/members who bear the economic risk of loss with respect to the partner nonrecourse liabilities to which such deductions are attributable.

name: Partnership/Company Expenses
description: This AI field captures provisions relating to a limited partnership or limited liability company’s obligation to pay its ongoing business or operating expenses, including the obligation to reimburse the general partner or manager (or a director, committee member, etc. where applicable) for any such expenses incurred on its behalf. This AI field does not capture management fees paid to the general partner or manager, non-reimbursable expenses of the partners/members, capital contributions to fund expenses, or expense-related definitions.

name: Partnership/Company Records & Audit Rights
description: This AI field captures provisions relating to a limited partnership or limited liability company’s obligation to maintain books and records, and the rights of partners or members to inspect or otherwise gain access to such books and records.

name: Partnership/Company Term
description: This AI field captures the term of a limited partnership or limited liability company.

name: Pay in Lieu of Notice
description: This AI field captures an employer's right to compensate an employee in lieu of providing notice of termination.

name: Payment Blockage
description: This AI field captures a provision providing holders of senior debt the right to block payment of junior debt under specified circumstances provided in an indenture.

name: Payment Due Dates
description: This AI field captures when payments are due under an agreement.

name: Payment Method
description: This AI field captures the method by which payments can be made under an agreement.

name: Payment of Additional Amounts/Additional Interest Covenant
description: This AI field captures a covenant of an issuer or guarantor to pay the full amounts due on the debt issued pursuant to an indenture, including provision for additional amounts related to deductions or withholdings imposed by a taxing jurisdiction. This AI field also captures the additional interest provision.

name: Payment of Fees Condition
description: This AI field captures conditions of borrowing with respect to payment of fees.

name: Payment of Fees Condition — Credit Agreement
description: This AI field captures conditions of borrowing with respect to the payment of fees owing by the borrower to the lenders or agents.

name: Payment of Securities Covenant
description: This AI field captures a covenant of an issuer to pay all amounts due on debt issued pursuant to an indenture, and related matters.

name: Payment of Taxes Covenant
description: This AI field captures covenants of a borrower to promptly pay all taxes and other governmental charges.

name: Payments for Consent Covenant
description: This AI field captures a covenant disallowing an issuer to limit the offer of payment for any consent, waiver or amendment of any of an indenture terms to less than all of the debt holders.

name: Payments on Early Termination — ISDA
description: This AI field captures the way in which close-out payments are to be calculated in International Swaps and Derivatives Association agreements.

name: Pensions and Benefits Representation
description: This AI field captures representations with respect to pension and benefit matters.

name: Pensions and Benefits Representation — Credit Agreement
description: This AI field captures representations with respect to pension and benefit matters.

name: Percentage Rent
description: This AI field captures a tenant's obligation to pay percentage rent.

name: Perdas e Danos
description: Este campo de IA captura o montante financeiro relativo às perdas e danos, que serão pagos por uma parte a outra caso haja alguma violação ou descumprimento de obrigação contratual. Este campo de IA tem como objetivo auxiliar na due diligence de M&A no Brasil e foi treinado utilizando contratos de concessão, franquia, fornecimento, locação, prestação de serviços, parceria, compra e venda, acordo de acionistas e contratos financeiros. Este campo de IA não foi criado por Zuva, mas sim por Machado Meyer e foi atualizado pela última vez em de 2021. Observe que nem Zuva nem Machado Meyer têm obrigação de atualizar ou manter este campo de IA.

name: Perfected Security Interest Condition
description: This AI field captures conditions of borrowing with respect to the perfection of security interests granted in connection with a loan.

name: Performance Obligation — Services
description:
This AI field captures a party’s promise to “provide”, “perform”, or “render” services under an agreement, a party’s obligation to continue providing services upon termination of an agreement including the obligation to provide termination or transition services, and a party’s agreement to serve as agent of another. 

This AI field does not capture provisions relating to any pricing with respect to services, long lists or detailed descriptions of services such as those commonly found in statements of work or schedules to a service agreement, but it should generally help users locate such lists or descriptions, or in most cases, any definitions relating to services. 

When considering performance obligations for the purposes of IFRS 15 or ASC 606, or any similar accounting standard, it is recommended that this AI field be used in conjunction with the Performance Obligation — Supplies, Purchases and Sales and License Grant AI fields.

name: Performance Obligation — Supplies, Purchases and Sales
description:
This AI field captures a party’s promise to supply, sell or purchase goods or products under an agreement, and a party’s obligation to continue supplying, selling or purchasing goods or products upon termination of an agreement, any minimum purchase obligations, and provisions relating to failure or inability to supply. 

This AI field does not capture provisions relating to delivery terms, forecasts or purchase orders, except where the provision makes it clear that a forecast or purchase order creates a binding obligation, pricing with respect to goods or products, or in most cases, any defined terms relating to goods or products. 

When considering performance obligations for the purposes of IFRS 15 or ASC 606 (or any similar accounting standard), this AI field should be used in conjunction with the "Performance Obligation — Services" and "License Grant" AI fields.

name: “Permitted Acquisitions” Definition
description: This AI field captures the definition and conditions of “Permitted Acquisitions”.

name: Permitted Alterations/Additions
description: This AI field captures a tenant’s right to make alterations or additions to the leased premises, or restrictions on such actions by a tenant, and associated landlord consent and notice requirements. This AI field does not capture provisions relating to the construction of initial tenant improvements pursuant to a work letter, or tenant maintenance and repair obligations.

name: Permitted Amendments — Extension Option
description: This AI field captures permissions for maturity date extension option amendments. It is recommended that this AI field be used together with the other Extension Option AI fields.

name: “Permitted Discretion” Definition
description: This AI field captures the definition of “Permitted Discretion”.

name: “Permitted Encumbrance” Definition
description: This AI field captures the definition of "Permitted Encumbrances" or "Permitted Liens".

name: “Permitted Investments” Definition
description: This AI field captures the definition of “Permitted Investments”.

name: Permitted/Prohibited Alterations
description: This AI field captures whether structural and non-structural alterations are permitted/prohibited under a lease. This AI field does not capture specific alterations to signage, waste, electrics, plant, and service media.

name: Permitted Subletting and Transfers
description: This AI field captures a tenant’s express right to sublet, assign, encumber, or otherwise transfer the leased premises.

name: Permitted Use
description: This AI field captures the permitted use of the leased premises, whether a change of the use is permitted, and limitations on consent to the change of use.

name: Permitted Use and Disclosure
description: This AI field captures provisions that set out the purposes for which protected health information may be used or disclosed. It also captures restrictive provisions that limit the permitted use or disclosure of protected health information to that which is (i) provided for by the business associate agreement; or (ii) required by law. It does not capture (i) notification or consent obligations prior to disclosure; (ii) disclosure to plan sponsors; or (iii) confidentiality requirements pursuant to any applicable state laws.

name: Permitted Use of Data/Confidential Information
description: This AI field captures the permitted use and purpose for collecting and storing data or confidential information, and restrictions on the ability of a party to use the data or confidential information for other purposes.

name: Personnel/Third Party Confidentiality Requirements
description: This AI field captures a requirement that personnel and third parties, including auditors and subcontractors, enter into confidentiality agreements or undergo information security training.

name: Place of Work/Mobility Clause
description: This AI field captures an employee’s place of work and whether it can be changed during the course of employment.

name: Position/Title
description: This AI field captures an employee’s position or title.

name: Post-Closing Compensation/Benefits
description: This AI field captures a purchaser’s covenant to provide post-closing compensation and benefits to certain continuing target employees. This AI field is designed to be used in conjunction with the "Duration of Guaranteed Compensation/Benefits" AI field.
