name: Post-Closing Representation of Shareholders
description: This AI field captures an agreement by the parties that, in the event of a post-closing dispute, the target company and/or purchaser waives the potential conflict of interest arising out of any representation of the target company’s shareholders by legal counsel to the target company and its shareholders in connection with the transaction, and the target company and/or purchaser’s consent for such legal counsel to represent the target company’s shareholders post-closing.

name: Post Term Non-Compete
description: This AI field captures covenants restricting the franchisee from competing with the franchised business once the term of the franchise agreement expires or is terminated.

name: Power and Authority Representation
description: This AI field captures representations that a loan party/obligor has all requisite power and authority to enter into the agreement and that all necessary internal authorizations and approvals have been obtained for that purpose.

name: Power of Attorney
description: This AI field captures an agreement by a limited partner or member to appoint the general partner or manager as its attorney-in-fact, and the specific delegated powers vested in the general partner or manager as attorney.

name: Präambel
description: Dieses AI Field umfasst Informationen aus der Präambel. Dieses AI Field ist für Anwendungsfälle Real Estate, Corporate M&A, Commercial und Arbeitsrecht gedacht und wurde auf gewerbliche Mietverträge, Änderungsverträge, Gesellschaftsverträge, Gesellschaftervereinbarungen, Joint Venture Agreements, Beherrschungsverträge, Geschäftsführerverträge, Vorstandsverträge, Einkaufsbedingungen, Handelsvertreterverträge, Kaufverträge, Kooperationsverträge, Lieferbedingungen, Lieferverträge, Rahmenvereinbarungen, Verkaufsbedingungen, Vertriebsverträge, Werkverträge, Arbeitsverträge, Geschäftsführerverträge, sonstige Verträge und Vorstandsverträge trainiert, die dem deutschen Recht unterliegen. Dieses AI Field wurde nicht von Zuva, sondern von CMS Hasche Sigle erstellt. Die letzte Aktualisierung erfolgte im 2018. Bitte beachten Sie, dass weder Zuva noch CMS Hasche Sigle verpflichtet sind, dieses AI Field zu aktualisieren oder zu warten.

name: Prazo e Renovação
description: Este campo de IA captura o prazo inicial de um contrato e quaisquer extensões ou renovações. Este campo de IA tem como objetivo auxiliar na due diligence de M&A no Brasil e foi treinado utilizando contratos financeiros, de franquia, de concessão, acordos de acionistas e SPA's. Este campo de IA não foi criado por Zuva, mas sim por Machado Meyer e foi atualizado pela última vez em de 2021. Observe que nem Zuva nem Machado Meyer têm obrigação de atualizar ou manter este campo de IA.

name: Prazo Inicial
description: Este campo de IA captura o prazo inicial de um contrato, excluindo quaisquer renovações. Este campo de IA tem como objetivo auxiliar na due diligence de M&A no Brasil e foi treinado utilizando contratos de franquia, concessão, financeiros, acordos de acionistas e SPA's. Este campo de IA não foi criado por Zuva, mas sim por Machado Meyer e foi atualizado pela última vez em de 2021. Observe que nem Zuva nem Machado Meyer têm obrigação de atualizar ou manter este campo de IA.

name: Preço
description: Este campo de IA captura disposições de preços, incluindo os conceitos de preço, taxa ou royalties. Ele também captura a moeda de pagamento, mas não captura as condições de pagamento. Este campo de IA tem como objetivo auxiliar na due diligence de M&A no Brasil e foi treinado utilizando usados contratos de concessão, franquia, fornecimento, locação, prestação de serviços, parceria, compra e venda e acordo de acionistas. Este campo de IA não foi criado por Zuva, mas sim por Machado Meyer e foi atualizado pela última vez em de 2021. Observe que nem Zuva nem Machado Meyer têm obrigação de atualizar ou manter este campo de IA.

name: Pre-emptive Rights
description: This AI field captures pre-emptive rights, being the rights of existing security holders to participate in new issuances of company securities. This AI field is intended to be used on Shareholders' Agreements. To capture pre-emptive rights within Articles and Bylaws, the "Pre-emptive Rights — Articles & Bylaws" AI field should be used.

name: Pre-Emptive Rights — Articles & Bylaws
description: This AI field captures pre-emptive rights, being the rights of existing security holders to participate in new issuances of company securities. This AI field is intended to be used on Articles and Bylaws. To capture pre-emptive rights within Shareholders' Agreements, the "Pre-emptive Rights" AI field should be used.

name: Preferential Collection of Claims Against Company
description: This AI field captures a requirement that an indenture trustee and any former indenture trustee comply with provisions in the Trust Indenture Act relating to preferential collection of claims against an issuer.

name: Premises Type
description: This AI field captures the type of premises demised.

name: Prepayment of Indebtedness Covenant
description: This AI field captures covenants of a borrower not to prepay any indebtedness other than indebtedness owing to the lenders under the agreement.

name: Prepayment Premium/Call Protection
description: This AI field captures loan prepayment premiums or call protections. This AI field does not capture references to customary breakage fees.

name: Prepayment Sharing and Priority in Security and Right of Payment — Extension Option
description: This AI field captures the way in which voluntary and mandatory prepayments are to be treated, and the treatment of security and right of payment for maturity date extension options. This AI field is designed to be used in conjunction with the other Extension Option AI fields.

name: Price Increases/Escalation
description: This AI field captures provisions relating to price increases during the term of an agreement and for any additional term(s).

name: Pricing
description: This AI field captures pricing provisions in an agreement, including the concepts of price, fee or royalty, and the currency of payment. This AI field does not capture payment terms. Payment terms are captured by the Pay Due Dates and Payment Method AI fields.

name: Principal Address/Registered Agent Name
description: This AI field captures the address of the registered office of the corporation and the name of the registered agent for service of process.

name: Principal Office
description: This AI field captures information regarding the principal office of a limited partnership or limited liability company.

name: Priority in Security and Right of Payment — Incremental Facility
description: This AI field captures the treatment of security and right of payment for incremental facilities / increases in commitment. This AI field does not capture similar provisions regarding refinance / replacement facilities, incremental notes, or incremental equivalent debt. It is recommended that this smart field be used together with the other Incremental Facility smart fields.

name: Privacy Officer
description: This AI field captures provisions or references to a privacy or data protection officer at an organization, including the obligation to appoint someone to this role.

name: Privacy Rule Compliance
description: This AI field captures the business associate’s obligation to comply with applicable requirements of the Privacy Rule to the extent the business associate carries out an obligation of the covered entity under the Privacy Rule.

name: Probezeit
description: Dieses AI Field erfasst Regelungen zur Dauer der Probezeit. Dieses AI Field ist für arbeitsrechtliche Anwendungsfälle gedacht und wurde auf Arbeitsverträge, Geschäftsführerverträge, sonstige Verträge und Vorstandsverträge trainiert, die dem deutschen Recht unterliegen. Dieses AI Field wurde nicht von Zuva, sondern von CMS Hasche Sigle erstellt. Die letzte Aktualisierung erfolgte im 2018. Bitte beachten Sie, dass weder Zuva noch CMS Hasche Sigle verpflichtet sind, dieses AI Field zu aktualisieren oder zu warten.

name: Procedimento para Rescisão
description: Este campo de IA captura o procedimento a ser seguido em caso de resolução do contrato. Este campo de IA tem como objetivo auxiliar na due diligence de M&A no Brasil e foi treinado utilizando contratos de fornecimento, franquia, prestação de serviços, financiamento, compra e venda, locação e acordo de acionistas. Este campo de IA não foi criado por Zuva, mas sim por Machado Meyer e foi atualizado pela última vez em de 2021. Observe que nem Zuva nem Machado Meyer têm obrigação de atualizar ou manter este campo de IA.

name: Procedure for Reimbursement
description: This AI field captures the procedure by which a lender may be reimbursed by a borrower in the event that its costs have increased.

name: Procedures for Data Subject Requests
description: This AI field captures the procedures for how the parties will deal with requests from data subjects in the context of data protection/privacy.

name: Process Agent — Party A
description: This AI field captures the process agent of Party A in International Swaps and Derivatives Association agreements.

name: Process Agent — Party B
description: This AI field captures the process agent of Party B in International Swaps and Derivatives Association agreements.

name: Process Agents
description: This AI field captures whether a party must use a process agent in International Swaps and Derivatives Association agreements, which will only be required for a party which is not based within the governing jurisdiction.

name: “Processing” Definition
description: This AI field captures the definition of “Processing” in the context of data protection.

name: “Processor” Definition
description: This AI field captures the definition of “Processor” in the context of data protection.

name: Product Pricing
description: This AI field captures provisions that set out franchisee’s obligations for establishing the prices of the products/services.

name: Product Returns
description: This AI field captures provisions relating to the return of products generally, and on termination. This AI field captures related definitions.

name: Professional Liability/Errors and Omissions Insurance
description: This AI field captures a party’s obligation to obtain professional liability or errors and omissions insurance, including after termination of the agreement. This AI field does not capture insurance-related indemnity obligations.

name: “Profit/Loss” Definition
description: This AI field captures the definition of “Profit” and “Loss”. This AI field captures related definitions such as “Income”, “Gain”, “Taxable Income” and “Taxable Loss”.

name: Prohibited Use
description: This AI field captures prohibitions on specific uses of the leased premises, and uses prohibited at the landlord’s discretion. This AI field does not capture boilerplate rules such as prohibitions on hazardous materials, animals, noise, vibrations, general nuisances, etc.

name: Proof of Compliance
description: This AI field captures the obligation of a party to demonstrate its compliance with, or the ability of a party to monitor or audit the other party’s compliance with, data protection provisions in the agreement. This AI field was was designed to be used on data protection addenda and may generate false positives on other agreement types.

name: Publicity
description: This AI field captures the procedures for issuing press releases or making public announcements concerning the relationship of the parties to an agreement, including the use of each other’s logos.

name: Purchase Option
description: This AI field captures provisions outlining the franchisor’s option to purchase assets of the business or the franchised entity upon termination.

name: Purchase Options and Rights of First Refusal/First Offer - Lease
description: This smart field captures a tenant's (or lessee's) option to purchase leased property as well as rights of first offer or refusal to purchase the same. It can be used in combination with the 'Does the lease contain a purchase option in favour of Tenant/Lessee?' and 'Does the lease contain a purchase ROFO/ROFR?' answer fields. This smart field was trained on North American commercial real estate leases and equipment leases.

name: Purchase Order Changes/Cancellation
description: This AI field captures a party’s rights to change or cancel purchase orders.

name: Purchase Order Requirements
description: This AI field captures items that must be included in a purchase order.

name: Purchase Price Adjustments
description: This AI field captures all categories of purchase price adjustments, including earnouts and working capital adjustments.

name: Purchase Price Adjustments — Post-Closing
description: This AI field captures adjustments to a purchase price that occur after closing.

name: Purchase Price Adjustments — Pre-Closing
description: This AI field captures adjustments to a purchase price that occur between signing of a purchase agreement and closing.

name: “Qualified ECP Guarantor” Definition
description: This AI field captures the definition of “Qualified ECP Guarantor” in the context of eligible contract participants under the U.S. Commodity Exchange Act rules and similar rules.

name: Qualified Income Offset
description: This AI field captures the requirement that any partner or member who unexpectedly receives certain adjustments, allocations or distributions for U.S. tax purposes be specially allocated offsetting amounts of gross income and gain sufficient to eliminate any resulting capital account deficit.

name: Quiet Enjoyment
description: This AI field captures a tenant's right to peacefully occupy and to have quiet enjoyment of the leased premises.

name: Quiet Enjoyment — Equipment Lease
description: This AI field captures a lessee’s right of quiet enjoyment and non-interference during the term of the lease.

name: Quorum at Committee Meetings
description: This AI field captures the requirements for establishing quorum at committee meetings. This AI field does not capture voting thresholds at committee meetings.

name: Quorum at Directors' Meetings
description: This AI field captures the requirements for establishing quorum at directors meetings. This AI field does not capture voting thresholds at directors meetings. Voting thresholds at directors meetings are captured by the "Voting at Directors Meeting" AI field.

name: Quorum at Shareholders' Meetings
description: This AI field captures the requirements for establishing quorum at shareholders meetings. This AI field does not capture voting thresholds at shareholders meetings.

name: “Real Estate” Definition
description: This AI field captures the definition of “Real Estate” or “Real Property”.

name: “Real Property Leases” Definition
description: This AI field captures the definition of "Real Property Leases" which includes both the definition of the lease and the leased premises in connection with the transaction.

name: Recalls
description: This AI field captures product recall provisions. This AI field does not capture product defects and returns.

name: Recapture
description: This AI field captures a landlord's right to recapture premises in the event a tenant proposes to transfer or sublease a portion of the premises.

name: Recipient Confidentiality Obligations
description: This AI field captures confidentiality obligations of a recipient of confidential information.

name: Record Date
description: This AI field captures the rules for setting a record date to establish which shareholders are entitled to vote at a shareholders meeting or receive dividends/distributions. This AI field captures related definitions.

name: Reduction for Insurance Proceeds
description: This AI field captures provisions that reduce the amount of damages payable to an indemnified party for any insurance proceeds received by the indemnifying party in connection with a loss.

name: Reduction for Tax Benefits
description: This AI field captures provisions that reduce the amount of damages payable to an indemnified party for any tax benefits received by the indemnifying party in connection with a loss.

name: Refinancing Facilities
description: This AI field captures a borrower's right to refinance a loan.

name: Registered Agent
description: This smart field captures information regarding the registered agent of a limited partnership or limited liability company.

name: Registered Office
description: This smart field captures information regarding the registered office of a limited partnership or limited liability company.

name: Registration Rights
description: This AI field captures registration rights, being the right of a shareholder to require a company to publicly list the shareholder’s shares for sale. This AI field captures related definitions.

name: Regular Settlement Day — Transfer Timing
description: This AI field captures the definition of “Regular Settlement Day” for the purposes of a transfer of Eligible Credit Support or Equivalent Credit Support in 2016 Credit Support Annexes for International Swaps and Derivatives Association agreements.

name: Regulatory Approval Covenant
description: This AI field captures a party’s covenant to cooperate to obtain regulatory approvals.

name: Regulatory Approvals Condition
description: This AI field captures conditions of borrowing with respect to obtaining regulatory approvals.

name: Reimbursement
description: This AI field captures a party’s obligation to reimburse another for costs or expenses under an agreement, including an obligation to assume the costs or expenses of another.

name: Reimbursement — Lease Accounting
description: This AI field captures a party’s obligation to reimburse another for costs or expenses under a lease, and a party’s obligation to assume the costs or expenses of another. This AI field does not capture rights of reimbursement from third party sources such as proceeds of insurance or sale.

name: Related Parties Representation
description: This AI field captures representations that a party has not engaged in transactions with related parties other than as disclosed.

name: Relationship Between Parties Representation
description: This AI field captures representations relating to the independence of the parties in entering into the transactions contemplated by the master agreement, including that each party (i) is acting independently and for its own account, (ii) has not relied on advice or recommendations of the other party with respect to any transaction, (iii) is capable of assessing the merits and understanding the risks of each transaction, and (iv) is not acting as the agent or fiduciary of the other party, in International Swaps and Derivatives Association agreements.

name: Relief from Automatic Stay
description: This AI field captures an agreement by junior creditors not to seek relief from the automatic stay in a bankruptcy/insolvency proceeding.

name: Relocation
description: This AI field captures a landlord’s right to relocate a tenant within a building.

name: Remedies Upon Event of Default — Credit Agreement
description: This AI field captures the rights and remedies available to lenders or agents in the event that a borrower defaults under an agreement.

name: Remedies Upon Event of Default — Equipment Lease
description: This AI field captures the remedies to which a lessor and a lessee, if applicable, is entitled to, upon the occurrence of an event of default.

name: Removal of Directors
description: This AI field captures the ability of directors or shareholders to remove a director, with or without cause. This AI field does not capture references to resignation and disqualification by reason of bankruptcy, illness, criminal activity, or the applicability of specific laws.

name: Removal of Officers
description: This AI field captures the ability of directors or shareholders to remove an officer, with or without cause. This AI field does not capture references to resignation and disqualification by reason of bankruptcy, illness, criminal activity, or the applicability of specific laws.

name: Renewal
description: This AI field captures renewal or extension provisions in an agreement, whether automatic or requiring notice by a party. This AI field does not capture renewal provisions that require the mutual agreement of the parties.

name: Renewal — Lease
description: This AI field captures a tenant’s renewal or extension rights.

name: Renovação
description: Este campo de IA captura cláusulas de renovação ou extensão em um contrato, seja automático ou exigindo notificação por uma parte. Este campo de IA tem como objetivo auxiliar na due diligence de M&A no Brasil e foi treinado utilizando contratos de concessão, franquia, fornecimento, locação, prestação de serviços, parceria, compra e venda, financeiros e acordo de acionistas. Este campo de IA não foi criado por Zuva, mas sim por Machado Meyer e foi atualizado pela última vez em de 2021. Observe que nem Zuva nem Machado Meyer têm obrigação de atualizar ou manter este campo de IA.

name: Renovação Automática
description: Este campo de IA captura quaisquer disposições de renovação automática, incluindo renovações ou extensões sucessivas quando nenhuma ação é tomada pelas partes. Este campo de IA tem como objetivo auxiliar na due diligence de M&A no Brasil e foi treinado utilizando contratos de concessão, franquia, financeiros, acordos de acionistas e SPA's. Este campo de IA não foi criado por Zuva, mas sim por Machado Meyer e foi atualizado pela última vez em de 2021. Observe que nem Zuva nem Machado Meyer têm obrigação de atualizar ou manter este campo de IA.

name: Rent — Equipment Lease
description: This AI field captures the rent payable by a lessee, including additional rent, holdover rent and deposits.

name: Rent Free Period — Peppercorn Rent
description: This AI field captures peppercorn rent, free rent and de minimus rent provisions.

name: Rent Free Period — Rent Commencement Date (Definition)
description: This AI field captures the definition of “Rent Commencement Date” and any free rent period (however, when this information is located in a table, the AI field will occasionally only capture the term “Rent Commencement Date” and not the date itself).

name: Rent Free Period — Rent Commencement Date (Operative)
description: This AI field captures the operative component of the rent commencement date.

name: Rent Payment Date
description: This AI field captures the recurring payment date for base rent installments under a lease. This AI field does not capture the payment date for any initial installment or down payment of base rent or any payment date for payments other than base rent, such as taxes or operating expenses.

name: Rent Review — Assumptions
description: This AI field captures the assumptions of a rent review.

name: Rent Review — Basis
description: This AI field captures the basis of any rent review and any relevant equation of such basis. This AI field captures relevant definitions.

name: Rent Review — Date
description: The AI field captures the rent review date.

name: Rent Review — Disregards
description: This AI field captures the disregards of a rent review.

name: Repair and Maintenance — Equipment Lease
description: This AI field captures a lessee’s repair and maintenance obligations under a lease.

name: Repairing Obligations
description: This AI field captures a tenant's obligation to repair the premises. This AI field does not capture the manner of repair or specific obligations regarding fixtures and fittings, and similar obligations.

name: Replacement of Lenders/Yank a Bank Procedure
description: This AI field captures the circumstances under which a borrower may replace a lender and the procedures to effect such replacement.

name: Replacement of Non-Consenting Lenders
description: This AI field captures a borrower's right to replace a lender that does not consent to a waiver or amendment that has been agreed to by the majority or required lenders.

name: Replacement of Trustee
description: This AI field captures the removal and resignation of an indenture trustee, and the appointment and acceptance by a successor indenture trustee.

name: Reporting Requirements
description: This AI field captures a borrower's reporting requirements.

name: Reports and Other Information Covenant
description: This AI field captures a covenant of an issuer to deliver specified information, documents and reports with the trustee and appropriate regulatory agencies, as applicable.

name: Reports by an Issuer
description: This AI field captures reporting requirements of an issuer.

name: Reports by a Trustee
description: This AI field captures a requirement that an indenture trustee provide reports to the holders in compliance with the Trust Indenture Act.

name: Representation and Warranty Insurance
description: This AI field captures provisions referencing representation and warranty insurance to be obtained in connection with a transaction.

name: Representations and Warranties — Commitment Letter
description: This AI field captures a borrower's list of representations and warranties that must be included in the credit agreement.

name: “Representatives” Definition
description: This AI field captures the definition of “Representatives” or the parties with whom confidential information may be shared by the recipient.

name: Requests to Restrict
description: This AI field captures provisions relating to the covered entity’s obligation to notify the business associate of restrictions on the use or disclosure of protected health information, and the business associate’s obligation to comply with such restrictions.

name: Required Lender Approval
description: This AI field captures waivers, amendments and other actions requiring the consent of a majority of the lenders, or those lenders included in the definition of “Required Lenders”.

name: “Required Lenders”/“Majority Lenders” Definition
description: This AI field captures the definitions of “Required Lenders” and “Majority Lenders”.

name: Rescisão
description: Este campo de IA captura, de modo geral, as cláusulas de rescisão do contrato. Este campo de IA tem como objetivo auxiliar na due diligence de M&A no Brasil e foi treinado utilizando contratos de fornecimento, franquia, prestação de serviços, financiamento, compra e venda, locação e acordo de acionistas. Este campo de IA não foi criado por Zuva, mas sim por Machado Meyer e foi atualizado pela última vez em de 2021. Observe que nem Zuva nem Machado Meyer têm obrigação de atualizar ou manter este campo de IA.

name: Rescisão Imotivada
description: Este campo de IA captura o direito da parte de rescindir o contrato sem justificativa de quaisquer das partes. Este campo de IA tem como objetivo auxiliar na due diligence de M&A no Brasil e foi treinado utilizando contratos de fornecimento, franquia, prestação de serviços, financiamento, compra e venda, locação e acordo de acionistas. Este campo de IA não foi criado por Zuva, mas sim por Machado Meyer e foi atualizado pela última vez em de 2021. Observe que nem Zuva nem Machado Meyer têm obrigação de atualizar ou manter este campo de IA.

name: Rescisão Motivada
description: Este campo de IA captura o direito da parte de rescindir o contrato por causa ou violação por uma das partes. Este campo de IA tem como objetivo auxiliar na due diligence de M&A no Brasil e foi treinado utilizando contratos de fornecimento, franquia, prestação de serviços, financiamento, compra e venda, locação e acordo de acionistas. Este campo de IA não foi criado por Zuva, mas sim por Machado Meyer e foi atualizado pela última vez em de 2021. Observe que nem Zuva nem Machado Meyer têm obrigação de atualizar ou manter este campo de IA.

name: Rescisão por Insolvência ou Falência
description: Este campo de IA captura o direito da parte de rescindir o contrato em caso de insolvência ou falência de uma das partes. Este campo de IA tem como objetivo auxiliar na due diligence de M&A no Brasil e foi treinado utilizando contratos de fornecimento, franquia, prestação de serviços, financiamento, compra e venda, locação e acordo de acionistas. Este campo de IA não foi criado por Zuva, mas sim por Machado Meyer e foi atualizado pela última vez em de 2021. Observe que nem Zuva nem Machado Meyer têm obrigação de atualizar ou manter este campo de IA.

name: Reservations (Landlord)
description: This AI field captures a landlord's reserved rights under a lease.

name: “Reserves” Definition
description: This AI field captures the definitions of  “Reserves”, “Availability Reserves”, “Inventory Reserves”, “Receivables Reserves” and other reserve definitions for asset-based loans.

name: Résiliation
description: Ce champ AI enregistre les dispositions relatives à la résiliation du contrat. Il a été entraîné sur des ententes d'approvisionnement, des contrats de service, des contrats de distribution, des contrats de propriété intellectuelle, des contrats de travail et des contrats d'achat régis par les lois de la province de Québec.

name: Resolução de Disputas
description: Este campo de IA captura como se deve dar e quais os procedimentos para resolução de disputas em um contrato. Este campo de IA tem como objetivo auxiliar na due diligence de M&A no Brasil e foi treinado utilizando contratos de concessão, franquia, fornecimento, locação, prestação de serviços, parceria, compra e venda, financeiros, societários e acordo de acionistas. Este campo de IA não foi criado por Zuva, mas sim por Machado Meyer e foi atualizado pela última vez em de 2021. Observe que nem Zuva nem Machado Meyer têm obrigação de atualizar ou manter este campo de IA.

name: Resolution Time
description: This AI field captures the deadline for the parties to resolve any dispute in accordance with the prescribed dispute resolution process in the Credit Support Annexes for International Swaps and Derivatives Association agreements.

name: Restoration of Rights and Remedies
description: This AI field captures provisions specifying that if a trustee or holder of the corporate debt securities brought a proceeding and the proceeding was discontinued or abandoned and it adversely affects the trustee or the holder, then the trustee or the holder will be restored to their former positions and may continue as if there had been no proceeding.

name: “Restricted Payment” Definition — Bond Indenture
description: This AI field captures the definition of “Restricted Payment”.

name: Restricted Payments Covenant
description: This AI field captures covenants of a borrower not to make any restricted payments, including payments of dividends, distributions or for redemption of stock.

name: Restricted Payments Covenant — Bond Indenture
description: This AI field captures a covenant restricting an issuer’s ability to make specified payments as provided for in corporate debt security indentures. This AI field also captures a prohibition on restricted payments, the restricted payments basket, carve-outs to the prohibition on restricted payments, and the definitions of “Restricted Payments”, “Investment”, “Permitted Investment” and similar definitions.

name: “Restricted Subsidiary” Definition
description: This AI field captures the definition of “Restricted Subsidiary”.

name: “Restricted Subsidiary” Definition — Bond Indenture
description: This AI field captures the definition of “Restricted Subsidiary” and similar terms in Indentures.

name: Restriction - Competitive Purpose
description: This AI field captures restrictions on the customer's right to access the services for competitive purposes, including restrictions on the customer's right to access the services if the customer is a competitor of the provider. It does not generally capture: (i) restrictions on benchmarking (unless stated in the context of restrictions on accessing the services for competitive purposes generally); or (ii) competitor exclusions from definitions of "Authorized User", "Permitted Contractors" or other similar terms. It is recommended that the "Authorized User" Definition AI field be used to capture the definition of "Authorized User" or other similar terms. It is recommended that the Confidentiality AI field be used to capture restrictions on disclosing confidential information to competitors.

name: Restriction — Competitive Purpose
description: This smart field captures restrictions on the customer’s right to access the services for competitive purposes. This smart field was trained on software as a service agreements.

name: Restriction — Sale, Transfer or Third Party Access
description: This AI field captures restrictions on the customer’s right to sell or transfer the services, or otherwise make the services available to third parties.

name: Return Amount
description: This AI field captures any modifications to the standard definition of “Return Amount” in Credit Support Annexes for International Swaps and Derivatives Association agreements.

name: Return Conditions
description: This AI field captures the return conditions that a lessee must satisfy under the lease, including the lessor’s right to retake possession or demand the return of the leased property upon the occurrence of an event of default.

name: Return or Destruction of Confidential Information/Data
description: This AI field captures a requirement to return or destroy confidential information or data.

name: Return or Destruction of Protected Health Information
description: This AI field captures the business associate’s obligation to return or destroy protected health information on termination of the business associate agreement, if feasible. It will also capture the business associate’s obligations in the event protected health information cannot be returned or destroyed.

name: Right of First Offer/Right of First Refusal
description: This AI field captures rights of first offer or rights of first refusal.

name: Right of First Refusal — Option Agreements
description: This AI field captures the terms and conditions relating to the grantor’s right of first refusal to purchase the option shares before they are sold or otherwise transferred.

name: Right of Holder to Receive Payment
description: This AI field captures a holder’s right to receive interest, principal and other payments due.

name: Right of Substitution/Relocation
description: This AI field captures a party’s right to substitute leased property, including a landlord’s right to relocate a tenant to different premises and, in the case of commercial real estate leases, a landlord’s right to relocate any tenant equipment to a different part of the premises.

name: Rights and Remedies Cumulative
description: This AI field captures provisions specifying that no remedy is exclusive of any other remedy and that all available remedies are cumulative.

name: Rights of Termination — Lease Accounting
description: This AI field captures a party’s right to terminate a lease and options to terminate.

name: Right to Create Aggregated/Statistical Data
description: This AI field captures provisions relating to a party’s right to create or collect aggregated, statistical or de-identified data.

name: Right to Delete
description: This AI field captures affirmative disclosures to consumers of their right to request that a business delete their information, as required by the California Consumer Privacy Act (“CCPA”).

name: Right to Enter/Right of Inspection
description: This AI field captures the right of a landlord to enter or inspect the leased premises.

name: Right to Enter/Right of Inspection — England
description: This AI field captures a landlord’s right to enter and carry out repairs and to charge a tenant where a tenant is in default.

name: Right to Post-Petition Interest
description: This AI field captures an agreement by junior creditors not to object to any senior creditor’s claim for post-petition interest, and language indicating the right of a particular class of senior creditors to a priority claim for post-petition interest (often under the Separate Classes provision).

name: Risk of Loss/Damage
description: This AI field captures a lessee’s and a lessor’s, if applicable, responsibility for risk of loss and/or damage with respect to the leased property.

name: Rounding
description: This AI field captures whether the return amount and delivery amount will be rounded up or rounded down and to which nearest integral multiple in the Credit Support Annexes for International Swaps and Derivatives Association agreements.

name: Royalty Payments
description: This AI field captures provisions relating to the payment of royalties by a licensee or sublicensee, including minimum royalty payments, royalty payment due dates, payment schedules, and the duration of royalty payments. This AI field does not capture sub-license payments or royalties to sub-licensees, and does not identify when licenses are royalty-free or the denomination of royalty payments.

name: Rückbauverpflichtungen
description: Dieses AI Field umfasst die Verpflichtung des Mieters zum Rückbau von baulichen Änderungen nach Vertragsende. Dieses AI Field ist für die Anwendungsfälle Real Estate gedacht und wurde auf gewerbliche Mietverträge und Änderungsverträge trainiert, die dem deutschen Recht unterliegen. Dieses AI Field wurde nicht von Zuva, sondern von CMS Hasche Sigle erstellt. Die letzte Aktualisierung erfolgte im 2018. Bitte beachten Sie, dass weder Zuva noch CMS Hasche Sigle verpflichtet sind, dieses AI Field zu aktualisieren oder zu warten.

name: Rücktritt
description: Dieses AI Field umfasst Regelungen zu Rücktrittsrechten. AI Field ist für Anwendungsfälle im Immobilien-, Unternehmens-M&A-, geistigen Eigentums-, Handels- und Arbeitsbereich gedacht und wurde auf gewerbliche Mietverträge, Änderungsverträge, Gesellschaftsverträge, Gesellschaftervereinbarungen, Joint Venture Agreements, Beherrschungsverträge, Geschäftsführerverträge, Vorstandsverträge, Abgrenzungsvereinbarungen, Vorrechtsvereinbarungen, Kooperationsvertrag, Lizenzverträge, Markenübertragungsverträge, Markenkaufverträge, Patentübertragungsverträge, Softwareentwicklungsverträge, Softwareüberlassungsverträge, sonstige Verträge, Urheberrechtsverträge, Einkaufsbedingungen, Handelsvertreterverträge, Kaufverträge, Kooperationsverträge, Lieferbedingungen, Lieferverträge, Rahmenvereinbarungen, Verkaufsbedingungen, Vertriebsverträge, Werkverträge, Arbeitsverträge, Geschäftsführerverträge, sonstige Verträge und Vorstandsverträge trainiert, die dem deutschen Recht unterliegen. Dieses AI Field wurde nicht von Zuva, sondern von CMS Hasche Sigle erstellt. Die letzte Aktualisierung erfolgte im 2018. Bitte beachten Sie, dass weder Zuva noch CMS Hasche Sigle verpflichtet sind, dieses AI Field zu aktualisieren oder zu warten.

name: Rügeobliegenheit
description: Dieses AI Field umfasst Regelungen zu dem Ausschluss von Mängelrechten infolge nicht erfolgter Rüge bei Abnahme bzw. Übergabe. (Siehe auch Nacherfüllung, Schadensersatz und Gefahrübergang). Dieses AI Field ist für die Anwendungsfälle Commercial gedacht und wurde auf Einkaufsbedingungen, Handelsvertreterverträge, Kaufverträge, Kooperationsverträge, Lieferbedingungen, Lieferverträge, Rahmenvereinbarungen, Verkaufsbedingungen, Vertriebsverträge und Werkverträge trainiert, die dem deutschen Recht unterliegen. Dieses AI Field wurde nicht von Zuva, sondern von CMS Hasche Sigle erstellt. Die letzte Aktualisierung erfolgte im 2017. Bitte beachten Sie, dass weder Zuva noch CMS Hasche Sigle verpflichtet sind, dieses AI Field zu aktualisieren oder zu warten.

name: Sale/Leaseback Transactions Covenant
description: This AI field captures covenants of a borrower not to engage in any transactions in which they sell property and then rent or lease as lessee that or similar property.

name: Sale/Leaseback Transactions Covenant — Bond Indenture
description: This AI field captures a restriction on the ability of an issuer to enter sale and leaseback transactions, and the definition of “Sale and Leaseback Transaction”.

name: Sandbagging
description: This AI field captures both pro-sandbagging provisions (the right to bring indemnification claims for known breaches of an agreement) and anti-sandbagging provisions (the inability to bring indemnification claims for know breaches of an agreement).

name: Sandbagging (Anti)
description: This AI field captures anti-sandbagging provisions (the inability to bring indemnification claims for known breaches of an agreement).

name: Sandbagging (Pro)
description: This AI field captures pro-sandbagging provisions (the right to bring indemnification claims for known breaches of an agreement).

name: Schadensersatz/Haftung
description: Dieses AI Field umfasst Modifikationen der Haftung bzw. Verweis auf den gesetzlichen Haftungsmaßstab. (Siehe auch Pauschalierter SE/Vertragsstrafe (nicht von diesem Erkennungsgegenstand erfasst)). Dieses AI Field ist für Anwendungsfälle Immobilien, geistiges Eigentum, Handel und Arbeit gedacht und wurde auf gewerbliche Mietverträge, Änderungsverträge, Abgrenzungsvereinbarungen, Vorrechtsvereinbarungen, Kooperationsvertrag, Lizenzverträge, Markenübertragungsverträge, Markenkaufverträge, Patentübertragungsverträge, Softwareentwicklungsverträge, Softwareüberlassungsverträge, sonstige Verträge, Urheberrechtsverträge, Einkaufsbedingungen, Handelsvertreterverträge, Kaufverträge, Kooperationsverträge, Lieferbedingungen, Lieferverträge, Rahmenvereinbarungen, Verkaufsbedingungen, Vertriebsverträge, Werkverträge, Arbeitsverträge, Geschäftsführerverträge, sonstige Verträge und Vorstandsverträge trainiert, die dem deutschen Recht unterliegen. Dieses AI Field wurde nicht von Zuva, sondern von CMS Hasche Sigle erstellt. Die letzte Aktualisierung erfolgte im 2018. Bitte beachten Sie, dass weder Zuva noch CMS Hasche Sigle verpflichtet sind, dieses AI Field zu aktualisieren oder zu warten.

name: Scheduled Repayment of Loans
description: This AI field captures the timing for required loan repayments.

name: Schönheitsreparaturen
description: Dieses AI Field umfasst den Umfang der Schönheitsreparaturen (z.B. Streichen, Malern und Tapezieren) und die Zuständigkeit der Parteien. Dieses AI Field ist für die Anwendungsfälle Real Estate gedacht und wurde auf gewerbliche Mietverträge und Änderungsverträge trainiert, die dem deutschen Recht unterliegen. Dieses AI Field wurde nicht von Zuva, sondern von CMS Hasche Sigle erstellt. Die letzte Aktualisierung erfolgte im 2018. Bitte beachten Sie, dass weder Zuva noch CMS Hasche Sigle verpflichtet sind, dieses AI Field zu aktualisieren oder zu warten.

name: Schriftformheilungsklausel
description: Dieses AI Field erfasst die Vereinbarung, dass die Parteien bei einem Schriftformmangel zur Nachholung der Schriftform verpflichtet sind. Dieses AI Field ist für die Anwendungsfälle Real Estate gedacht und wurde auf gewerbliche Mietverträge und Änderungsverträge trainiert, die dem deutschen Recht unterliegen. Dieses AI Field wurde nicht von Zuva, sondern von CMS Hasche Sigle erstellt. Die letzte Aktualisierung erfolgte im 2018. Bitte beachten Sie, dass weder Zuva noch CMS Hasche Sigle verpflichtet sind, dieses AI Field zu aktualisieren oder zu warten.

name: Schutz- und Urheberrechte
description: Dieses AI Field erfasst Regelungen zu Schutz- und Urheberrechten, Arbeitnehmererfindungen u.a.. Dieses AI Field ist für arbeitsrechtliche Anwendungsfälle gedacht und wurde auf Arbeitsverträge, Geschäftsführerverträge, sonstige Verträge und Vorstandsverträge trainiert, die dem deutschen Recht unterliegt. Dieses AI Field wurde nicht von Zuva, sondern von CMS Hasche Sigle erstellt. Die letzte Aktualisierung erfolgte im 2017. Bitte beachten Sie, dass weder Zuva noch CMS Hasche Sigle verpflichtet sind, dieses AI Field zu aktualisieren oder zu warten.

name: Scope of Agreement — ISDA
description: This AI field captures the types of transactions that will be the subject of the International Swaps and Derivatives Association agreements.

name: Section 280G Payments
description: This AI field captures the treatment of payments made to an employee that constitute parachute payments under Section 280G of the U.S. Internal Revenue Code.

name: Section 754 Adjustment
description: This smart field captures a requirement that any positive or negative adjustments to the capital accounts as a consequence of an election under section 754 of the U.S. Internal Revenue Code be treated as items of gain or loss, respectively, and that those gains or losses be allocated among the partners or members in a manner consistent with the Code and the regulations thereunder.

name: Section 754 Election
description: This smart field captures a right of the general partner or manager to make the election under section 754 of the U.S. Internal Revenue Code to adjust the basis of the partnership/company’s assets when partnership/company property is distributed or an interest in the partnership/company is transferred.

name: Section and Headings
description: This AI field captures the role and impact of sections and headings in an agreement.

name: Secured Party and Pledgor
description: This AI field captures which party will be the secured party and which one will be the pledgor in the Credit Support Annexes for International Swaps and Derivatives Association agreements. This AI field was not trained on the 2016 Credit Support Annexes.

name: Secured Party City
description: This AI field captures the city of the secured party on the Uniform Commercial Code financing statement. It was trained on the standard UCC-1 forms. It will not capture party information from UCC1Ad, UCC1AP or UCC3. Redactions or poor font quality may impact the accuracy of this AI field.

name: Secured Party Country
description: This AI field captures the country of the secured party listed on the Uniform Commercial Code financing statement. It was trained on the standard UCC-1 forms. It will not capture party information from UCC1Ad, UCC1AP or UCC3. Redactions or poor font quality may impact the accuracy of this AI field.

name: Secured Party First Name
description: This AI field captures the first name of the secured party listed on the Uniform Commercial Code financing statement. It was trained on the standard UCC-1 forms. It will not capture party information from UCC1Ad, UCC1AP or UCC3. Redactions or poor font quality may impact the accuracy of this AI field.

name: Secured Party Last Name
description: This AI field captures the last name of the secured party listed on the Uniform Commercial Code financing statement. It was trained on the standard UCC-1 forms. It will not capture party information from UCC1Ad, UCC1AP or UCC3. Redactions or poor font quality may impact the accuracy of this AI field.

name: Secured Party Mailing Address
description: This AI field captures the mailing address of the secured party listed on the Uniform Commercial Code financing statement. It was trained on the standard UCC-1 forms. It will not capture party information from UCC1Ad, UCC1AP or UCC3. Redactions or poor font quality may impact the accuracy of this AI field.

name: Secured Party Middle Name
description: This AI field captures the middle name of the secured party listed on the Uniform Commercial Code financing statement. It was trained on the standard UCC-1 forms. It will not capture party information from UCC1Ad, UCC1AP or UCC3. Redactions or poor font quality may impact the accuracy of this AI field.

name: Secured Party Organization Name
description: This AI field captures the organization name of the secured party listed on the Uniform Commercial Code financing statement. It was trained on the standard UCC-1 forms. It will not capture party information from UCC1Ad, UCC1AP or UCC3. Redactions or poor font quality may impact the accuracy of this AI field.

name: Secured Party Postal Code
description: This AI field captures the postal code of the secured party listed on the Uniform Commercial Code financing statement. It was trained on the standard UCC-1 forms. It will not capture party information from UCC1Ad, UCC1AP or UCC3. Redactions or poor font quality may impact the accuracy of this AI field.

name: Secured Party State
description: This AI field captures the state of the secured party listed on the Uniform Commercial Code financing statement. It was trained on the standard UCC-1 forms. It will not capture party information from UCC1Ad, UCC1AP or UCC3. Redactions or poor font quality may impact the accuracy of this AI field.

name: Secured Party Suffix
description: This AI field captures the suffix of the secured party listed on the Uniform Commercial Code financing statement. It was trained on the standard UCC-1 forms. It will not capture party information from UCC1Ad, UCC1AP or UCC3. Redactions or poor font quality may impact the accuracy of this AI field.

name: Security Deposit — Equipment Lease
description: This AI field captures a requirement for the lessee to provide a security deposit and circumstances in which the lessor may use the security deposit.

name: Security Deposit/Letters of Credit
description: This AI field captures a tenant's obligation to provide or replenish a security deposit or letter of credit.

name: Security Interest - Grant & Perfection
description: This AI field captures the grant of a security interest in favor of a lessor and the perfection of such security interest, and the lessee’s undertaking to file all necessary documents, etc. for that purpose.

name: Security Measures (General)
description: This AI field captures general obligations to implement and maintain security measures, including technical and organizational safeguards and procedures. It does not capture (i) specific information security requirements (such as data encryption or backup); or (ii) general statements regarding a party’s responsibility or liability for data security.

name: Security of Tenure
description: This AI field captures whether a lease is inside or outside of the Landlord and Tenant Act 1954.

name: Seguro
description: Este campo de IA captura a obrigação de uma parte de obter seguro. Este campo de IA tem como objetivo auxiliar na due diligence de M&A no Brasil e foi treinado utilizando contratos de concessão, franquia, fornecimento, locação, prestação de serviços, empreitada, parceria, compra e venda e acordo de acionistas. Este campo de IA não foi criado por Zuva, mas sim por Machado Meyer e foi atualizado pela última vez em de 2021. Observe que nem Zuva nem Machado Meyer têm obrigação de atualizar ou manter este campo de IA.

name: Selbstvornahme
description: Dieses AI Field umfasst Regelungen zur Selbstvornahme in Kauf- und Werkverträgen. Dieses AI Field ist für Anwendungsfälle im Immobilien- und geistigen Eigentum vorgesehen und wurde auf gewerbliche Mietverträge und Änderungsverträge trainiert, die dem deutschen Recht unterliegen. Dieses AI Field wurde nicht von Zuva, sondern von CMS Hasche Sigle erstellt. Die letzte Aktualisierung erfolgte im 2018. Bitte beachten Sie, dass weder Zuva noch CMS Hasche Sigle verpflichtet sind, dieses AI Field zu aktualisieren oder zu warten.

name: “Senior Indebtedness” Definition
description: This AI field captures the definitions of “Senior Indebtedness”, “Senior Debt”, and similar terms. This AI field does not capture the definition of “Designated Senior Debt”.

name: Separate Classes
description: This AI field captures an agreement by junior secured creditors to treat their respective interests as a separate class from those of more senior secured creditors for the purposes of any bankruptcy/insolvency proceeding.

name: Service Bureau/Timesharing
description: This AI field captures provisions relating to restrictions for the use of service bureaus and/or time-shares.

name: Service Charge — Caps
description: This AI field captures any limit or cap on a service charge, including a relevant equation, if listed.

name: Service Charge — End of Year Reconciliation
description: This AI field captures a landlord's obligation to prepare an account showing the service charge expenditure for a financial year and any provision within the service charge dealing with a balancing payment.

name: Service Charge — Exclusions
description: This AI field captures any specific exclusions from a service charge.

name: Service Charge — Proportion
description: This AI field captures the overarching proportion of the service charge attributable to the premises that a tenant will be liable to pay. This AI field captures the operative component, the proportion and the definition of “Service Charge”. This AI field does not capture exceptional expenditure, a landlord’s right to alter the proportion attributable to a tenant, or the amount of any estimated initial contribution/balancing payment.

name: Service Credit
description: This AI field captures a purchaser’s agreement to credit certain continuing target employees for past service for the purposes of eligibility and vesting in employee benefit plans post-closing. This AI field also captures a purchaser’s agreement to recognize prior amounts paid by such employees for the purposes of determining deductibles, co-payments, out-of-pocket maximums, etc. under any welfare benefit plans in which such employees may be enrolled post-closing.

name: Service Level
description: This AI field captures provisions relating to service levels, including service credits, and standards of service, care and conduct.

name: Set-off
description: This AI field captures a party’s right to set-off and apply credits to amounts due.

name: Set-off — Credit Agreement
description: This AI field captures lenders' rights of set-off where an event of default has occurred and/or is continuing.

name: Set-off — ISDA
description: This AI field captures the applicability of the set-off provisions in the International Swaps and Derivatives Association master agreement, which enable a party, after early termination, to set-off amounts owing between the parties in respect of other agreements against the close-out payment.

name: Severability
description: This AI field captures severability provisions, pursuant to which if anything in an agreement is determined to be invalid, it will be severed from the rest of the agreement which will remain enforceable.

name: Several Liability
description: This AI field captures parties' acknowledgments that the lenders' obligations to fund the loans are several, and not joint and several.

name: Severance Payments and Benefits
description: This AI field captures an employee’s entitlement to severance payments and benefits upon termination of employment.

name: Share Conversion/Exchange
description: This AI field captures provisions addressing the principal conversion or exchange of shares as part of a merger or arrangement transaction, including any exchange ratio used for such conversion or exchange. This AI field does not generally capture provisions dealing with the treatment of shares held by the purchaser or by dissenting shareholders, nor does it address the treatment of treasury shares or any conversion/exchange of shares that is purely structural in nature. This AI field applies primarily to share and mixed consideration deals.

name: Shareholder Appointment of Proxy
description: This AI field captures procedural requirements for implementing and evidencing a grant of proxy by a shareholder. This AI field does not capture the general right of a shareholder to appoint or revoke a proxy.

name: Shareholder Approval
description: This AI field captures provisions addressing both acquirer and target shareholder approval requirements for a transaction.

name: Shareholder Meeting — Notice
description: This AI field captures notice requirements for shareholders meetings.

name: Shareholder Notice for Director Nominations and Business Proposals
description: This AI field captures the shareholders' obligation to provide advance notice for director nominations or business proposals.

name: Shareholders Action by Written Consent
description: This AI field captures the shareholders’ right to act by written consent.

name: Shareholders’ Equity
description: This AI field captures the definition of “Shareholders’ Equity” in International Swaps and Derivatives Association agreements.

name: Shareholders' Right to Call a Special Meeting
description: This AI field captures the shareholders’ right to call a special meeting.

name: “Shares” Definition
description: This AI field captures the definition of "Shares", including subject shares and consideration shares.

name: Share/Stock Certificates
description: This AI field captures requirements, restrictions, and other rules applicable to the issuance or replacement of share/stock certificates.

name: Shine the Light
description: This AI field captures a consumer's right to request information concerning the disclosure of their personal information to third parties for the third parties’ direct marketing purposes, as required by the California Shine the Light Act.

name: Shipping/Delivery Terms
description: This AI field captures provisions relating to shipping and delivery requirements, including shipping origin, costs, title/risk of loss, and shipping address.

name: Sicherheiten
description: Dieses AI Field erfasst Mietsicherheiten durch den Mieter (z.B. Kaution, Bürgschaft). Dieses AI Field ist für die Anwendungsfälle Real Estate gedacht und wurde auf gewerbliche Mietverträge und Änderungsverträge trainiert, die dem deutschen Recht unterliegen. Dieses AI Field wurde nicht von Zuva, sondern von CMS Hasche Sigle erstellt. Die letzte Aktualisierung erfolgte im 2018. Bitte beachten Sie, dass weder Zuva noch CMS Hasche Sigle verpflichtet sind, dieses AI Field zu aktualisieren oder zu warten.

name: Signage
description: This AI field captures a landlord and/or tenant's rights to install signs on the property or in the building.

name: Signing Bonus
description: This AI field captures a signing bonus received by an employee. This AI field does not capture a signing bonus of equity. A signing bonus of equity is captured by the Option/Equity Grant AI field.

name: Size/Purchase Price
description: This AI field captures the aggregate purchase price in a transaction, before taking into account any purchase price adjustments.

name: Skontoklausel
description: Dieses AI Field umfasst einen aufschiebend bedingten Teilerlass für den Fall, dass der Auftraggeber innerhalb einer vereinbarten Skontofrist bezahlt. Dieses AI Field ist für die Anwendungsfälle Commercial gedacht und wurde auf Einkaufsbedingungen, Handelsvertreterverträge, Kaufverträge, Kooperationsverträge, Lieferbedingungen, Lieferverträge, Rahmenvereinbarungen, Verkaufsbedingungen, Vertriebsverträge und Werkverträge trainiert, die dem deutschen Recht unterliegen. Dieses AI Field wurde nicht von Zuva, sondern von CMS Hasche Sigle erstellt. Die letzte Aktualisierung erfolgte im 2017. Bitte beachten Sie, dass weder Zuva noch CMS Hasche Sigle verpflichtet sind, dieses AI Field zu aktualisieren oder zu warten.

name: Snooze You Lose
description: This AI field captures consequences of a lender's failure to respond to a request for a consent, waiver or amendment to the agreement.

name: “SOFR” Definition
description: This AI field captures the definition of the secured overnight financing rate ("SOFR") and similar or related definitions. It is recommended that this AI field be used in conjunction with the "LIBOR Fallback Mechanism" AI field.

name: Solvency Certificate Condition
description: This AI field captures the condition of borrowing to provide a solvency certificate.

name: Solvency Certificate Condition — Credit Agreement
description: This AI field captures the condition of borrowing that the borrower will deliver a solvency certificate prior to funding.

name: Solvency Representation
description: This AI field captures a borrower's representations that it is solvent, is able to pay its debts as they become due, and has capital sufficient to carry on its business.

name: Sonstige Vergütung
description: Dieses AI Field erfasst sämtliche Sonderleistungen und variable Vergütung (Weihnachtsgeld, Urlaubsgeld, Boni, Gratifikationen, Tantieme, vermögenswirksame Leistungen,u.a.). Dieses AI Field ist für arbeitsrechtliche Anwendungsfäll gedacht und wurde auf Arbeitsverträge, Geschäftsführerverträge, sonstige Verträge und Vorstandsverträge trainiert, die dem deutschen Recht unterliegen. Dieses AI Field wurde nicht von Zuva, sondern von CMS Hasche Sigle erstellt. Die letzte Aktualisierung erfolgte im 2017. Bitte beachten Sie, dass weder Zuva noch CMS Hasche Sigle verpflichtet sind, dieses AI Field zu aktualisieren oder zu warten.

name: Sortimentsschutz
description: Dieses AI Field umfasst sämtliche Regelungen zum Sortimentsschutz. Dieses AI Field ist für die Anwendungsfälle Real Estate gedacht und wurde auf gewerbliche Mietverträge und Änderungsverträge trainiert, die dem deutschen Recht unterliegen. Dieses AI Field wurde nicht von Zuva, sondern von CMS Hasche Sigle erstellt. Die letzte Aktualisierung erfolgte im 2018. Bitte beachten Sie, dass weder Zuva noch CMS Hasche Sigle verpflichtet sind, dieses AI Field zu aktualisieren oder zu warten.

name: Source Code Escrow
description: This AI field captures a requirement to deposit source code into an escrow account and the circumstances in which the source code escrow may be released.

name: Special Vesting Provisions
description: This AI field captures instances where the stock option’s vesting schedule will accelerate or be adjusted as a result of certain events (e.g. change of control, termination, etc.). In particular, this AI field primarily captures instances where the stock option shall vest fully and immediately as a result of such events.

name: Specific GP Powers
description: This smart field captures the specific powers granted to a general partner under a LPA.

name: Specific Performance
description: This AI field captures a party's right to seek specific performance in the event of a breach of an agreement.

name: “Specified Acquisition Agreement Representations” Definition
description: This AI field captures the definitions of “Specified Acquisition Agreement Representations”, “Merger Agreement Representations” or similar terms.

name: Specified Entity
description: This smart field captures which third parties a party considers relevant to its counterparty’s credit standing in International Swaps and Derivatives Association agreements.

name: Specified Indebtedness
description: This AI field captures the definition of “Specified Indebtedness” in International Swaps and Derivatives Association agreements.

name: “Specified Representations”/“Repeating Representations” Definition
description: This AI field captures the definitions of “Specified Representations”, “Repeating Representations” and “Major Representations”.

name: “Specified Transaction” Definition
description: This Al field captures any modifications to the standard definition of “Specified Transaction” in International Swaps and Derivatives Association agreements.

name: Square Footage of Premises
description: This AI field captures the square footage of the leased premises, including any change to the square footage of the leased premises under an amendment to the lease. This AI field is designed to be used in conjunction with the "Description of Premises" and "Address of Premises" AI fields.

name: Standard of Care
description: This AI field captures the level of caution that a receiving party must exercise with respect to confidential information.

name: Standstill
description: This AI field captures restrictions on certain actions of a bidding company in the context of a takeover.

name: Start Date
description: This AI field captures the start date of the initial term of an agreement. This AI field is designed to be used in conjunction with the "Effective Date" AI field.

name: Start Date — Employment
description: This AI field captures an employee’s start date, as well as the effective date of the agreement.

name: Status of Lenders and Documentation
description: This AI field captures a lender's requirements to deliver tax documentation to the borrower.

name: Subcontracting
description: This AI field captures provisions relating to subcontracting or subprocessing. This AI field also captures the definitions of “Subcontractor” and “Subprocessor”.

name: Subcontractor Restrictions and Conditions
description: This AI field captures provisions requiring the business associate to ensure that its subcontractors (i) agree to the same restrictions and conditions that apply to the business associate with respect to protected health information; and (ii) implement appropriate safeguards.

name: Sublease Agreement
description: This AI field captures information indicating whether the document is, or whether it contains, a sublease agreement, sublease amendment or sublease consent. This AI field does not capture “form” sublease documents (documents with blanks to be completed which have been attached as exhibits to a lease).

name: Sublease/Assignment Profit-Sharing
description: This AI field captures a requirement that any profit arising out of a sublease or assignment of the lease by the tenant will be shared with the landlord.

name: Sublease — Equipment Lease
description: This AI field captures a lessee’s right, if any, to sublease the leased property, and language prohibiting the lessee from subleasing such property.

name: Sublicensing Rights
description: This AI field captures provisions relating to the right to sublicense, including when sublicensing is permitted and prohibited, sublicense requirements, and conditions for granting a sublicense. This AI field captures the definitions of “Sublicense” and “Sublicensee”. This AI field does not capture sub-license payments or royalties to sub-licensees.

name: Submission to Jurisdiction — ISDA
description: This AI field captures which jurisdiction the parties would like to govern disputes between them in International Swaps and Derivatives Association agreements.

name: Subordination
description: This AI field captures a tenant's obligation to subordinate its rights under a lease to ground and underlying leases, and/or to the liens of any mortgages affecting the land or premises, and requirements for a party to obtain or enter into a subordination, non-disturbance, and attornment agreement.

name: Subrogation Waiver
description: This AI field captures a landlord and/or tenant's agreement to have their respective insurance companies waive any rights of subrogation that such companies may have against the landlord or tenant, as applicable.

name: Subsidiaries Representation
description: This AI field captures representations that a party has no subsidiaries other than as disclosed.

name: Subsidiaries Representation — Credit Agreement
description: This smart field captures a borrower's representations with respect to its subsidiaries.

name: “Subsidiary” Definition
description: This AI field captures the definition of "Subsidiary".

name: Subsidiary Guarantees
description: This AI field captures the types of subsidiaries that must guarantee credit facilities.

name: Substitution Date/Exchange Date
description: This AI field captures any modifications to the standard definitions of “Substitution Date” or “Exchange Date” in the Credit Support Annexes for International Swaps and Derivatives Association agreements.

name: Successors and Assigns
description: This AI field captures an acknowledgment by the parties that the agreement will be binding upon their successors and assigns.

name: Successor Trustee by Merger
description: This AI field captures provisions concerning a consolidation, merger, conversion, or transfer of assets of an indenture trustee with another entity that becomes the successor trustee.

name: “Superior Proposal” Definition
description: This AI field captures the definition of “Superior Proposal”.

name: Supermajority Approval
description: This AI field captures waivers, amendments and other actions requiring the consent of the lenders included in the definition of “Supermajority Lenders”.

name: “Supermajority Lenders” Definition
description: This AI field captures the definition of “Supermajority Lenders”.

name: Supplemental Indentures/Amendments with Holder Consent
description: This AI field captures supplements, amendments and other actions requiring the consent of holders of the debt security affected thereby.

name: Supplemental Indentures/Amendments without Holder Consent
description: This AI field captures supplements, amendments and other actions not requiring the consent of holders of the debt security.

name: Surrender
description: This AI field captures a tenant’s obligations with respect to the leased premises at the expiration of the term of a lease.

name: Survival
description: This AI field captures survival provisions (the extent to which provisions survive termination of an agreement).

name: Survival of Purchase Agreement Provisions
description: This AI field captures the length of time for which purchase agreement provisions will survive after closing of a transaction.

name: Suspension
description: This AI field captures provisions relating to the provider’s right to suspend the customer’s access to the services. It does not capture provisions relating to (i) maintenance or other exceptions to uptime commitments; or (ii) force majeure.

name: Swap/Hedging Agreements Covenant
description: This AI field captures covenants of a borrower not to enter into any swap or hedging agreements.

name: “Swap Obligation” Definition
description: This AI field captures the definition of “Swap Obligations” in the context of the U.S. Commodity Exchange Act rules and similar rules.

name: Tag Along Rights
description: This AI field captures tag along rights, being the right of a minority shareholder to sell its shares along with a selling shareholder.

name: Tax Allocation
description: This AI field captures general tax-related allocations of income, gain, loss, etc. to the partners or members, including allocation of tax credits, recapture and “built-in” gain/loss adjustments resulting from property contributed to the partnership/company.

name: Tax Classification/Check-The-Box
description: This AI field captures provisions describing the intended entity classification of a limited partnership or limited liability company for U.S. tax purposes, including the right, if any, of the general partner or manager to make the so-called “check-the-box” election to have the limited partnership or limited liability company be treated as a corporation for U.S. tax purposes. This AI field does not capture any obligations or limitations that may be imposed on partners or members to preserve the partnership/company’s intended classification.

name: Taxes Covenant
description: This AI field captures a covenant of an issuer to pay all taxes, assessments and government charges levied on the issuer in a timely manner.

name: “Taxes” Definition
description: This AI field captures the definitions of “Tax” and “Taxes”.

name: Taxes Representation
description: This AI field captures representations with respect to taxes.

name: Taxes Representation — Credit Agreement
description: This AI field captures general tax representations, including that a loan party/obligor has (i) timely filed all tax returns, (ii) paid all applicable taxes that are due and payable and (iii) made adequate provision for any taxes that are being contested in good faith. This AI field does not capture representations relating to withholding tax on payments under the agreement or to other taxes/duties (e.g. stamp duties, registration fees, etc.) payable in respect of an agreement.

name: Tax-Free Reorganization
description: This AI field captures parties’ intention for a transaction to qualify as a tax-free reorganization for United States federal income tax purposes. This AI field does not capture affirmative or negative covenants relating to such tax-free treatment, or a party’s obligation to provide a legal opinion regarding such tax-free treatment.

name: Tax Gross-Up
description: This AI field captures a borrower's requirements to gross up any amounts owing to the lenders to compensate for any withholding taxes that are withheld on amounts payable under an agreement, so that the lender receives an amount equal to the payment it would have received if no tax withholding had been required.

name: Tax Indemnification by Borrower
description: This AI field captures a borrower's indemnification obligations with respect to taxes payable pursuant to the loan documents.

name: Tax Information
description: This AI field captures an obligation of the general partner or manager to provide partners or members with information required for tax filing purposes.

name: Tax Matters Partner/Partnership Representative
description: This smart field captures a designation of a Tax Matters Partner/Member or a Partnership Representative for tax purposes and the rights and responsibilities that attend such designation where specified.

name: Tax Provisions — ISDA
description: This AI field captures tax-related provisions in the schedule to the International Swaps and Derivatives Association master agreement (other than tax representations which are captured using the "Tax Representations — ISDA" AI field).

name: Tax Refund/Credit
description: This AI field captures tax refund provisions, whereby a party agrees that if it receives a refund or credit for amounts for which it has been indemnified it will pay such amounts to the indemnifying party.

name: Tax Representations — ISDA
description: This AI field captures the tax representations made by the parties in International Swaps and Derivatives Association agreements.

name: Tax Withholding
description: This AI field captures the right of a general partner or manager to deduct or withhold taxes from any payment made to a partner or member as required by applicable law, and the option for the partnership or company to make loans or advances to the applicable partners or members for the purposes of paying such withholding tax on their behalf.

name: Technical and Organizational Measures
description: This AI field captures technical and organizational measures that must be put into place to protect data.

name: Teilleistung
description: Dieses AI Field erfasst Regelungen und Folgen einer Teilleistung (Mängel, Abnahme). Dieses AI Field ist für die Anwendungsfälle Commercial gedacht und wurde auf Einkaufsbedingungen, Handelsvertreterverträge, Kaufverträge, Kooperationsverträge, Lieferbedingungen, Lieferverträge, Rahmenvereinbarungen, Verkaufsbedingungen, Vertriebsverträge und Werkverträge trainiert, die dem deutschen Recht unterliegen. Dieses AI Field wurde nicht von Zuva, sondern von CMS Hasche Sigle erstellt. Die letzte Aktualisierung erfolgte im 2018. Bitte beachten Sie, dass weder Zuva noch CMS Hasche Sigle verpflichtet sind, dieses AI Field zu aktualisieren oder zu warten.

name: Tenant
description: This AI field captures a tenant's name.

name: Tenant Allowances
description: This AI field captures improvement and other allowances provided by a landlord to a tenant, monetary restrictions on the use of an allowance, the requirement to amortize all or a portion of an allowance, and a tenant’s right, if any, to the residual amount of an allowance. This AI field does not capture management or supervisory fees paid to a landlord out of any such allowance in respect of improvements to the leased premises.

name: Tenant Insurance Obligations
description: This AI field captures a tenant's obligation to obtain and maintain ongoing insurance, including general liability, property, workers’ compensation, and other types of insurance, and the specifications for such insurance and obligations to deliver evidence thereof. This AI field does not capture an obligation of a tenant or contractor to maintain insurance in connection with construction at the property, or an obligation of a tenant to reimburse the landlord for insurance maintained by the landlord.

name: Tenant Rights
description: This AI field captures a tenant's reserved rights under a lease.

name: Tenant’s Default — Cure Periods for Monetary Defaults
description: This AI field captures the amount of time a tenant has, if any, to cure a default in its performance of a monetary obligation under a lease.

name: Tenant Transfer Rights to Affiliate
description: This AI field captures a tenant's right to transfer its rights under a lease to an affiliate without the permission of the landlord.

name: Term and Renewal
description: This AI field captures the initial term of an agreement and any extensions or renewals. This AI field captures related definitions, such as "term", "initial term", and "subsequent term".

name: Term and Renewal — Equipment Lease
description: This AI field captures the term of a lease, including any options to renew or extend such term.

name: Termination
description: This AI field captures general termination provisions.

name: Termination and Reduction of Commitment
description: This AI field captures a lender or borrower's notice requirements to terminate loan commitments under an agreement.

name: Termination Currency
description: This AI field captures the currency in which payments will be made under terminated transactions in International Swaps and Derivatives Association agreements.

name: Termination Damages — Lease
description: This AI field captures damages, fees or other penalties payable by the tenant to the landlord in the event of an early termination of the lease, whether for default or otherwise.

name: Termination Fee
description: This AI field captures fees payable by a purchaser and/or seller if a purchase agreement is terminated prior to closing.

name: Termination for Casualty — Lease
description: This AI field captures a tenant and/or landlord's right to terminate the lease in the event of damage or destruction to the leased premises.

name: Termination for Cause or Breach
description: This AI field captures a party's right to terminate an agreement for cause or breach.

name: Termination for Condemnation
description: This AI field captures lease termination provisions triggered by the leased premises becoming condemned or being appropriated by a public authority, in whole or in part.

name: Termination for Convenience
description: This AI field captures a party's right to terminate an agreement without justification.

name: Termination for Insolvency
description: This AI field captures a party's right to terminate an agreement for insolvency.

name: Termination for Material Adverse Effect
description: This AI field captures both a closing condition that no material adverse effect or change has occurred, and the specific right to terminate an agreement in the event of a material adverse effect or change in the termination section.

name: Termination for Material Breach
description: This AI field captures the covered entity’s right to terminate the business associate agreement in the event of a material breach by the business associate.

name: Termination of Benefit Plans
description: This AI field captures a target’s obligation to terminate 401(K) plans and other similar benefit plans in connection with the consummation of an acquisition.

name: Termination of Shareholders’ Agreement
description: This AI field captures the way in which a Shareholders’ Agreement may be terminated.

name: Termination Procedures
description: This AI field captures the procedures that must be followed in order to terminate an agreement.
