name: Termination — Purchase/Merger Agreement
description: This AI field captures termination provisions in a purchase agreement, including the effects of termination. This AI field does not capture provisions relating to termination fees or liability for expenses on termination.

name: Territory
description: This AI field captures the concept of “territory” in an agreement, typically with respect to a grant of license or distribution rights.

name: Third Party Beneficiaries
description: This AI field captures acknowledgements that an agreement is not intended to benefit anyone other than the parties to the agreement.

name: Third Party Claims
description: This AI field captures indemnification procedures specifically for claims by a third party against an indemnified party (as opposed to direct claims).

name: Threshold — CSA
description: This AI field captures the level of unsecured exposure before any collateral is called in the Credit Support Annexes for International Swaps and Derivatives Association agreements. It can be a specific monetary amount or linked to a credit ratings matrix. This AI field was not trained on the 2016 Credit Support Annexes.

name: Threshold — ISDA
description: This AI field captures the definition of “Threshold” in International Swaps and Derivatives Association agreements, which is used to determine whether an event of default has taken place.

name: Time of Filing
description: This AI field captures the time of filing the Uniform Commercial Code financing statement. It was trained on the standard UCC-1 forms. Redactions or poor font quality may impact the accuracy of this AI field.

name: Time of the Essence
description: This AI field captures an acknowledgment by the parties that time is "of the essence".

name: Timing of Rent Payment — Equipment Lease
description: This AI field captures the timing of rental payments under a lease.

name: Title
description: This AI field captures the title of an agreement.

name: Title/Risk of Loss
description: This AI field captures when title and/or risk of loss with respect to goods, or products supplied under a commercial agreement, passes from seller to buyer.

name: Title, Sufficiency and Condition of Assets Representation
description: This AI field captures representations that a party has good and marketable title to the assets being sold, that the assets are in good condition and/or that the assets represent all the assets necessary to conduct the purchased business.

name: Title to Equipment — Equipment Lease
description: This AI field captures a lessor’s legal title to and ownership interest in the leased property, including any alterations or improvements thereto, and any transfer of title from the lessor to the lessee.

name: Title to Properties Representation
description: This AI field captures a borrower's representations that it has good and marketable title to its assets, and that its assets are not subject to liens, other than permitted liens.

name: Titre
description: Ce champ AI enregistre le titre d'un contrat. Il a été entraîné sur des ententes d'approvisionnement, des contrats de service, des contrats de distribution, des contrats de propriété intellectuelle, des contrats de travail et des contrats d'achat régis par les lois de la province de Québec.

name: Total Ineligibility Date
description: This AI field captures whether the parties have agreed to modify the standard definition of “Total Ineligibility Date” in 2016 Credit Support Annexes for International Swaps and Derivatives Association agreements.

name: Total Investment
description: This AI field captures the paragraph discussing the total investment required to start the franchise.

name: Total Investment Range Amount
description: This AI field captures the total investment range, expressed in dollar amounts.

name: “Transaction Documents” Definition
description: This AI field captures the definition of "Transaction Documents".

name: Transactions with Affiliates Covenant
description: This AI field captures covenants of a borrower with respect to engaging in transactions with affiliates or non-arm’s length parties.

name: Transactions with Affiliates Covenant — Bond Indenture
description: This AI field captures the covenant limiting the issuer’s ability to engage in transactions with affiliates to specified circumstances and the definition of "Affiliate".

name: Transfer
description: This AI field captures all provisions governing the transfer of a franchise agreement (and corresponding rights and interests, etc.) by franchisee or franchisor to a third party, including necessary consents and conditions to effect the transfer. This AI field also captures instances where unauthorized transfers will trigger termination.

name: Transferability of Options
description: This AI field captures provisions relating to the option holder’s ability to transfer, assign, pledge or hypothecate the stock option.

name: Transfer Ineligibility Date
description: This AI field captures whether the parties have agreed to modify the standard definition of “Transfer Ineligibility Date” in 2016 Credit Support Annexes for International Swaps and Derivatives Association agreements.

name: Transfer of Data
description: This AI field captures general and international data transfer provisions.

name: Transfer of Interest Amount
description: This AI field captures the time at which the transfer of interest amount will be made to the transferor in the Credit Support Annexes for International Swaps and Derivatives Association agreements.

name: Transfer of Shares
description: This AI field captures the transfer of a shareholder’s shares. This AI field captures related definitions.

name: Transfer Timing
description: This AI field captures any modifications to the standard provision regarding the time for transfers of collateral in the Credit Support Annexes for International Swaps and Derivatives Association agreements.

name: Treatment of Target Equity Awards
description: This AI field captures provisions addressing the treatment of a target’s equity awards pursuant to a plan of arrangement or merger.

name: Trustee Compensation and Indemnity
description: This AI field captures circumstances under which an indenture trustee will be compensated, indemnified, and reimbursed by the issuer.

name: Trustee Conflict of Interests
description: This AI field captures provisions related to an indenture trustee acquiring and eliminating a conflict of interest regarding the trustee's role and its role in any other capacity.

name: Trustee May Enforce Claims Without Possession of Securities
description: This AI field captures instances where all rights of action and claims under corporate debt securities or an indenture may be enforced by a trustee, even if it does not possess any of the corporate debt securities or does not produce any of them in the proceeding.

name: Trustee May File Proofs of Claim
description: This AI field captures instances where a trustee may file proofs of claim or other documents as may be necessary or advisable to have claims of the trustee and holders of the corporate debt securities allowed in any judicial proceeding.

name: Trustee May Hold Securities, Notes, and Senior Indebtedness
description: This AI field captures the ability of an indenture trustee to become the owner of securities or notes, hold senior indebtedness, and otherwise deal with the issuer or any affiliate with the same rights, as if it was not the indenture trustee.

name: Trustee’s Disclaimer
description: This AI field captures disclaimers of an indenture trustee regarding certain items contained in and related to an indenture.

name: Trustee’s Notice of Defaults
description: This AI field captures notice obligations of an indenture trustee in an event of a default, and when an indenture trustee may withhold notice from holders of certain defaults.

name: Type of UCC Form
description: This AI field captures the title of the Uniform Commercial Code financing statement. It was trained on the standard UCC-1 forms.

name: Übergabedatum
description: Dieses AI Field umfasst die Übergabe der Mietsache, welche an ein Datum, einen Zeitraum oder ein Ereignis anknüpft. Dieses AI Field ist für die Anwendungsfälle Real Estate gedacht und wurde auf gewerbliche Mietverträge und Änderungsverträge trainiert, die dem deutschen Recht unterliegen. Dieses AI Field wurde nicht von Zuva, sondern von CMS Hasche Sigle erstellt. Die letzte Aktualisierung erfolgte im 2018. Bitte beachten Sie, dass weder Zuva noch CMS Hasche Sigle verpflichtet sind, dieses AI Field zu aktualisieren oder zu warten.

name: Überstunden-, Feiertags-, sonstige Mehrarbeit
description: Dieses AI Field erfasst Regelungen über den Umgang mit Überstunden, sonstiger Mehrarbeit, Schichtarbeit und Feiertagsarbeit. Dieses AI Field ist für arbeitsrechtliche Anwendungsfälle gedacht und wurde auf Arbeitsverträge, Geschäftsführerverträge, sonstige Verträge und Vorstandsverträge trainiert, die dem deutschen Recht unterliegen. Dieses AI Field wurde nicht von Zuva, sondern von CMS Hasche Sigle erstellt. Die letzte Aktualisierung erfolgte im 2017. Bitte beachten Sie, dass weder Zuva noch CMS Hasche Sigle verpflichtet sind, dieses AI Field zu aktualisieren oder zu warten.

name: Übertragung/Unterlizensierung
description: Dieses AI Field erfasst Regelungen zur Übertragbarkeit der Lizenz und zur Unterlizensierung. Dieses AI Field ist für die Anwendungsfälle Intellectual Property gedacht und wurde auf gewerbliche Mietverträge und Änderungsverträge trainiert, die dem deutschen Recht unterliegen. Dieses AI Field wurde nicht von Zuva, sondern von CMS Hasche Sigle erstellt. Die letzte Aktualisierung erfolgte im 2018. Bitte beachten Sie, dass weder Zuva noch CMS Hasche Sigle verpflichtet sind, dieses AI Field zu aktualisieren oder zu warten.

name: Umbrella/Excess Liability Insurance
description: This AI field captures a party’s obligation to obtain umbrella or excess liability insurance. This AI field does not capture insurance-related indemnity obligations.

name: Umfang der Lizenz
description: Dieses AI Field erfasst den Gegenstand der Lizenz/Umfang der Erteilung der Lizenz. Dieses AI Field ist für die Anwendungsfälle Intellectual Property gedacht und wurde auf gewerbliche Mietverträge und Änderungsverträge trainiert, die dem deutschen Recht unterliegen. Dieses AI Field wurde nicht von Zuva, sondern von CMS Hasche Sigle erstellt. Die letzte Aktualisierung erfolgte im 2018. Bitte beachten Sie, dass weder Zuva noch CMS Hasche Sigle verpflichtet sind, dieses AI Field zu aktualisieren oder zu warten.

name: Umsatzsteuer
description: Dieses AI Field erfasst Regelungen zur Zahlung von Umsatzsteuer (ggf. Umsatzsteuerbefreiung). Dieses AI Field ist für Anwendungsfälle im Bereich Immobilien und geistiges Eigentum gedacht und wurde auf gewerbliche Mietverträge, Änderungsverträge, Abgrenzungsvereinbarungen, Vorrechtsvereinbarungen, Kooperationsvertrag, Lizenzverträge, Markenübertragungsverträge, Markenkaufverträge, Patentübertragungsverträge, Softwareentwicklungsverträge, Softwareüberlassungsverträge, sonstige Verträge und Urheberrechtsverträge trainiert, die dem deutschen Recht unterliegen. Dieses AI Field wurde nicht von Zuva, sondern von CMS Hasche Sigle erstellt. Die letzte Aktualisierung erfolgte im 2018. Bitte beachten Sie, dass weder Zuva noch CMS Hasche Sigle verpflichtet sind, dieses AI Field zu aktualisieren oder zu warten.

name: Unanimous Lender Approval
description: This AI field captures waivers, amendments and other actions requiring the consent of every lender, or every lender in a particular class.

name: Unauthorized Use or Disclosure, Breach or Security Incident
description: This AI field captures the obligations of the parties in the event of any unauthorized use or disclosure of protected health information, breach of unsecured protected health information or security incident. It does not capture (i) the obligation to mitigate (which is captured under a separate AI field); (ii) liability for costs; (iii) contact information; or (iv) general obligations to comply with the Health Insurance Portability and Accountability Act (HIPAA) or other applicable laws.

name: Unavailability of Screen Rate/Absence of Quotation — Bond Indenture
description: This AI field captures the process for determining LIBOR when the initial determination of LIBOR is temporarily unavailable.

name: Unavailability of Screen Rate/Absence of Quotation — Credit Agreement
description: This AI field captures the process for determining the applicable screen rate in the event such screen rate is temporarily unavailable.

name: Underletting — Circumstances/Conditions
description: This AI field captures circumstances where a landlord can reasonably refuse consent to underlet/sublet and any conditions to which consent can be subject.

name: Underletting — Permitted/Prohibited
description: This AI field captures whether underletting/subletting is permitted or prohibited under a lease. This AI field does not capture a tenant’s ability to grant a sub-tenant permission to underlet.

name: Undertaking for Costs — Bond Indenture
description: This AI field captures provisions specifying that a court may, in its discretion, require the filing by any party litigant of an undertaking to pay the costs of the suit. This smart field also captures limitations as to this undertaking for costs.

name: Unilateral Tenant Termination Rights
description: This AI field captures a tenant's express rights to unilaterally terminate a lease in full or with respect to a portion of the leased premises for convenience. This AI field does not capture tenant termination rights that are contingent on the occurrence of certain events (such as delay of possession, damage to building, or breach of exclusivity provisions).

name: Unrestricted Subsidiaries
description: This AI field captures the definition of “Unrestricted Subsidiaries” as well as the rules for designating “Unrestricted Subsidiaries”.

name: Unrestricted Subsidiaries — Commitment Letter
description: This AI field captures a borrower's right to designate unrestricted subsidiaries.

name: “Unrestricted Subsidiary” Definition
description: This AI field captures the definition of “Unrestricted Subsidiary” and similar terms.

name: Untervermietung
description: Dieses AI Field erfasst die Zulässigkeit und den Umfang der Untervermietung sowie Regelungen bei der Verletzung der Vorschrift. Dieses AI Field ist für die Anwendungsfälle Real Estate gedacht und wurde auf gewerbliche Mietverträge und Änderungsverträge trainiert, die dem deutschen Recht unterliegen. Dieses AI Field wurde nicht von Zuva, sondern von CMS Hasche Sigle erstellt. Die letzte Aktualisierung erfolgte im 2018. Bitte beachten Sie, dass weder Zuva noch CMS Hasche Sigle verpflichtet sind, dieses AI Field zu aktualisieren oder zu warten.

name: Updated Disclosure Schedules
description: This AI field captures provisions that either allow or require a seller to update the disclosure schedules prior to closing.

name: Upfront/Arrangement Fees
description: This AI field captures fees payable to a lead arranger.

name: Upfront/Initial Payments
description: This AI field captures payments that are due on execution of an agreement or within a certain number of days after execution, including deposits.

name: Urlaub
description: Dieses AI Field erfasst Regelungen zum vertraglich festgelegten Urlaub eines AN. Dieses AI Field ist für arbeitsrechtliche Anwendungsfälle gedacht und wurde auf Arbeitsverträge, Geschäftsführerverträge, sonstige Verträge und Vorstandsverträge trainiert, die dem deutschen Recht unterliegen. Dieses AI Field wurde nicht von Zuva, sondern von CMS Hasche Sigle erstellt. Die letzte Aktualisierung erfolgte im 2019. Bitte beachten Sie, dass weder Zuva noch CMS Hasche Sigle verpflichtet sind, dieses AI Field zu aktualisieren oder zu warten.

name: Use Limited to Purpose
description: This AI field captures a requirement that confidential information only be used in connection with the purpose for which it was shared.

name: Use of Equipment — Equipment Lease
description: This AI field captures a lessee’s right to use the leased property.

name: Use of Posted Collateral
description: This AI field captures whether the standard provisions allowing rehypothecation apply in the Credit Support Annexes for International Swaps and Derivatives Association agreements, as well as any additional eligibility requirements.

name: Use of Premises
description: This AI field captures permitted uses of the leased premises.

name: Use of Proceeds/Purpose
description: This AI field captures the permitted uses of funds from credit facilities.

name: Utilities
description: This AI field captures a party's obligations to install, provide, or pay for water, gas, sewer, and electricity at a leased property.

name: Utilities — Obligation to Pay
description: This AI field captures a tenant’s obligation to pay for utilities.

name: Valuation Agent
description: This AI field captures the identity of the valuation agent and the circumstances under which that valuation agent can be replace in the Credit Support Annexes for International Swaps and Derivatives Association agreements.

name: Valuation Date
description: This AI field captures the frequency at which exposure and collateral are revalued by the valuation agent in the Credit Support Annexes for International Swaps and Derivatives Association agreements.

name: Valuation Date Location
description: This AI field captures the location(s) designated by each party for determining the Valuation Date. in 2016 Credit Support Annexes for International Swaps and Derivatives Association agreements.

name: Valuation Percentage
description: This AI field captures the definition of “Valuation Percentage” with respect to an item of Eligible Credit Support, but it does not capture the specific percentages for each such item as set out under the “Eligible Credit Support” section. This AI field was trained on 2016 Credit Support Annexes for International Swaps and Derivatives Association agreements only.

name: Valuation Time
description: This AI field captures the time at which a valuation is to be made on the valuation date in the Credit Support Annexes for International Swaps and Derivatives Association agreements.

name: Value-Added Tax
description: This smart field captures provisions with respect to any value-added taxes payable by the parties in connection with an agreement.

name: Value-Added Tax (Broad)
description: This AI field captures value-added tax provisions in an agreement. This AI field captures related definitions.

name: Value-Added Tax —  Obligation to Pay
description: This AI field captures the obligation to pay VAT on amounts payable under a lease, including VAT rents, and statements of whether amounts payable are exclusive of VAT.

name: Value — Dispute and Resolution
description: This AI field captures how “value” will be calculated in the context of dispute resolution in the Credit Support Annexes for International Swaps and Derivatives Association agreements.

name: Vencimento Antecipado
description: Este campo de IA captura se há cláusula que imponha o vencimento antecipado da dívida, mas sem elencar os eventos que afetam o acordo e aceleram o pagamento. Este campo de IA tem como objetivo auxiliar na due diligence de M&A no Brasil e foi treinado utilizando contratos financeiros. Este campo de IA não foi criado por Zuva, mas sim por Machado Meyer e foi atualizado pela última vez em de 2021. Observe que nem Zuva nem Machado Meyer têm obrigação de atualizar ou manter este campo de IA.

name: Venue
description: This AI field captures the location in which litigation connected with an agreement must occur.

name: Vergütung/Provision
description: Dieses AI Field erfasst Regelungen zur Vergütung/Provision für den Handelsvertreter, Vertragshändler, u.a.. Dieses AI Field ist für Anwendungsfälle Commercial gedacht und wurde auf Einkaufsbedingungen, Handelsvertreterverträge, Kaufverträge, Kooperationsverträge, Lieferbedingungen, Lieferverträge, Rahmenvereinbarungen, Verkaufsbedingungen, Vertriebsverträge und Werkverträge trainiert, die dem deutschen Recht unterliegen. Dieses AI Field ist für die Anwendungsfälle Commercial gedacht und wurde auf Einkaufsbedingungen, Handelsvertreterverträge, Kaufverträge, Kooperationsverträge, Lieferbedingungen, Lieferverträge, Rahmenvereinbarungen, Verkaufsbedingungen, Vertriebsverträge und Werkverträge trainiert, die dem deutschen Recht unterliegen. name: Vesting Commencement Date
description: This AI  field captures the specific date from which the stock option shall begin to vest if specified in the agreement.

name: Vesting Schedule
description: This AI field captures the schedule according to which the stock option shall vest and become exercisable. However, it will not capture subsequent changes to the vesting schedule as a result of certain events (e.g. acceleration on change of control). This AI field may not capture vesting schedules presented in table format.

name: Veto/Approval Rights
description: This AI field captures shareholders' rights to veto or approve of certain actions of the company.

name: Voluntary Prepayments — Credit Agreement
description: This AI field captures any rights of the borrower to prepay the loan, including any notice and minimum amount requirements.

name: Vorerwerbsrechte
description: Dieses AI Field umfasst Regelungen, welche im Falle eines Verkaufs bzw. einer Übertragung von Gesellschaftsanteilen, die Berechtigten dazu ermächtigen, den Anteil bevorzugt zu erwerben. Dieses AI Field ist für die Anwendungsfälle Corporate M&A gedacht und wurde auf Gesellschaftsverträge, Gesellschaftervereinbarungen, Joint Venture Agreements, Beherrschungsverträge, Geschäftsführerverträge, Vorstandsverträge trainiert, die dem deutschen Recht unterliegen. Dieses AI Field wurde nicht von Zuva, sondern von CMS Hasche Sigle erstellt. Die letzte Aktualisierung erfolgte im 2017. Bitte beachten Sie, dass weder Zuva noch CMS Hasche Sigle verpflichtet sind, dieses AI Field zu aktualisieren oder zu warten.

name: Voting at Directors Meetings
description: This AI field captures the number of votes required to pass resolutions at directors meetings. This AI field does not capture rules relating to sole directors.

name: Voting/Waivers and Amendments
description: This AI field captures the waiver and amendment provisions applicable to a credit facility.

name: Waiver
description: This AI field captures the conditions under which a party is deemed to waive its rights under the agreement.

name: Waiver of Jury Trial — ISDA
description: This AI field captures whether the parties have waived their right to a jury trial in International Swaps and Derivatives Association agreements.

name: Waiver of Past Defaults — Bond Indenture
description: This AI field captures instances where the holders of a majority of aggregate principal amount of outstanding corporate debt securities may waive existing defaults.

name: Waiver of Stay, Extension and Usury Laws Covenant — Bond Indenture
description: This AI field captures the covenant of the issuer to waive any stay, extension and usury laws that would affect compliance with the covenants or performance of the indenture.

name: Waiver of Termination Rights — Lease
description: This AI field captures an landlord or tenant's acknowledgement that it has waived its right to terminate the lease under any statute or rule of law.

name: Waiver re Application of 1111(b) — Intercreditor Agreement
description: This AI field captures an agreement by junior secured creditors to waive any claim against one or more senior secured creditors arising out of the election by any such senior secured creditor of the application of Section 1111(b) of the U.S. Bankruptcy Code, and an agreement by junior secured creditors to refrain from making any election under Section 1111(b).

name: Warranty
description: This AI field captures a guarantee by a party to repair or replace, if necessary, within a specified period of time. This AI field does not capture disclaimers of warranties or warranties in asset purchase agreements, share purchase agreements or merger agreements. Disclaimers of warranties are captured by the Disclaimer of Warranty AI field.

name: Waterfall
description: This AI field captures the application and priority of the distribution of funds following an event of default.

name: Werbegemeinschaft
description: Dieses AI Field erfasst den Zusammenschluss einer Werbegemeinschaft bzw. Beitritt des Mieters zu einer bestehenden Werbegemeinschaft sowie Verpflichtungen in der Werbegemeinschaft. Dieses AI Field ist für die Anwendungsfälle Real Estate gedacht und wurde auf gewerbliche Mietverträge und Änderungsverträge trainiert, die dem deutschen Recht unterliegen. Dieses AI Field wurde nicht von Zuva, sondern von CMS Hasche Sigle erstellt. Die letzte Aktualisierung erfolgte im 2018. Bitte beachten Sie, dass weder Zuva noch CMS Hasche Sigle verpflichtet sind, dieses AI Field zu aktualisieren oder zu warten.

Dieses AI Field ist für Anwendungsfälle in den Bereichen Immobilien, geistiges Eigentum, Handel und Arbeit gedacht und wurde auf gewerbliche Mietverträge, Änderungsverträge, Abgrenzungsvereinbarungen, Vorrechtsvereinbarungen, Kooperationsvertrag, Lizenzverträge, Markenübertragungsverträge, Markenkaufverträge, Patentübertragungsverträge, Softwareentwicklungsverträge, Softwareüberlassungsverträge, sonstige Verträge, Urheberrechtsverträge, Einkaufsbedingungen, Handelsvertreterverträge, Kaufverträge, Kooperationsverträge, Lieferbedingungen, Lieferverträge, Rahmenvereinbarungen, Verkaufsbedingungen, Vertriebsverträge, Werkverträge, Arbeitsverträge, Geschäftsführerverträge, sonstige Verträge und Vorstandsverträge trainiert, die dem deutschen Recht unterliegen. Dieses AI Field wurde nicht von Zuva, sondern von CMS Hasche Sigle erstellt. Die letzte Aktualisierung erfolgte im 2018. name: Wettbewerbsverbote

Dieses AI Field ist für die Anwendungsfälle Corporate M&A gedacht und wurde auf Gesellschaftsverträge, Gesellschaftervereinbarungen, Joint Venture Agreements, Beherrschungsverträge, Geschäftsführerverträge und Vorstandsverträge trainiert, die dem deutschen Recht unterliegen. DDieses AI Field wurde nicht von Zuva, sondern von CMS Hasche Sigle erstellt. Die letzte Aktualisierung erfolgte im 2017. Bitte beachten Sie, dass weder Zuva noch CMS Hasche Sigle verpflichtet sind, dieses AI Field zu aktualisieren oder zu warten.

name: What are the obligations and requirements resulting from a Change of Control?
description: This AI field describe what happens on a change of control. Note that answers are are based on what applies to one or more parties.

name: What is the duration or timeframe during which the non-solicitation clause applies?
description: This AI field finds the duration or timeframe during which the non-solicitation clause applies.

name: What triggers the requirement to return or destroy confidential information/data?
description: This AI field answers what triggers the requirement to return or destroy confidential information/data, either termination of the agreement or a request or demand of the other party.

name: Which parties cannot be solicited under the scope/coverage of the non-solicitation clause?
description: This AI field lists the parties that cannot be solicited under the scope/coverage of the non-solicitation clause.

name: “Willful Breach” Definition
description: This AI field captures the definition of “Willful Breach”.

name: Work Hours/Overtime
description: This AI field captures an employee’s work hours, any overtime work that may be required, and whether additional compensation will be provided.

name: Working Capital Adjustments
description: This AI field captures all pre-closing and post-closing adjustments to the aggregate purchase price based on working capital.

name: “Working Capital” Definition
description: This AI field captures the definition of "Working Capital" in connection with a transaction. This AI field does not capture working capital adjustments.

name: Yield / Applicable Margin — Most Favored Nation — Incremental Facility
description: This AI field captures the most favored nation provision for incremental facilities / increases in commitment with respect to yield / applicable margin. This AI field does not capture similar provisions regarding refinance / replacement facilities, incremental notes, or incremental equivalent debt. It is recommended that this AI field be used together with the other Incremental Facility AI fields.

name: Yield Protection
description: This AI field captures yield protection provisions.

name: Zahlungsmodalitäten

Dieses AI Field ist für die Anwendungsfälle Real Estate gedacht und wurde auf gewerbliche Mietverträge und Änderungsverträge trainiert, die dem deutschen Recht unterliegen.
